story:
What is WordPic Translator?

WordPic Translator is an iPhone app that is different than the others. Like all other language translators you can type in a word or phrase in any language and get a translation, also with the push of a button the word or phrase can be spoken. In addition to this the user can speak into the app and the app will recognize the speech and translate it. The biggest revolution is that with this app you can simply take picture and the app translates it into any language you want. You're on a vacation in France and can't read the dinner menu? Use WordPic Translator! You're driving around in Madrid and can't read the street sign? Use WordPic Translator! Also something cool is the ability to star certain words or phrases and be able to access them with the push of a button.

Purpose

The purpose of this app is to make it easier to communicate. Language is such a huge barrier, but why should it be? Without communication the world wouldn't be able to function, and this app is making it that much easier.

What will the money be used for?

The money will be used for a variety of things. The biggest thing it will be used for is to finish the coding of the app, developers are expensive! It will also be used to create a small advertising campaign for the app in order to get downloads.  A few smaller things it will cover is the cost of becoming an Apple Developer, creating a small website, and to buy the license to be able to use ABBYY which is the software that allows us to translate text in pictures to over 15 languages!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute here are some other ways to help:

  • Like our Facebook page: 
    • https://www.facebook.com/wordpictranslator
  • Share our campaign with others!

story:
Internet Hosting – “Open”on Someone Else’s Facilities!

Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, and other “open” social networks allow us to constantly engage with friends, family, and co-workers using third-party hosts. eMail establishes communications between users also w/ “open” mail servers (hosts). The Internet itself allows users to search for information on an unlimited number of servers - as “open and public connections” – no special access….Contact with your bank is a form of “secure” access over an encrypted link. The Internet offers “secure” purchases for products and services. Cloud services offer a form of “secure” services using the Internet. “Their hosts” support “clients”…In all cases the underlying element is all transactions are processed on someone’s facilities!...

The Internet User “as a Client” Has No Privacy…

When there is private information exchanged, it is carried a number of ways - using these third-party hosts, and their gateways…. The user is relegated to being a “client”…

As a client the user works with servers/hosts -the gateway for the application is at the server…Raw Information Technology ("IT") functions are deployed in all online servers – banks, business, and cloud services, and these systems are actually “hosts”. Businesses deploy IT functions with hosts to support their employees – especially with remote access. Also, hosts support remote clients when securely accessing the hosts i) bank accounts, and ii) when purchasing goods, online. Users are familiar working online with their banks - entering "user ID sign-in", and "password". Cloud-services operate similarly with an authorized account…

  • Broadband "carrier client"... Broadband Carriers have separated themselves from security and privacy – they only provide a path into the Internet and a monthly bill! Sometimes they offer a do-it-yourself Internet Security from McAfee or Symantek and nothing else…
  • Privacy is lost using clouds as "service client"… “Cloud services are built on someone else’s facilities”. Cloud offerings themselves are supported on 3rd party hosts (servers) – users are clients. Your data and your private information is on some one else’s facilities - subject to loss, hacking, and government intrusion. Under these services, users give-up their privacy and legal rights under broadband service contract terms”….

Cloud Services/Cloud Devices - Not the Answer…

Most cloud solutions store your files on remote servers that are shared with other customers and have terms of use allowing the provider to access, review, distribute, and delete your files at any time. Because of this, there can be legal ramifications for anyone that needs to share private or confidential files. Cloud services use someone else’s facilities - theirs!  Additionally, as an alternative cloud-devices are being introduced and sold to consumers in specialized appliances - built on a ½ IT solution, and with additional cloud service billings. These are being sold to support “private cloud” file handling/sharing of files with family or friends and confidential documents with co-workers. Also, these devices are being offered for synchronization across the Internet, file backups into clouds and virtual drives for multipoint use…

ipCLOUD – What’s In It?

ipCLOUD is “electronic with facilities”… It is a complete system of IT – with multiple hosts and their facilities integrated for administration into a simple user-interface – using a standard browser…The user is both a host and a client and hosted though a sign-in procedure that works much like your bank. ipCLOUD is a system of hosts with “multiple” cloud services dedicated to a single user. The system supports private social networking along with private file-sharing with friends, family, and co-workers.  Its “cloud server” supports its cloud applications/private services – with “hosted” private control. The user owns and controls their data, maintains their own gateway, and privately handles all Internet communications …

Its Unique = Multiple Clouds w/ User Facilities

Netmax Communications is planning on releasing ipCLOUD using its proprietary technology for deploying/setting up hosts “internet privacy (ip)” through an integration of multiple servers simplified for home/small business use. It’s a cloud system with facilities included. With user controlled and resident facilities its web interface supports local users on site in their LAN, and provides the ultimate level of security/privacy for mobile users operating off-site. The system is designed to provide the privacy protection unavailable with offsite cloud facilities/services handling commercial data placement and applications. 

ipCLOUD supports a user-environment that is unachievable with commercial cloud services – which rely on offsite services, and offsite-gateways. ipCLOUD is an appliance with user “privacy” locked into broadband, and ipCLOUD integrates their hosts. It incorporates an industrial IT grade gateway/firewall for consumers – even adding additional software security suites. The OS software is installed and combined with the system additions of Web/URL filtering, security, plus the option of using AntiVirus and Anti-Spam if needed. It contains modules that are used with encryption – fully protecting privacy. These include transporting mail (iPRIVATE Mail), and closes the openness of social networks (iPRIVATE Facebook (as an example) – used when information is to be held as private.  And, privacy-mode continues whenever signed-in to ipCLOUD with SSL certificates. ipCLOUD even secures your Internet-access/links via proxy encryption or VPN-tunnel when using unprotected WiFi when traveling.

ipCLOUD – How Does It Handle Privacy

Using ipCLOUD the system provides a user experience which is much like working online with a bank - 1) user ID sign-in, and 2) password. Cloud-services operate similarly with an authorized account…Under ipCLOUD the user hosts himself in the same way. And its all “private”. It allows users “as hosts” to reach another level of – “privacy networking” through the Internet without an IT department…

          

Modes of “Host-Yourself” Privacy…

We designed ipCLOUD with user social lifestyles in mind, email services, web-filtering and everything is built under a single device integrating multiple hosts. The system provides the front-end for any/all internet communications. It lets you share, collaborate, and privately extend digital-communications to yourself when traveling and further extend digital-communications to anyone anywhere in the world - privately. ipCLOUD replaces the need for outside services. As one example it provides an unlimited mix of back up file options all supported under ipCLOUD controls.

ipCLOUD stores your data only on your local network where all digital communications are gated and user-controlled. With your own facilities, you own and control your own system of hosts. Also, all interconnected users in the LAN are subordinate to a system of central control from a central resident gateway. In other words, it is centralized - completely private, it resides locally and provides security/privacy to all networked computers - unlike offsite clouds, and their services. And best of all, using ipCLOUD is user host-controlled without any outside controls or administration…

Private Hosts in ipCLOUD – How They Protect…

  • PRIVATE eMail - Send open-email notice to any user – alerting them to connect to a private hosted/encrypted HTML link into the ipCLOUD mail server to read. Much like your bank , there is a private sign-in to “read” the mail file via the piped encrypted connection.

            

  • PRIVATE Social Networking - ipCLOUD will support a “private” sign-page established under a user domain name. This private page will be controlled with a user name and password sign-in. These private pages can be established on Facebook and other social networks along with any published web site – it will extend to blogs, tweets and any HTML addressable site….         

  • PRIVATE (Remote) No Tracking Web Surfing - ipCLOUD has a proxy mode when traveling that through a remote link, all web calls are executed behind the ipCLOUD firewall. This is a privacy feature along w/ WiFi security – providing no-snoop no-hack protection, hiding web surfing behavior.
  • PRIVATE (At Home) No Tracking Web Surfing -  ipCLOUD’s hosts are mostly on dynamic DNS (hard to track w/ ip address changes. Further ipCLOUD ip-rotation can be enabled for “no tracking” of web calls. WiFi security can also be enabled for neighborhood no-snoop no-hack protection.
  • PRIVATE Internet File Sharing - ipCLOUD has 2-methods of Internet file sharing 1) authorized FTP file up/downloads and 2) VPN encrypted file exchanges.
  • PRIVATE Application Modules - The ipCLOUD store will offer “private” application = attractive module that integrate and offer full cloud privacy, and security. These will work inside ipCLOUD will full protection.

ipCLOUD Doubles - with Internet Security

ipCLOUD also offers security system bundling – some free, and some with minimum fees. The modules include the following protection. Under its central control all security functions are established in-front of the connected PCs in the LAN so no individual PC installs or setup is required…

       • iBRICK Web Filter
       • BigWALL Firewall 
       • i-INTUDER IDS/IPS
       • iPOISON Virus Scanner
       • iGARBAGE Anti-Spam

         

  • BigWALL Firewall - State control of gateway w/ ports and settings. Commercial/industrial grade protection delivered to the home. This is a powerful firewall – included with UTM (Universal Threat Management) – used in commercial/industrial grade security systems.
  • iBRICK Web Filter - Centrally controlled web filter – controlled in system gateway. Manages all web calls from a central station – uses a simple browser interface. Commercial/industrial grade web filtering delivered to the home.
  • iIntruder IDS/IPS - Managed Internet security – IDS (Internet Detection Service), and IPS (Internet Prevention Service). These offerings are part of UTM (Universal Threat Management) – used in commercial/industrial grade security systems.
  • iPOISON Virus Scanner - Gateway/centrally controlled virus scanner – controlling viruses for all home networked computers. Unlimited licensed use – for all home connected computers. Typically included in UTM (Universal Threat Management) – used in commercial/industrial grade security systems.
  • iGARBAGE Anti-Spam - Gateway/centrally controlled anti-spam. Unlimited licensed use – for all home connected computers. Typically included in UTM (Universal Threat Management) – used in commercial/industrial grade security systems.

Unlimited No-Cost Access/Hosting. With online and cloud storage providers, the more services you require , the more you pay, and most have restrictions on how they handle data including the size and type of files you can store. There is a real cost in holding these files for immediate/future use. With ipCLOUD, you own/control the data storage which you can share “by invitation” and control how and who uses them. The access and hosted sign-in is at no cost –you can access/share thousands of files “privately” of any size or type with yourself or anyone else. Your files are stored in ipCLOUD. …

Anywhere Access. We've all been in situations where we needed to access a file remotely. And “anywhere access” and any look/read is through a military grade 3DES encrypted connection when accessing a file remotely. All files stored on ipCLOUD are available anywhere in the world from any computer or mobile device that has access to the Internet.  

                

100% Private. Because ipCLOUD is a private system you own and control, all your data is stored directly on the ipCLOUD and is only shared with people you specify. Shared data is mostly read through an encrypted connection directly to those people you authorize. Unless you authorize a download copy the files never leave ipCLOUD. Transfers between ipCLOUD devices are always encrypted during transit. 

Full Comparison to “Other” Cloud Devices/Appliances

Routers split the broadband connection for multiple users so that 2-or-more computers have broadband access. Some “other” deployments that provide fractional IT-solutions include the use of sharing/synchronizing devices (appliances). These are subsystems, providing a private cloud-service – by dividing down user’s residential/small office gateway. An assignable IP address is applied – which drills a ”hole” in the users gateway and sets up a subsystem.

Unlike cloud devices, ipCLOUD is the full-gateway and a complete system of multiple clouds. It provides the Internet protection using a state-level industrial grade firewall. It supports simplified “hosted” IT services, locally-resident behind its gateway. And, these integrated hosts specifically are user-configured to address privacy at the user’s broadband connection.

The real comparison is how does ipCLOUD with its hosts address Internet privacy. The host modes supported with privacy - follows…

  • Hosts private eMails, encrypted - read on users’ site -protecting against disclosing private, political or personal information...
  • Scrambles Web Surfing. With address assignment/rotation – it makes it difficult to track /pattern someone’s behavior on the internet...
  • Privacy in sending files = prevents “open transport” File Sharing of private/personal information...
  • All internet delivery applications are housed @ ipCLOUD – preventing port entry to an internal IP address to a subsystem on the home network…
  • Privacy/security of “mobile access” via coffee shop/or any public hot spot – since the web connections are executed behind the ipCLOUD via encrypted virtual connection…

What Are People Saying About Privacy?

 Apple co-founder Wozniak sees trouble in the cloud…“ I really worry about everything going to the cloud," he said. "I think it's going to be horrendous. I think there are going to be a lot of horrible problems in the next five years."  - 
…By Robert MacPherson | AFP – Sun, 5 Aug, 2012 –
 Facebook co-founder Saverin worried about  privacy on Facebook…
” I don’t like showing my privacy,”  
 - By Fox News | Published May 29, 2012 –
 The Wall Street Journal reports….The National Security Agency's surveillance network has the capacity to spy on 75 percent of all U.S. Internet traffic, 
….By Fox News / Reported August  21, 2013-

How it Connects…

Easy to Setup, fronts Existing Router - As an appliance it easily installs to the broadband WAN, and provides the central station “gateway” to connect the existing LAN. It converts the broadband router/LAN into a subsystem still maintaining these connections – requiring no networking changes. Establishes full “Central Control” and protection of all networked-computers at the consumer broadband site through its “hardened” gateway – prevents security/privacy and web-filtering changes at individual computers. Under ipCLOUD’s gateway all privacy and security updates are delivered to the gateway, so that individual computer updates are not needed…

Project Status/Update

The Web Core Vista® proprietary technology was acquired. A full set of its IT hosts has been proven in the business market as IT-in-a-Box®. Tens of thousands of IT-in-a-Box systems were successfully built, sold, and are still in use today without “manufacturer support” since the company discontinued operations.

We have more than 1000 units of IT-in-a-Box still available. Some of these units will be offered for project participation to supporters of ipCLOUD, used as perks – offered with “limited support”. These systems have a complete set of servers – designed for remote/small office business use under a much more classical technical administrator interface. These systems have successfully been installed for home/business use and can still be used effectively with its built in simplified-IT. 

IT-in-a-Box was an expensive system – selling at $2,000- $3,000/ea. However its earlier "older design" which supports a set of electronics is too costly to volume-build as the ipCLOUD  appliance.  We have a new proprietary design with technology advances that meets consumer cost targets with additional capabilities for ipCLOUD-in-Box. Full funding of this project will advance the new design, and provide prototypes and short-order quantities of ipCLOUD for the initial orders under the perks.

We want of these systems available to everyone. We need your help to move from prototype/short-order quantities to production. By making a pledge today, you'll help get us closer to our goal so we can advance the project and make ipCLOUD a reality.

Risks and challenges

There are significant design and manufacturing risks associated with any complex electronic hardware product.

The team responsible for ipCLOUD has decades of experience in overcoming these challenges and successfully bringing products to market. Many of the Engineering and Operations executives are the same people responsible for designing and manufacturing high-technology networking/appliances in Silicon Valley. Their efforts has produced the following status for releasing versions of ipCLOUDs..

Product releases will include early design releases of Techie Super-ipCLOUDs using selected higher-cost x86-release computing appliances – extremely powerful with capacity to support/use in larger businesses. Although more expensive these versions may still prove attractive for “can’t wait” early adopter “home techies” and “business techies” who want ipCLOUD for their family/home business and/or small business. The design and manufacture of the low cost ipCLOUD is scheduled and will follow:

Techie Super-ipCLOUDs – Design/Release...

SUPER x86 DESIGN: This design will be based on – using standard x86 platforms, instead of the "planned" low-cost proprietary consumer platform. These releases will effectively support Core Vista ipCLOUDs – with more computing power.

APPLIANCE SELECTION/SOFTWARE: We have identified several appliances that will support Core Vista and its conversion from IT-in-a-Box to ipCLOUD. The “proven” integrated system of hosts under the proprietary CoreVista software is being extended for ipCLOUD operation. The user-interface, proven for simple IT administration is being coded for consumer/small business ipCLOUD modes/services.

FIRST BUILD/SUPER TECHIE-RELEASE: In process – will support Core Vista and its early conversion from IT-in-a-Box to ipCLOUD. Some of these early selections will be offered as super-Techie-systems using powerful computing platforms. These "super" versions are still in classic IT - offered in both Gold-and-Platinum. These systems will be available for Techie-Bundles using discounted coupons to purchase – September 2014 – October 2014.

Techie Bundles - IT-in-a-Box Perks...

IT-IN-A-BOX TECHIE BUNDLES: Classic IT systems in the Techie-Bundles - Silver, Gold-and-Platinum. These systems are included in the paid Perks, and will be available immediately after the Indiegogo campaign - we expect to ship these units in August 2014. The IT-in-a-Box system description is available at - 
      www.iwantiprivacy.com
      Navigate to /Public Particioation and page-down to...
      the on-the-page link "More about IT-in-a-Box"...  
      Direct Link: http://www.iwantiprivacy.com/page14.html

Consumer-ipCLOUD-in-a-Box – Design/Release...

LOW-COST DESIGN: We have solicited/received proposals for a proprietary design of the consumer appliance which meets all low-cost targets for ipCLOUD – ready for release with successful project funding – April 2015 – May 2015.

MECHANICAL: All mechanical components (industrial design, PCB, plastic covers, tooling) is being planned with soft-tooling for the initial release of ipCLOUD and will be ready for early build of consumer ipCLOUD - December  2014.

ELECTRICAL: All electrical components for the product have been identified into the ipCLOUD design – ipCLOUD Bill of Material (BOM) complete with new design – underway - completed December 2014.

SOFTWARE: The “proven” integrated system of hosts under the proprietary Web CoreVista software is being extended for ipCLOUD. The user-interface is being developed for consumers -  effort parallels the mechanical/electronics  work. We are planning beta versions to test on open x86 platforms to find and fix issues prior to production release.

PROTOTYPES/FIRST BUILD: We have identified an appliance package for the prototypes and small quantity consumer build.  Soft-tooled plastic is an option for the initial release of ipCLOUD. The appliance packaging/housing will parallel the initial product release – planned into the release, expected February 2015.

FULL VOLUME PRODUCTION: We have offshore suppliers ready for the volume build of 1,000 and 10,000 piece lots – available 90 days after short build – September 2015.

Shipping Information

There are shipping charges for some of the Perks.

Campaign Doner – Digital listing on Website – No Charge
On-the-Street Supporter – Ship Shirt – $10 US Shipment
Believer – Discount Coupon via eMail, Digital – No Charge
Techie-Bundle Silver – Ship (1 ea) IT-in-a-Box - $50 US Shipment
Techie-Bundle Gold – Ship (1 ea) IT-in-a-Box - $50 US Shipment
Techie-Bundle Platinum – Ship (4 Units) IT-in-a-Box - $200 US Shipment

US shipping charges provided - extra charges for Alaska and Hawaii. International shipments to be quoted…

The modules include the following protection. Under its central control all
security functions are established in-front of the connected PCs in the LAN so
no individual PC installs or setup is required…       • iBRICK Web Filter       • BigWALL Firewall        • i-INTUDER IDS/IPS       • iPOISON Virus Scanner       • iGARBAGE Anti-Spam         

BigWALL Firewall - State control of gateway
     w/ ports and settings. Commercial/industrial grade protection delivered
     to the home. This is a powerful firewall – included with UTM (Universal
     Threat Management) – used in commercial/industrial grade security systems.


iBRICK Web Filter - Centrally controlled web
     filter – controlled in system gateway. Manages all web calls from a
     central station – uses a simple browser interface. Commercial/industrial
     grade web filtering delivered to the home.


iIntruder IDS/IPS - Managed Internet security
     – IDS (Internet Detection Service), and IPS (Internet Prevention Service).
     These offerings are part of UTM (Universal Threat Management) – used in
     commercial/industrial grade security systems.

iPOISON Virus Scanner - Gateway/centrally
     controlled virus scanner – controlling viruses for all home networked
     computers. Unlimited licensed use – for all home connected computers.
     Typically included in UTM (Universal Threat Management) – used in
     commercial/industrial grade security systems.


iGARBAGE Anti-Spam - Gateway/centrally controlled anti-spam. Unlimited licensed use – for all
     home connected computers. Typically included in UTM (Universal Threat Management) – used in commercial/industrial grade security
     systems.
Unlimited No-Cost Access/Hosting. With online and
cloud storage providers, the more services you require , the more you pay, and
most have restrictions on how they handle data including the size and type of
files you can store. There is a real cost in holding these files for
immediate/future use. With ipCLOUD, you own/control the data storage which you
can share “by invitation” and control how and who uses them. The
access and hosted sign-in is at no cost –you can access/share thousands of
files “privately” of any size or type with yourself or anyone else. Your
files are stored in ipCLOUD. …
Anywhere Access. We've all been in
situations where we needed to access a file remotely. And “anywhere access” and
any look/read is through a military grade 3DES encrypted connection when accessing
a file remotely. All files stored on ipCLOUD are available anywhere in the
world from any computer or mobile device that has access to the Internet.                  100% Private. Because
ipCLOUD is a private system you own and control, all your data is stored
directly on the ipCLOUD and is only shared with people you specify. Shared data
is mostly read through an encrypted connection directly to those people you
authorize. Unless you authorize a download copy the files never leave ipCLOUD.
Transfers between ipCLOUD devices are always encrypted during transit. 
Full Comparison to “Other” Cloud
Devices/Appliances
Routers split the broadband
connection for multiple users so that 2-or-more computers have broadband
access. Some “other” deployments that provide fractional IT-solutions include
the use of sharing/synchronizing devices (appliances). These are subsystems, providing
a private cloud-service – by dividing down user’s residential/small office
gateway. An assignable IP address is applied – which drills a ”hole” in the
users gateway and sets up a subsystem. 
Unlike cloud devices, ipCLOUD is the
full-gateway and a complete system of multiple clouds. It provides the Internet
protection using a state-level industrial grade firewall. It supports simplified
“hosted” IT services, locally-resident behind its gateway. And, these integrated
hosts specifically are user-configured to address privacy at the user’s
broadband connection. 
The real comparison is how does
ipCLOUD with its hosts address Internet privacy. The host modes supported with
privacy - follows…


Hosts private
eMails, encrypted - read on users’ site -protecting against disclosing private,
political or personal information...


Scrambles Web
Surfing. With address assignment/rotation – it makes it difficult to track
/pattern someone’s behavior on the internet...


Privacy in
sending files = prevents “open transport” File Sharing of private/personal
information...


All internet
delivery applications are housed @ ipCLOUD – preventing port entry to an
internal IP address to a subsystem on the home network…


Privacy/security
of “mobile access” via coffee shop/or any public hot spot – since the web connections
are executed behind the ipCLOUD via encrypted virtual connection…


What Are People
Saying About Privacy?

 Apple co-founder
Wozniak sees trouble in the cloud…“ I really worry about everything going to
the cloud," he said. "I think it's going to be horrendous. I think
there are going to be a lot of horrible problems in the next five years."  - …By Robert MacPherson | AFP – Sun,
5 Aug, 2012 –

 Facebook co-founder
Saverin worried about  privacy on Facebook…” I don’t like showing my privacy,”   - By Fox News | Published May 29, 2012 –

 The Wall Street Journal reports….The National Security Agency's
surveillance network has the capacity to spy on 75 percent of all U.S. Internet
traffic, ….By Fox News / Reported August  21, 2013-

How it Connects…
Easy to Setup, fronts Existing Router - As an appliance it easily installs to the broadband
WAN, and provides the central station “gateway” to connect the existing LAN. It
converts the broadband router/LAN into a subsystem still maintaining these
connections – requiring no networking changes. Establishes full “Central Control” and protection of all networked-computers at the consumer broadband
site through its “hardened” gateway – prevents security/privacy and
web-filtering changes at individual computers. Under ipCLOUD’s gateway all
privacy and security updates are delivered to the gateway, so that individual
computer updates are not needed…
Project Status/Update

The Web Core Vista® proprietary technology was acquired. A full
set of its IT hosts has been proven in the business market as IT-in-a-Box®. Tens of thousands of IT-in-a-Box systems
were successfully built, sold, and are still in use today without “manufacturer
support” since the company discontinued operations.
We have more than
1000 units of IT-in-a-Box still available. Some of these units will be offered
for project participation to supporters of ipCLOUD, used as perks – offered with “limited support”. These systems
have a complete set of servers – designed for remote/small office business use under a much more classical technical administrator interface. These systems
have successfully been installed for home/business use and can still be used effectively with its built in simplified-IT. 
IT-in-a-Box was an expensive system – selling at $2,000- $3,000/ea. However its earlier "older design" which supports a set of electronics is too costly to volume-build as
the ipCLOUD  appliance.  We have a new proprietary design with technology advances that meets consumer cost targets with additional capabilities for ipCLOUD-in-Box. Full funding of this project will
advance the new design, and provide prototypes and short-order quantities of
ipCLOUD for the initial orders under the perks. 
We want of these systems available
to everyone. We need your help to move from prototype/short-order
quantities to production. By making a pledge today, you'll help get us closer
to our goal so we can advance the project and make ipCLOUD a reality.
Risks and challenges
There are significant design and manufacturing risks associated
with any complex electronic hardware product.
The team responsible for ipCLOUD has decades of experience in
overcoming these challenges and successfully bringing products to market. Many
of the Engineering and Operations executives are the same people responsible
for designing and manufacturing high-technology networking/appliances in
Silicon Valley. Their efforts has produced the following status for releasing
versions of ipCLOUDs..
Product releases will include early design releases of Techie
Super-ipCLOUDs using selected higher-cost x86-release computing appliances – extremely
powerful with capacity to support/use in larger businesses. Although more
expensive these versions may still prove attractive for “can’t wait” early
adopter “home techies” and “business techies” who want ipCLOUD for their family/home
business and/or small business. The design and manufacture of the low cost
ipCLOUD is scheduled and will follow:
Techie Super-ipCLOUDs – Design/Release...SUPER x86 DESIGN: This design will be based
on – using standard x86 platforms, instead of the "planned" low-cost proprietary consumer
platform. These releases will effectively support Core Vista ipCLOUDs – with
more computing power.
APPLIANCE SELECTION/SOFTWARE: We have identified several
appliances that will support Core Vista and its conversion from IT-in-a-Box to
ipCLOUD. The “proven” integrated system of hosts under the proprietary
CoreVista software is being extended for ipCLOUD operation. The user-interface,
proven for simple IT administration is being coded for consumer/small business
ipCLOUD modes/services.
FIRST BUILD/SUPER TECHIE-RELEASE: In process – will support Core
Vista and its early conversion from IT-in-a-Box to ipCLOUD. Some of these early
selections will be offered as super-Techie-systems using powerful computing platforms. These "super" versions are still in classic IT - offered in both Gold-and-Platinum. These
systems will be available for Techie-Bundles using discounted coupons to purchase – September
2014 – October 2014.Techie Bundles - IT-in-a-Box Perks...IT-IN-A-BOX TECHIE BUNDLES: Classic IT systems in the Techie-Bundles - Silver, Gold-and-Platinum. These systems are included in the paid Perks, and will be available immediately after the Indiegogo campaign - we expect to ship these units in August 2014. The IT-in-a-Box system description is available at -       www.iwantiprivacy.com      Navigate to /Public Particioation and page-down to...      the on-the-page link "More about IT-in-a-Box"...        Direct Link: http://www.iwantiprivacy.com/page14.htmlConsumer-ipCLOUD-in-a-Box – Design/Release...LOW-COST DESIGN: We have solicited/received
proposals for a proprietary design of the consumer appliance which meets all
low-cost targets for ipCLOUD – ready for release with successful project
funding – April 2015 – May 2015.
MECHANICAL: All mechanical components (industrial design, PCB,
plastic covers, tooling) is being planned with soft-tooling for the initial
release of ipCLOUD and will be ready for early build of consumer ipCLOUD - December
 2014.
ELECTRICAL: All electrical components for the product have been
identified into the ipCLOUD design – ipCLOUD Bill of Material (BOM) complete
with new design – underway - completed December 2014.
SOFTWARE: The “proven” integrated system of hosts under the
proprietary Web CoreVista software is being extended for ipCLOUD. The
user-interface is being developed for consumers -  effort parallels the
mechanical/electronics  work. We are planning beta versions to test on
open x86 platforms to find and fix issues prior to production release.
PROTOTYPES/FIRST BUILD: We have identified an appliance package
for the prototypes and small quantity consumer build.  Soft-tooled plastic
is an option for the initial release of ipCLOUD. The appliance
packaging/housing will parallel the initial product release – planned into the
release, expected February 2015.
FULL VOLUME PRODUCTION: We have offshore suppliers ready for the
volume build of 1,000 and 10,000 piece lots – available 90 days after short
build – September 2015.Shipping InformationThere are shipping charges for some of the Perks.Campaign Doner – Digital listing on Website – No ChargeOn-the-Street Supporter – Ship Shirt – $10 US ShipmentBeliever – Discount Coupon via eMail, Digital – No ChargeTechie-Bundle Silver – Ship (1 ea) IT-in-a-Box - $50 US ShipmentTechie-Bundle Gold – Ship (1 ea) IT-in-a-Box - $50 US ShipmentTechie-Bundle Platinum – Ship (4 Units) IT-in-a-Box - $200 US ShipmentUS shipping charges provided - extra charges for Alaska and Hawaii. International shipments to be quoted…

story:
So here’s the story, I’m one of those guys that just hates bulky stuff to carry in my pockets. I can just about manage my phone because its nice and slim and I need it readily available at all times…like most of us I guess. The problem for me is when you add a wallet to the package. The wallet makes two things to carry and it’s pretty bulky.  It’s got my ID, 15 cards of which I only really use two of regularly, and a bunch of other stuff that I don’t even know where it came from.

The times that I have been out and left it in another coat pocket, or left it at home, or stuffed it down the side of the seat in my car and then can’t find it, its even disappeared for the best part of a week in my wife’s handbag because the weather was nice and I didn’t have a decent pocket to put it in! BUT I almost never forget my phone, my phone goes almost everywhere, and if I lose it I have an app for that :)

So, I came up with the idea of CellClipz (patent no 61813185).

 

It’s not designed to replace that trusty old Fat Wallet for those of you that need one, but once you start using it you will quickly realaize that you don’t need the Fat Wallet most of the time. I’ve been using a demo version of CellClipz  for 3 months and not at any time have I needed my Fat Wallet! Everyone that sees me with it wants one…So I really want to get this into production so that we can offer a good alternative to Fat Wallet.

We intend to make a short production run for the iPhone 4 in just two colors (black and brown) in September this year, and produce in bulk for iphone 4 & 5, as well as several other leading smart phones in 2014 and more colors. We already have an excellent manufacturer signed up and the material specifications established, the mould design and specs are completed, the mould manufacturer is sourced and known to us,  and we already have interest from several big box stores for 2014.   

My background is manufacturing and marketing and I’ve been lucky enough to have worked with many great companies and on lots of complicated projects, companies like…


So your investment is in safe hands :)

What We Need & What You Get

The main costs involved at this moment are the patented case moulds and the specially designed billfold clip, our manufacturer is more than happy to produce a small run for us this year, so we just need to raise the target of $15,000 to start production. If we don’t reach the $15k the funds will be returned to you, the important thing is to get the ball rolling so we have something to build on:)

If we exceed our target we will also produce a limited run of a CellClipz iPhone 5 version, this will be updated here on Indiegogo and we will add it as an option when possible.

Don’t forget that Cellclipz is a patented product, only available here and not available anywhere else until main production in 2014. You will be the first to own, gift or distribute these limited edition CellClipz. The retail price next year will be $39.97

Now to encourage and reward our investors we have several plans for you to consider.

#1        $5 – No case but your name will go down on the CellClipz website wall of fame as a founding investor !

#2        $20 Early bird investor, a hot off the press limited edition crocodile print Cellclipz case in Brown!

#3        $20 Early bird investor, a hot off the press limited edition crocodile print Cellclipz case in Black!

#4        $29  Regular investor, a hot off the press limited edition crocodile print Cellclipz case in brown! (as above)

#5        $29  Regular investor, a hot off the press limited edition crocodile print Cellclipz case in black! (as above)

#6        $50 Twin pack 1 Black 1 Brown limited edition crocodile print Cellclipz cases

 #7        $100 5 Pack 2 Black 3 Brown limited edition crocodile print Cellclipz cases

#8        $1500  - Distributor pack 100 limited edition crocodile print Cellclipz cases (50 Black 50 Brown)

All help is very much appreciated, even if you don’t contribute, please take a moment to mention us on your social media or use the use the Indiegogo share tools…every little helps :)

story:
Spell™

Spell™ is a smartwatch project that wants to bring airwriting as a way of enhancing interaction with our digital devices.

The motion sensing technology embedded in new smartwatches enables the recognition of fast and light movements, produced with a flick of the wrist by writing letters in the air.

With a short training, Spell™ will be able to recognize your writing style and will let you airwrite quick replies to messages, notes, responses to your smartphone digital assistant.

Spell™ comes with an open development platform for new applications that lets air writing gestures communicate to Bluetooth 4.0 devices!

What We Need & What You Get

For Spell™ to become a reality, some important steps have to be carried out:

  • Design validation and test
  • FCC/CE certifications for Bluetooth 4.0 
  • Industrial design 

Then, it should take less than 5 months since the end of the campaign for Spell™ to get through these steps and become a certified and finished smartwatch. 

The funders will get the opportunity to receive the Early Adopter Indiegogo edition of Spell™, months ahead of the mainstream version.

In case of the project does not meet the 5 months deadline since the campaign end, all contributions will be refunded.

The Impact

The Spell™ team believes that wearable technology is going to change the way we interact with devices, and contributors are essential to create the early adopter platform for radically new ideas.

So, if you believe that airwriting can improve your life with digital devices, Spell™ will wave a big Thanks to all of you! Spell it to the world!!

story:
Your laptop has become smaller, lighter, and thinner!
But how do you continue to connect ALL your devices with that Type-C port, especially if it's the ONLY port?!

 

 

The only Type-C hub that doubles as a PORTABLE POWERBANK!

 

 

More than a hub!

 

 

The PowerHub has 5000 mAh... to give you an idea of how much power this is, it's enough to charge an iPhone 6 TWICE!

 

 

PowerHub works with any of these laptops - Macbook Pro 2016-2017, Macbook 2015, Macbook 2016, DELL XPS 15, DELL XPS 13, Lenovo Yoga, Huawei Matebook.

 

 

 

Work with a second monitor!

It's easy to connect and work with a 2nd monitor or display. Simply plug into the HDMI port and you are up and running in no time!

 

 

Productivity

Don't be limited by a single port. With this hub you can simultaneously connect your smartphone, digital camera, external drive, power bank, flash drive, wifi dongle, and more!

 

 

PowerHub saves you money!

You can continue to use almost all your old devices. Instead of throwing away your trusty gadgets, simply connect them to the PowerHub and enjoy extended ownership.

 

 

Design & Portability

 

 

 

PowerHub has a scratch resistant shell and is also heat resistant. It is designed to be an accessory rather than extension, meaning that it doesn't have to get in the way when it's not needed. It is built with portability in mind. At approximately 6" X 4" and a weight of 8 ounces, you can carry your PowerHub anywhere, anytime! 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

PowerHub Functionality

 

 

PowerHub in Production

 

Chipset

 

Assembly

 

Ports have passed certification

 

Testing

 

ABS material chosen for toughness and resistance to oil, acid, alkali, salt and chemical reagents

 

Aluminum housing will reduce weight, and it scores well in durability, non-corrosiveness, and heat dissipation​

 

Fresh out of the oven​

 

No; you can't call this 'handcrafted' :)

 

So, as you can see, we are making brisk progress and are confident that we will deliver your PowerHub to you on schedule.

story:
The Two Halves of The Fidj

1. The Fidj Gadget: A highly-refined, restickable disk that was solely designed for the ultimate spinning ability. The finished product is a patented, low-friction disk refined for spinning for minutes at a time. Stick it on any phone or case and let the fun begin!

2. It' All About Dat App: Perhaps most important to the Fidj vision is the app: It’s a dance party in your pocket, an art creation tool, a hypnotic conversation starter, an anxiety fighter, a multiplayer game machine, and it even syncs to smart devices for room-scale interactivity!

The Fidj Gadget: The Ultimate Spin

Stick it on your phone, even if you have a PopSocket there already (the Fidj is 100% compatible).

The Fidj can stick and restock as needed via the special adhesive.

The super slim design won't be noticed in your pocket!

 

The Fidj App: Where things Get Interesting

Every Fidj gadget includes the FREE APP, which adds an unprecedented amount of interactivity.

 

The app, which is included free with every Fidj, converts your phone into a mind-blowing spinning device and a playground of interactivity. You'll get 4 amazing features right out of the gate, and we'll be constantly updating with more:

People can’t help but be drawn to what appears to be a spinning disk of light flashing perfectly to the beat. Watch as they can’t help but dance.

Your fingertip becomes the paintbrush while colors swirl and change with each tap and stroke. Get together with the squad and take turns adding strokes to the canvas!

Mesmerize with psychedelic spiral artwork, bringing some legit oohs and ahhs from the crowd. Eyes will beam with excitement as they tap to cycle the designs.

Your phone emulates real-world, physical objects with audio effects and haptic feedback vibrations. This one is specifically designed to enhance fidgeting — our favorite being the crank sound that emulates a real, ratchet-like sound and clicky vibrations. Bleeps and bloops round out the package with retro-inspired sounds that change on each tap and shift of your phone.

Check out a sound demo of the Fidget Widget Here.

 

And the Killer Feature... Smart Device Integration!

This ultimate vision of the app will augment your entire room. Picture these upcoming app features:  

  • Sync with smart devices like Philips Hue lights: spin, and room colors will swirl in time to the rotation of the phone!
  • The more people that spin, the brighter lights will get!
  • Sync to bluetooth speakers to enable record scratches, bass beats, and other interactive sounds. This means real-time music creation, DJ spinning, and sound-based party games.
  • Play games, mix music as a group and pulse the room’s lighting/audio based on user interactions.

 

A Proven Tool for Wellness

For Anxiety and A.D.D. Additional feedback from the Fidj test group confirms a reduction in nervous energy, increased clarity of thought, and found that spinning phones with the Fidj is habit forming in the best of ways. Add the Fidj app, which is also designed to benefit those with anxiety, A.D.D., and sensory issues, and what you have is therapy in sa pocket.

For Autism: There may also be significant benefits for individuals with autism. Teachers, parents, and autism professionals agree that autistic children are drawn to spinning objects and find relief through spinning. The Fidj, paired with an app specifically designed for this audience, provides a robust reward system that can be easily integrated into their education and habits. “Stimming”, a common yet controversial behavior, can now combine the physical act of spinning with the engaging and beneficial activities presented by the Fidj app.

To this effect, we will be creating a separate app specifically for children with autism, and will work alongside experts to ensure that it is a positive experience that will implement perfectly into their educational and daily lives.

 

Technical Details

  • Compatible with all phones and cases. Simply stick, flip, and make it spin! 
  • Engineered with the highest quality materials and designed for low friction, high-speed spinning for minutes at a time!
  • The Fidj doesn’t need to be perfectly centered to work. The size and depth was crucial for this, and you can simply stick it near the center of the back of your phone without the fuss. Physics will handle the rest! 
  • Compatible with PopSockets. 
  • Raises phone above surface so there are no scratches on the surface OR your phone/case.
  • Can be applied, and re-applied via the super-sticky yet reusable adhesive. If it loses it’s sticking power, simply wash off the adhesive gel pad to restore max-sticky!
  • The Fidj gadget is a 2” cone-shaped disk engineered for nearly zero friction and effortless spin. In fact, it spins effortlessly for over 2 minutes straight! 
  • Nearly unnoticeable in your pocket due to ultra-slim profile. 
  • Co-developed with prominent toy industry veterans, designers, and engineers. 
  • Includes a free, mind-blowing app that transforms your phone into a dance machine, art creator, gaming device and more. 
  • Will ultimately sync with smart devices to enable room scale fidgeting and interactions! 
  • Made with non-toxic, ultra high-quality plastics and recyclable materials. It’s also scratch proof!
  • This first batch comes in fluorescent pink and blue (We’ve got final samples. They look soooo good.), but eventually we’ll have a Fidj for every style, mood, and brand.

Not-Technical Details:

  • Perfect for all ages. 
  • Keep kids (and adults) mesmerized. 
  • Fidget discreetly in public without the need of a silly toy. 
  • The Fidj is always with you! 
  • Instant conversation starter.
  • Play group-based games, create joint artwork, and start a legit dance party by syncing the app to the beat of your favorite tracks! 
  • We’ve already vetted and secured a trusted manufacturer. This means the Fidj will be in your hands FAST. 
  • Eases nerves and has legitimate benefits for those with anxiety issues, A.D.D., and other hangups. 
  • A truly special tool for parents and teachers of children with autism.
  • The app is and always will be free. Better yet, it will continue to grow with incredible new features. 
  • Fast shipping! Rest easy in knowing that you’re Fidj will be in your hands in weeks, not months.

Manufacturing

Our manufacturer is responsible for delivering some of the most popular toys in the world, and they’ve already provided us with a sample product in some of the smoothest, highest quality plastics we’ve ever laid hands on. They’re as professional and trustworthy as they come, and they’re now standing-by for mass production. In fact, they've already made the first batch! Check them out:

The Fidj will initially launch in fluorescent blue and pink, but eventually will release in an endless amount of patterns, colors, and your favorite brands.

The last yet equally important step — The Fidj App: Josh Sears, the Fidj inventor, is the owner of PaperTelevision LLC, an Ohio-based design and development studio that’s been around since 2008. Though his focus is now solely on the Fidj, he will utilize his connections to a reliable team of developers, who have already created the base app serving as the foundation for future features. The iOS version is NOW LIVE, and the Android version is on the way.

 

The Fidj Team and Partners:

Josh Sears: Inventor, Designer + Founder of the Fidj. Cincinnati, OH. Josh has over a decade of experience in launching sustainable businesses for clients of all sizes—from small start-ups, to multi-billion dollar industry giants. With a history of launching successful products, he is laser-eye focused on getting the Fidj on everyone’s phone.

Steve Weinstein: Owner and Creative Director at Envoi Design. Cincinnati, OH. Steve has over 20 years experience as a Design Manager specializing in toys, non-profit, and government projects. He is a highly regarded consultant in all areas of Brand Strategy, Product Design, Photography, Animation, and Post Production. Steve's team is responsible for rendering the Fidj itself, consulting on various design elements, and more.

Joe Smith: Chief Development Officer at K'NEX Brands L.P. Philadelphia, PA. Joe brings an unrivaled amount of experience in the toy industry and serves as a valuable partner and advisor to the Fidj team. He has also been critical in securing a trusted manufacturer for the Fidj. Note: The Fidj is in no way related to or affiliated with K’nex toys.

Matt Sears: CEO and owner of Littlelines LLC. Seattle, WA. Matt’s career spans nearly 20 years of developing complex, large-scale web applications. Matt is a valuable partner and software consultant who will ensure that the Fidj app is the best it can possibly be.

 

Let's Make it Spin!

Unlike many campaigns, we've pretty much completed the process of developing this awesome product. That means you are ordering directly from our first shipment, and will receive your Fidj FAST. Select the amount you'd like to receive and we'll make sure it's at your doorstep in a matter of days. As always, we want to thank everyone who has helped us make the Fidj a reality. Happy spinning!
story_txt:
The Two Halves of The Fidj
1. The Fidj Gadget: A highly-refined, restickable disk that was solely designed for the ultimate spinning ability. The finished product is a patented, low-friction disk refined for spinning for minutes at a time. Stick it on any phone or case and let the fun begin!
2. It' All About Dat App: Perhaps most important to the Fidj vision is the app: It’s a dance party in your pocket, an art creation tool, a hypnotic conversation starter, an anxiety fighter, a multiplayer game machine, and it even syncs to smart devices for room-scale interactivity!The Fidj Gadget: The Ultimate SpinStick it on your phone, even if you have a PopSocket there already (the Fidj is 100% compatible).The Fidj can stick and restock as needed via the special adhesive.The super slim design won't be noticed in your pocket! The Fidj App: Where things Get InterestingEvery Fidj gadget includes the FREE APP, which adds an unprecedented amount of interactivity. The app, which is included free with every Fidj, converts your phone into a mind-blowing spinning device and a playground of interactivity. You'll get 4 amazing features right out of the gate, and we'll be constantly updating with more:People can’t help but be drawn to what appears to be a spinning disk of light flashing perfectly to the beat. Watch as they can’t help but dance.Your fingertip becomes the paintbrush while colors swirl and change with each tap and stroke. Get together with the squad and take turns adding strokes to the canvas!Mesmerize with psychedelic spiral artwork, bringing some legit oohs and ahhs from the crowd. Eyes will beam with excitement as they tap to cycle the designs.Your phone emulates real-world, physical objects with audio effects and haptic feedback vibrations. This one is specifically designed to enhance fidgeting — our favorite being the crank sound that emulates a real, ratchet-like sound and clicky vibrations. Bleeps and bloops round out the package with retro-inspired sounds that change on each tap and shift of your phone.Check out a sound demo of the Fidget Widget Here. And the Killer Feature... Smart Device Integration!This ultimate vision of the app will augment your entire room. Picture these upcoming app features:  
Sync with smart devices like Philips Hue lights: spin, and room colors will swirl in time to the rotation of the phone!
The more people that spin, the brighter lights will get!
Sync to bluetooth speakers to enable record scratches, bass beats, and other interactive sounds. This means real-time music creation, DJ spinning, and sound-based party games.
Play games, mix music as a group and pulse the room’s lighting/audio based on user interactions.
 A Proven Tool for WellnessFor Anxiety and A.D.D. Additional feedback from the Fidj test group confirms a reduction in nervous energy, increased clarity of thought, and found that spinning phones with the Fidj is habit forming in the best of ways. Add the Fidj app, which is also designed to benefit those with anxiety, A.D.D., and sensory issues, and what you have is therapy in sa pocket.For Autism: There may also be significant benefits for individuals with autism. Teachers, parents, and autism professionals agree that autistic children are drawn to spinning objects and find relief through spinning. The Fidj, paired with an app specifically designed for this audience, provides a robust reward system that can be easily integrated into their education and habits. “Stimming”, a common yet controversial behavior, can now combine the physical act of spinning with the engaging and beneficial activities presented by the Fidj app.To this effect, we will be creating a separate app specifically for children with autism, and will work alongside experts to ensure that it is a positive experience that will implement perfectly into their educational and daily lives. Technical Details
Compatible with all phones and cases. Simply stick, flip, and make it spin! 
Engineered with the highest quality materials and designed for low friction, high-speed spinning for minutes at a time!
The Fidj doesn’t need to be perfectly centered to work. The size and depth was crucial for this, and you can simply stick it near the center of the back of your phone without the fuss. Physics will handle the rest! 
Compatible with PopSockets. 
Raises phone above surface so there are no scratches on the surface OR your phone/case.
Can be applied, and re-applied via the super-sticky yet reusable adhesive. If it loses it’s sticking power, simply wash off the adhesive gel pad to restore max-sticky!

story:
Introducing Space Cadet: The astronaut magnetic phone mount for your office or car

Phone mount vertically or horizontally, your call.

There are plenty of car mounts on the market.  Why did you decide to make another one?

Here's the short story of why we made the Space Cadet phone mount.  My friend Nathan and I were in an unfamiliar part of town trying to find our destination.  The magnetic phone holder on the car wasn't holding the phone very well.  It was because the base magnet and the metal plate (which was under the phone case) didn't have a close contact to allow strong bond.  Coming from a product design background, we decide to take on this challenge and make a better phone holder.

While we were in the process of designing a better phone holder, we thought the shiny metal ball looks a lot like the reflective shield on an astronaut's helmet, so we went with that motif and create the Space Cadet.  Looks cool doesn't it? 

How does my phone attach to the adapters in the first place?

We have 2 adapters to cover all surfaces of different models of phone and phone cases.  The adapter with the suction cups work with most hard surfaces and is the highlight of the video.  We design that particular adapter with 7 smaller suction cups because that provides the most secure and even attachment points for the phone.  As a bonus, it looks like little rocket boosters for the astronaut!

The second adapter which is included in the package in the reusable sticky pad adapter.  This adapter will work on all surface, including leather wallet type of phone case.  Don't be alarmed with the "sticky" pad, it won't leave residue.  We tested the stickiness and the hardness of the adhesive to make sure it gives a good bond without leaving unwanted residue.  You can take it on and off whenever you desire and it will retain the stickiness.  Over a long period of time where the pad gets dirty, you can simply water rinse the pad and it's good as new.

Can I use it in my office?

Yea of course!  That's why we included the extended base plate with each order.  Just simply slide the Space Cadet into the extended base plate and you get a wide base for home or office use.  It's a conversation starter!  

What will I receive as a backer?

 

  • The Space Cadet
  • Suction cup adapter
  • Sticky adapter
  • Extended base plate
  • Props from the Space Cadet team! (hi-fives all around!)

How far along is the project?

We've finished the entire process of design and tooling development, and we have already produced a small batch for quality testing and marketing.  When you back us, you can be sure the Space Cadet will be shipping out within the weeks of campaign closing.  

What happens when we hit the funding goal? What about stretch goals?

In addition to helping us realize our project, once the funding goal is reached, we have multiple tiers of stretch goals planned.  I can't give away too much until we actually hit the funding goal, but here's a hint: Dark side of the moon.

Risks and challenges

We have committed our resources to design and develop the Space Cadet ahead of crowdfunding. This means our funding goal can be minimal and production is ready to start as soon as the funding period ends. Production timeline will also be cut short because we do not need to develop tooling as it was done ahead of time.

story:
Glimps

Glimps is part of a tech start-up founded in 2016. We're located in Montreal Canada. Our team of experts specialize in creating engaging, innovative, content driven mobile applications that offer a win, win, win scenario for everybody.

Glimps user

Glimps is an opt-in mobile advertising app which pays and further compensates mobile users for viewing, sharing and shopping your favorite brands

*Download the app and start winning great prizes from thousands of brands/advertisers!

*Start viewing & sharing ads and get paid for your time, its that simple!

*Now you can help to! you can donate any amount of your earning from Glimps, to a charity of your choice, right from the app and we match your contribution.

Glimps Business

 No matter how Big or Small your business is, once you register with Glimps you're taken to your dedicated dashboard, where you can create, target and launch an ad campaign in under 10 minutes, reaching thousands, even millions of opt-in mobile users organically.

You have a running ad on Glimps, Great! Now you can initiate a giveaway campaign, to help drive traffic to one or all of your physical locations. Simply chose a product or service that you'd like to introduce by giving it away, then create the campaign and launch...absolutely free!

Recap

1- Its easy to use for any size business Big or small

2- It rewards the mobile end user in a big way

3- Its socially responsible/conscious

What We Need

We're asking for your generous support of $50 000, We're right on the doorstep of launching Glimps! Its been a great trip so far and now we'd like you to experience the magic!

with your generous support we will be able to complete our funding and move forward with:

- Technical support

- Finishing our IOS version

- Final Testing

- Glimps launch (U.S,  Canada))

- Online Media Campaigns

- Promotion & Sales Campaigns

 

What You Get

Satisfaction- You get the satisfaction of having been part of a unique project and a mobile app that will redefine how advertising is done, an app that is socially conscious and is a Win, Win, Win for everybody involved!

Perks- The perks are pretty great.... T-Shirts!, Baseball Caps!, Autographed Posters! Formula1 Tickets! VIP Parties!  are you kidding me!!!

The Impact

Glimps is not just about launching and running a profitable business. Its about Giving Back!

Once we've established ourselves in mobile advertising, we will launch monthly partnerships with major companies, that will benefit the less fortunate.

We have a list of companies that we've started contacting and here's some examples of how they're going to help, in exchange for advertising space on Glimps App

Examples

Stay Active - Shoe companies will give sneakers to students in less fortunate schools of our choosing to help promote active and healthy living

Good Start- Food suppliers and Restaurant chains will be part of a morning breakfast programs, helping students start the day right

Feel Good- Clothing companies will be part of a project that will define confidence through nice clean clothes. everybody feels good and confident when they look good

Glimps will set the standard and be very present in changing one neighborhood at a time.

When you support the Glimps launch, You will be supporting thousands, possibly millions of kids, to start the day right, to feel confident and to stay fit! 

Risks & Challenges

There's a saying...No risk, no reward and thats true for most.

Our risk is that we will probably grow much faster than expected and in doing so we will need a solid infrastructure and technical support to handle the massive growth.

We've already taken that into account and are very fortunate to be with ( AWS) Amazon Web Services, a world renowned company that has created a scalable package for Glimps in the event that we grow to quickly.

Being scalable means that our web services grow as we need them, So we're always up and running with no hiccups.

Now in the event that we do not reach our target, we will keep pushing forward. It may take a little longer to get rolling but we will one way or another because this project is to important to us all and much to valuable to the thousands of people that we will help over the years to come. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign get out there on every social media platform and scream it out GLIMPS!!!!
  • Download Glimps on the Play store tell your friends to download Glimps!!
  • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!!
  • Talk to people about what we're doing because its gonna be BIG!!!!

story:
Short Summary

Hello, my name is Ryan! And I am a game developer for the past 10 years I have been developing small indie games and focusing on improving my skill set while juggling various full time software development jobs at local companies in Australia.

I propose to you all today my game concept and idea Biolab Chronicles a game loosely based around pop culture sci-fi horror and zombie films it will launch for windows and mac first and then make the transition to IOS via minimal porting effort due to the cross platform nature of the developer tools

As you may have seen from the demo video, the game is progressing along significantly since I began development, However as an indie developer and as I am sure you are all aware managing, organizing, developing and every other aspect of the game design process is a huge undertaking for a single person.

What We Need & What You Get

Currently I have invested in the developer tools required to develop and publish this game to:

  • Windows / Windows 8
  • Mac
  • IOS
  • Android

And have a registered developer account with all of the above platforms app stores.

I have also made the initial investment in art assets as you can see from the high quality polished nature of the demo video. However there is much more that can be done to raise the quality of this game even further it is my proposal and hope to raise the funds so that I may hire an artist to compose a 6 – 12 track sound track for the game, and to hire an artist to design some more resources

A Little Technical Overview on the Game

So I would like to speak here about some of the cool features I’ve added to the game already.

Firstly I would like to start by saying that this is powered by the box2D physics library the player the monsters the bullets almost every object in the game is a physics controlled object this allows for some interesting 2D Effects such as objects flying across the floor, bullet shells rolling, guns having recoil and enemies being pushed away when shot.

I have developed a dynamic lighting engine which you will see in the demo video in action. It works by using alpha transparency and the concept of stencils to cut through a thick layer of black then it adds colour radiating from the centre of this cut out which allows for completely real-time and dynamic lighting on mobile devices with minimal performance impact

There is an environmental ambiance layer which slowly flows throughout the level this works in a similar way to the lighting system however I am using a noise based algorithm to generate what looks like clouds and then filtering the alpha channel to achieve some level of ambient fog in the levels

Finally the unique blood splatter system which takes between 2 and 5 unique blood splatter decals. Rotates, skew’s, stretches and blends them into a single pool maintaining a pointer to 1 or 2 of those blood splatters then over time they fade away at random speeds while the 2 maintained references are slowly animated this allows for some amazing gore with over 100,000 unique splatter animations again generated procedurally uniquely animated with minimal performance hit to mobile devices.

The Impact

If I am able to achieve the amount requested it will give this game the boot it needs to make it with the big players in the vast yet ever evolving indie game landscape. I would be able to spend some more time developing and contract some third party assistance for things like graphics and audio.

Other Ways You Can Help

I would appreciate all feedback be it positive or negative with great enthusiasm as all feedback will only help to make this game better.

As you may have seen from the demo video, the game is progressing along significantly since I began development, However as an indie developer and as I am sure you are all aware managing, organizing, developing and every other aspect of the game design process is a huge undertaking for a single person.
What We Need & What You Get
Currently I have invested in the developer tools required to develop and publish this game to:

Windows / Windows 8
Mac
IOS
Android
And have a registered developer account with all of the above platforms app stores.
I have also made the initial investment in art assets as you can see from the high quality polished nature of the demo video. However there is much more that can be done to raise the quality of this game even further it is my proposal and hope to raise the funds so that I may hire an artist to compose a 6 – 12 track sound track for the game, and to hire an artist to design some more resources
A Little Technical Overview on the Game
So I would like to speak here about some of the cool features I’ve added to the game already.
Firstly I would like to start by saying that this is powered by the box2D physics library the player the monsters the bullets almost every object in the game is a physics controlled object this allows for some interesting 2D Effects such as objects flying across the floor, bullet shells rolling, guns having recoil and enemies being pushed away when shot.
I have developed a dynamic lighting engine which you will see in the demo video in action. It works by using alpha transparency and the concept of stencils to cut through a thick layer of black then it adds colour radiating from the centre of this cut out which allows for completely real-time and dynamic lighting on mobile devices with minimal performance impact
There is an environmental ambiance layer which slowly flows throughout the level this works in a similar way to the lighting system however I am using a noise based algorithm to generate what looks like clouds and then filtering the alpha channel to achieve some level of ambient fog in the levels
Finally the unique blood splatter system which takes between 2 and 5 unique blood splatter decals. Rotates, skew’s, stretches and blends them into a single pool maintaining a pointer to 1 or 2 of those blood splatters then over time they fade away at random speeds while the 2 maintained references are slowly animated this allows for some amazing gore with over 100,000 unique splatter animations again generated procedurally uniquely animated with minimal performance hit to mobile devices.
The Impact
If I am able to achieve the amount requested it will give this game the boot it needs to make it with the big players in the vast yet ever evolving indie game landscape. I would be able to spend some more time developing and contract some third party assistance for things like graphics and audio.
Other Ways You Can Help
I would appreciate all feedback be it positive or negative with great enthusiasm as all feedback will only help to make this game better.

story:
We Are Jubo

Hello! We’re three ambitious high school girls developing a rental service for external phone battery reserves planted in heavily congested urban areas.

We are currently developing unique vending machines at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology. However, we need your financial help in order to continue designing and manufacturing this advanced technology so that millions of people around the world can feed their phones. We believe that our service will offer a convenient way for busy on-the-go commuters to ensure that their smartphones last longer during critical moments throughout the day.


What We Need & What You Get

We are asking for $30,000 in funding.  This amount allows us to perform all of the research and development needed to create the machines, as well as allows us to pay for manufacturing of and rental space for our first few machines.

Our perks are very specific to JUBO.  We offer a variety of limited edition JUBO merchandise, such as t-shirts, mugs, and cell phone cases, but we also offer discounts and free uses of JUBO machines for those of you who live in Boston (our first location).  If you don’t live in Boston, though, there is no need to fear, with your help, we will soon be able to grow to many more cities around the world, and for now, you can enjoy showing off your JUBO pride!

We chose the Fixed Funding option, which means that if we do not reach our goal of $30,000, all of the money is refunded back to our contributors.

The Impact

Smartphones play an essential role in today's increasingly technology-dependent world from conference calls to candy crush. However, smartphone battery lives can be distressingly short and leave many people without their most valuable resource in times of need.

The idea for JUBO began when all three of us realized that we were running out of phone battery multiple times a day. To make matters worse, this recurring problem usually happened when we were outside of the house with no immediate means of charging our phones. After brainstorming a variety of solutions to this one common problem, JUBO was born.

With help from JUBO, preserving phone battery won’t be a widespread inconvenience anymore and people will be able to charge their phones on-the-go!

Risks & Challenges

All projects have a certain amount of risk associated with them.  Our main risk is making sure that we get the full funding, because this is the amount that we need to be able to make any further steps.  For that reason, and to minimize the risks, we decided to choose the Fixed Funding option, meaning that if we do not reach our goal, all of the money is refunded back to you, our contributors, and we will not proceed with the company.

Other Ways You Can Help

Help us out by sharing our campaign page, and visiting/liking/following our social media pages!  We greatly appreciate your support!
