story:
Pinto is the world's first Storage Wristband with no USB Plug! It connects to your Bluetooth enabled devices with the help of Bluetooth technology and you can use it to access or store your personal or business files. In short, Pinto incorporates all the good qualities of Cloud storage and Flash drives and none of their drawbacks!

Pinto is designed to be a True Wearable device: you don’t ever have to take it off. It Charges and Operates Wirelessly. Plus it’s waterproof!

For consumers who seek maximum security, accessibility and ease of use in file storage devices Pinto is a whole new category of products that provides unique features in the form of a wearable device.









Everybody uses at least one way to store personal and business files. The most common ways are Cloud storage, USB Flash drives and other means such as External Hard Drives, DVD’s, etc.

While these options have many advantages they also come with substantial limitations. 


Cloud storage has become one of the most preferred ways to store files; however the only certain thing that Cloud’s safety record shows us is that this option is only safe until the next breach. Therefore, a lot of users have lost trust in Cloud especially when it comes to sensitive and important personal and business files.


Flash drives are easy to lose, damage and/or break which not only leads to loss of important data but also to lots of money being wasted on buying new ones. These are the reasons why this option is no longer appealing. Not to mention that Flash drives cannot be used on portable devices such as Smartphones or Tablets.



Pinto has been conceived and designed to provide maximum security, accessibility and ease of operation. This way users can truly feel safe when they store files and also feel confident that they can access them at any time from any Bluetooth enabled device, without having to worry about Internet presence or Security Breaches.


 


Pinto has come to revolutionize the way users store Files. It is the world’s first wearable device that is used for File Storage; that is why Pinto is creating a new category in File storage. The Wearable Storage Category! 


Pinto is a True Wearable device! Why? No need to ever take it off! It operates wirelessly, is waterproof and even charges wirelessly! That’s right! You can charge Pinto while it is on your Wrist! How is this achieved?? With The Charging CAP!


The Charging CAP is a round shaped charging Adapter that magnetizes on the round bottom of Pinto’s Rubber Band. It allows charging Pinto without having to take it off! 

The charging PAD is a slim and elegant Pad that is placed right next to your laptop or keyboard. The top surface of the PAD is covered with a comfortable silicone layer making the charging process pleasant and fun! Just rest your wrist on the pad and carry on with your work! 



 































  • No USB Plug or Port
  • Negotiation and Connection is established via Bluetooth
  • User Defined Password for Bluetooth access and File Transfer
  • User Defined Device Name
  • Data Transfer is carried over a colocated 802.11 link
  • One illuminated Button Function
  • Battery Status LED's
  • 210 mAh Li-ion Polymer Battery
  • ARM MCU 
  • Power Saver function
  • Waterproof certification IP-57
  • High Quality Glossy Plastic 
  • Secure Clasp
  • Heavy Duty Rubber Band
  • One Size Fits all Rubber Band


  • Dimensions.
    Depth: 0,19 inches (5mm)
    Width: 3,9 inches (10cm)
    Height: 7,8 inches (20cm)
  • Mini USB Connection 
  • Charging Indication LED
  • Comfortable Silicone Top Layer
  • High Quality Glossy Plastic 

Pinto has a US and International Patent Pending Status



For the past year we have been working hard to bring a new product into  the storage device category. We have extensively researched every step of the File storage process and made all necessary improvements adding incredible user experience and safety above all! 



File Storage is a very important everyday operation that every user needs to perform. Regardless of the type of device being used or the amount of Data being stored, Safety and Ease of Access and Operation are the key factors.


Adjusting and Tuning Pinto: We are creating a brand new category in storage devices which comes with many challenges. Therefore Pinto might have to undergo some minor adjustments in order for the best quality and functionality to be achieved. Our key priorities in designing Pinto are Data Safety, User Experience and Great Value.

Manufacturing Pinto: Due to the unique nature of Pinto's design, there are numerous parts involved in the process that need to be manufactured and assembled separately. Our manufacturing partners have a solid record for delivering on time and keeping the manufacturing quality high.

Delivering Pinto to your Wrist: We want you to start using your Pinto as soon as possible. However sometimes unforeseen events might occur that can cause delays. We don’t want to take any chances in delivery of your Pinto and that’s why we take our Partnerships and Collaborations very seriously. We are working with the best manufacturing and fulfillment companies, suppliers and professionals that are highly experienced in what they do and nothing less than that. Any detail during the overall process is thoroughly and responsibly reviewed and checked.

Our Code of Ethics and You: A satisfied customer and backer means the world to us. That is why we are trying to bring to life a unique product that will not only make the wait worthwhile, but will also make your everyday digital life easier and safer. Please keep in mind that no matter what pledge you choose it brings Pinto a step closer to reality!

In case you can’t afford to Pledge, you can still make a difference towards Pinto's success by sharing this Project with friends and family.



For those who have participated in the Christmas 10% OFF Offer (thanks by the way), here is a 4 step Guide to claim your Offer:

  • Get any Pledge you like from all the above EXCEPT the Birdiest Backer ones. 
  • Proceed by paying the whole amount for the pledge of your choice. 
  • Include the Full Name and Email address you used when you initially participated in the Offer.
We will check our database to ensure you are actually one of the lucky Xmas offer holders and then 

  • You will be refunded with a 10% discount from the amount you paid for the Pledge. 


Q: How can I purchase Pinto?

A: At the moment you can purchase your own Pinto only on our Indiegogo          Campaign.

Q: Can I choose the color for my Pinto?

A: Of course you can! Before we ship your Pinto or Pintos, we are going to contact you by email to ask you about the color or colors of your choice.

Q: Can I choose the storage size for my Pinto?

A: Our Pledges are divided into 32 and 64GB. So, pay close attention to the pledge description and choose according to your needs.

Q: What is the right storage size for me?

A: That depends. Every user has different storage needs. What we always say when it comes to storage is the more storage, the merrier. So ask around to get opinions about your storage needs.

Q: How can I pay for my shipping costs inside and/or outside the US?

A: All Perks include minimum shipping costs in their price. Any additional shipping charges whether domestic or international are covered by us, so you don't have to pay extra for shipping.

Q: My Laptop is not Bluetooth enabled. What can I do?

A: You can purchase a USB Bluetooth Dongle (Adapter) and connect it to your laptop. After you install all necessary Drivers, your Laptop should be Bluetooth enabled!

Q: Can Pinto connect to all Portable devices?

A: Pinto can connect to all Major Portable Devices. We are trying hard to include more devices into the list of supported portable devices.

Q: Can I swim with my Pinto?

A: Yes, Pinto is waterproof, so you are all good!

Q: I want to back Pinto with the Charging PAD.

A: No problem. You can additionally select the Charging PAD Perk with your Pinto Perk before you pay.

Q: Is Pinto made in the USA?

A: Pinto's production will be sourced to a US company that owns facilities for manufacturing both inside the US and overseas. Also, everything from engineering to fulfilment is US based. However, these options are subject to re-negotiation, according to our Campaigns outcome.  

Q: Why didn’t you choose Flexible Funding in your Indiegogo Campaign?

A: In order to create a device with the unique characteristics of Pinto and all its cool features, a lot of expenses are incurred in every step of the way. Therefore, our goal is to deliver to our Backers a device that meets everyone's high standards. So if we had chosen Flexible Funding, and our asking amount was not met, Pinto production would face serious issues, ending up causing delays and frustration. That is why we chose Fixed Funding.

Q: Can I get a refund for my contribution?

A: Contributions are not-refundable. All contributions go towards bringing Pinto to life. Please see Indiegogo Terms of Use for more details. Contributions are going to be  refunded only if the Campaign's Goal is not reached.

Q: I Have a Valid Christmas 10% OFF Offer. How can i use it?

A: For those who have participated in the Christmas 10% OFF Offer (thanks by the way!), you can get any Pledge you like from all the above EXCEPT the Birdiest Backer ones. You will then proceed by paying the whole amount for the pledge of your choice. Please remember to include the Full Name and Email address you used in the Offer.

We will check our database to ensure you are actually one of the lucky Xmas offer holders and you will be refunded with a 10% discount from the amount you paid for the Pledge. 

Q: Who is this Charming Green Dude on your team?

A: That’s The Bean!! He is Head of PR and is an amazing guy! He thinks out of the box and always finds solutions to everything! He makes everybody happy – a really great asset!!

story:
Summary

Dogecoin is gaining traction & people are having issues losing their DOGE, or just want a place to safely store their wallets offline. This is a crowd fund to get dogecoin users their own custom USB wallet backups so we can decrease these issues and give people usb wallets for a very fair price.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need $2,500 to fill a minimum order of 500 cards so we can get the best bulk pricing
  • All cards will be 2GB in size.
  • Anything over the $2,500 will be put towards helping with the shipping costs
  • Shipping is included with your pledge!

This is a crowd fund to get dogecoin users their own custom USB wallet backups so we can decrease these issues and give people usb wallets for a very fair price.What We Need & What You Get
We need $2,500 to fill a minimum order of 500 cards so we can get the best bulk pricing
All cards will be 2GB in size.
Anything over the $2,500 will be put towards helping with the shipping costs
Shipping is included with your pledge!

story:
Hello everyone, I would like to introduce you to Social-EYE for Google Glass devices!

Social-EYE allows you to easily connect and share with your friends on Twitter, Facebook, and Foursquare.

Keep yourself in-touch by receiving notifications when your friends tweet at you on Twitter or message you on Facebook. Use the Social-EYE website to adjust your settings; you decide who you receive notifications from and when – don’t be interrupted by those you don’t know or those you don’t want to hear from. In addition to receiving replies and direct messages, subscribe to your favorite friends to receive all of their updates.

Spending the night out on the town? Thanks to Foursquare integration, you will always know when your friends are nearby. Receive notifications when a friend checks into a restaurant, shop, or any other location.

Thanks to Google’s mirror API, you’ll be able to share your latest photos to your social accounts.

Social-EYE doesn’t just present you with information; easily respond to a message on Twitter and Facebook or “Like” your friend’s Check-In on foursquare. Responding is simple with Google Glasses’ built in voice recognition feature.

I need YOUR support on indiegogo to help purchase an early development pair of Google Glasses and begin the development of this application. In addition, Social-EYE will require a server to constantly communicate between your social networks and Google’s servers. Your money will help me purchase an Explorer edition of Google Glass and get the needed servers up and running to begin development.

When Google launches their new device later this year, Google+ will be the social network in the spotlight, but don’t leave Twitter, Facebook, and Foursquare out. Help make Google Glasses the world’s most social wearable computer.

As a thank you and reward for your support we are offering t-shirts, pin on buttons, and a private luncheon with the developers.

Help us bring Social-EYE to Google Glass and spread the word with your friends! If you are grabbing an explorer’s pair of Google Glasses then contribute to this project and be the first to use the application. If you are thinking of purchasing a pair of Google Glasses later this year or down the road, then help fund the development now, so when you get your pair Social-EYE is fully ready!

Want to see more photos? Check out the gallery here on indiegogo!

* All images are concepts and may not represent the exact design of the final application.

** Pair of Google Glasses is not included and is needed to use the application.

Want to learn more about me? Check out www.about.com/marcham93

Your money will help me purchase an Explorer edition of Google Glass and get the needed servers up and running to begin development.
When Google launches their new device later this year, Google+ will be the social network in the spotlight, but don’t leave Twitter, Facebook, and Foursquare out. Help make Google Glasses the world’s most social wearable computer.
As a thank you and reward for your support we are offering t-shirts, pin on buttons, and a private luncheon with the developers.

Help us bring Social-EYE to Google Glass and spread the word with your friends! If you are grabbing an explorer’s pair of Google Glasses then contribute to this project and be the first to use the application. If you are thinking of purchasing a pair of Google Glasses later this year or down the road, then help fund the development now, so when you get your pair Social-EYE is fully ready!


Want to see more photos? Check out the gallery here on indiegogo!
* All images are concepts and may not represent the exact design of the final application.
** Pair of Google Glasses is not included and is needed to use the application.
Want to learn more about me? Check out www.about.com/marcham93

story:
SNAPSTYK™ is a beautifully designed, durable cell phone case and selfie stick in one. No more carrying around extra cases or mounts, and say goodbye to those bulky sticks! SNAPSTYK is slim, stylish and sturdy, and fits discreetly into your pocket or bag for easy access when it's time to capture that special moment.

Available for iPhone 6/6s and Samsung Galaxy S6

BUILT-IN STICK: Strong, sturdy and extends up to 11 inches. Quickly and easily retracts back into place for convenient storage when not in use. 

MULTI-FUNCTIONAL BUTTON: Features Bluetooth technology which controls your device's camera to capture both photo and video. This button also powers ON your SNAPSTYK. Automatic OFF after 30 seconds. 

ROTATING HEAD: Position your mobile device vertically or horizontally to get the best angle in either Portrait Mode or Landscape Mode. 

DEVICE CONTROL SLOTS: Controls, ports, microphone and speaker remain easily accessible, allowing you to keep your SNAPSTYK case on your device at all times. 

DUAL CAMERA ACCESS: Capture photos and videos using your device's front-facing or rear-facing camera.

SLIM, DURABLE, STURDY: Manufactured with high-end materials to provide quality protection for your device, as well as a strong, stable hold when fully extended. The slim, discreet design makes it easy to store away in your pocket or bag. 

             

SNAPSTYK™ originated from the desire to have the benefit of added stability, better angles and a wider shot when taking selfies with family and friends, but without the extra mounts and sticks. We searched for a cool, discreet cell phone case with selfie stick built in, but couldn't find anything. So we set out to design our own!

After nearly two years of research and development, and several designs later, we have created a product that meets our high standards of strength, durability, style and convenience. 

We've teamed up with tremendous and reputable engineers and manufacturers to help bring SNAPSTYK to life. The molds have been created, a utility patent is pending, and we're ready to bring SNAPSTYK to market. 

We're excited to introduce this product to the Kickstarter community. Together, we can make SNAPSTYK a reality. Thank you for your support!

To pre-order your very own SNAPSTYK case, support our project by selecting a reward that is $30 or higher. Each of these rewards offer at least one (1) SNAPSTYK case. Rewards $55 or higher offer additional cases if you'd like multiple cases in different colors, or if you would like to buy more for friends. 

As an extra special THANK YOU to our early backers, we're offering a limited number of cases at higher discounts. So be sure to act fast to save even more cash.

We will collect your shipping information when this campaign is complete. It's that easy!
 

Manufactured using Polycarbonate (PC), a strong, tough, impact-resistant material. Power supplied by 3V CR2032 battery. *Battery Included

Manufactured using Polycarbonate (PC), a strong, tough, impact-resistant material. Power supplied by 3V CR2032 battery. *Battery Included

story:
Featured on

IMPORTANT NOTICE! WE ARE SWITCHING OUR CROWDFUNDING CAMPAIGN TO KICKSTARTER.COM

WE ARE UNABLE TO CANCEL THIS CAMPAIGN ON INDIEGOGO BECAUSE IT IS ALREADY LIVE. ALL CONTRIBUTIONS WILL BE REFUNDED ONCE IT REACHES ITS DEALINE.


FEATURES OF MAGcro 

  • Magnetic base macro lens

  • 10x magnification

  • No battery required

  • Designed by healthcare professionals

  • High quality optical glass

  • Devoid of Spherical Aberration

It has a magnetic base that fits your phone perfectly

Now capture those close ups that you've always wanted to but missed because you've never had access to an expensive macro lens.

Introducing the MAGcro lens which is designed to be a magnetic macro lens that fits your smartphone and tablet device. 

What is so special about MAGcro?

MAGcro uses an aspheric lens.  Normal lenses have a symmetrical spherical surface which makes it prone to spherical aberration which could degrade the quality of your macro photographs.  For MAGcro, we are using specially designed aspheric lenses.

Spherical Aberration is an effect created by normal lenses. The light cannot focus on one point.  This is because the light travelling through the peripheries of the lens are refracted (bended) more than light travelling through the centre of the lens.


Our aspheric lens focuses all light onto one point, which provides superior image resolution.

 Putting on MAGcro

Diameter: 15mm

Height : 5.2mm

Recommendation

  • Your smartphone or tablet should have at least a 3 Mega Pixel camera to obtain the best quality shots
  • Adequate lighting is essential
  • MAGcro lenses may require cleaning from time to time, use our provided micro-fibre cloth to clean
  • MAGcro lenses are coated with anti-scratch but they not 100% scratch proof, purposefully scratching it is not recommended
  • It has a short focal length, so bring your camera close up, really close up.

Protective Case

We have also thought of ways to protect our precious lens.  Below various different ways of safe keeping your lens while using it as a key-chain.  We are still at the stage of producing a prototype.

Designing MAGcro

We started off simple, with a pen and pencil creating sketches of the device.  This was the fun and exciting part!


Photorealistic rending prior to physical prototyping


What is Spherical Aberration? And what is so special about our lens?

Watch the following video to understand what spherical aberration is and how it affects image quality. 


MAGcro is made of an aspheric convex lens that instantly converts your smartphone or tablet camera into a macro camera.  It is easily magnetically attached and has a focal length of 10mm with a magnification of up to 10 times giving you crisp clear images. Have a look at the macro shots below.

Can I use it on my phone?

MAGcro's magnetic fit is only suitable for phones with a metal case.  Alternatively, we provide you a self adhesive metal ring that attaches onto your smartphone or tablet to be used with the MAGcro.  If you don't want to attach the ring we have also developed micro suction cups that can be fitted onto your MAGcro making it attachable on almost all kinds of devices. You decide, use the micro suction cups or magnetism. Watch the following video to find out.

Micro suction cup sheets.  1 square cm comes with thousands of tiny micro suction cups. We are using this method to mount MAGcro onto phones and tablets that does not come with a metal case.


PRODUCTION PLAN

We aim to deliver this entire project within 6 months.  Product design started in June 2014.  We aim to release the first pre-order by December 2014.  Official launch will be January to February 2015.  We aim to ship your rewards before Christmas 2014.  *Note : International backers may only get their rewards in January 2015.

Stretch Goals!

We need your support to make this a success.  And if you could help us achieve more than what we asked for, we would be bringing in more colour choices for you.  Opening up a new colour is expensive, we need to make sure we have the minimum quantity to make it affordable.

$7000 - If we could raise above $7000, we would install the micro suction cups onto all MAGcro making them universal to all phones and devices.


Help us bring these colours to you!

How much do we need?

We need $5,000 to bring MAGcro onto the production line.  We have already selected our manufacturer and we just need your support to get it started.

$5,000 is not a lot.  But it is a lot for a small group like us to help bring up the volume for manufacturing.  

If we are able to raise more than that, part of the proceeds will go to the development of our future projects including the iFundus, a device that instantly converts your smartphone into a retina camera capable of taking pictures of the back of your eye. We are also developing a health monitoring system which monitors your blood pressure, weight, BMI, fat percentage, heart rate and oxygen saturation making it a solution to home based telemedicine.  

If you want to know more about us and these upcoming projects, visit us at www.ophthalmicdocs.com


About us...

OphthalmicDocs was founded by Dr. Hong, Sheng Chiong and Dr. Ben O'Keeffe. Both surgical doctors working in New Zealand. We share a vision of creating a environment of healthcare innovation through seeking opportunities to improve healthcare access, knowledge and understanding with the aim to transform the field of telemedicine.  

To know more about us visit www.ophthalmicdocs.com

Founders of OphthalmicDocs


Dr. Hong, Sheng Chiong, trained in Ireland and is currently a surgical registrar.  Trained at the National University of Ireland. 

Dr. Ben O'Keeffe, trained in New Zealand and is currently a plastic surgery house surgeon.  Trained at the University of Otago, New Zealand.


BEHIND THE SCENES

10x magnification 

No battery required


Designed by healthcare professionals

High quality optical glass
Devoid of Spherical Aberration



It has a magnetic base that fits your phone perfectlyNow capture those close ups that you've always wanted to but missed because you've never had access to an expensive macro lens.
Introducing the MAGcro lens which is designed to be a magnetic macro lens that fits your smartphone and tablet device.

 Putting on MAGcro

The magnetic base fits any phones with a metal case

Dimension of the MAGcroDiameter: 15mm
Height : 5.2mm
Recommendation

Your smartphone or tablet should have at least a 3 Mega Pixel camera to obtain the best quality shots
Adequate lighting is essential
MAGcro lenses may require cleaning from time to time, use our provided micro-fibre cloth to clean
MAGcro lenses are coated with anti-scratch but they not 100% scratch proof, purposefully scratching it is not recommended

Protective Case

Provisional protective case

Designing MAGcro
We started off simple, with a pen and pencil creating sketches of the device.  This was the fun and exciting part!

Photorealistic rending prior to physical prototyping 
Story behind the making of the MAGcroWatch the following video to understand what we went through and how we decided which lens is the best lens for the MAGcro.What is Spherical Aberration? And what is so special about our lens?Watch the following video to understand what spherical aberration is and how it affects image quality.  
Function
MAGcro is made of an aspheric convex lens that instantly converts your smartphone or tablet camera into a macro camera.  It is easily magnetically attached and has a focal length of 10mm with a magnification of up to 10 times giving you crisp clear images. Have a look at the macro shots below.

Macro Photo AppWe are also collaborating with photographers and app developers to recommend the best photo editing app that is suitable for both iOS and Android. The screen shots below are taken with Adobe Photoshop Express which is our current recommended photo app.




Can I use it on my phone?MAGcro's magnetic fit is only suitable for phones with a metal case.  Alternatively, we provide you a self adhesive metal ring that attaches onto your smartphone or tablet to be used with the MAGcro.  If you don't want to attach the ring we have also developed micro suction cups that can be fitted onto your MAGcro making it attachable on almost all kinds of devices. You decide, use the micro suction cups or magnetism. Watch the following video to find out.Micro suction cup sheets.  1 square cm comes with thousands of tiny micro suction cups. We are using this method to mount MAGcro onto phones and tablets that does not come with a metal case.PRODUCTION PLANWe aim to deliver this entire project within 6 months.  Product design started in June 2014.  We aim to release the first pre-order by December 2014.  Official launch will be January to February 2015.  We aim to ship your rewards before Christmas 2014.  *Note : International backers may only get their rewards in January 2015.Stretch Goals!We need your support to make this a success.  And if you could help us achieve more than what we asked for, we would be bringing in more colour choices for you.  Opening up a new colour is expensive, we need to make sure we have the minimum quantity to make it affordable.$7000 - If we could raise above $7000, we would install the micro suction cups onto all MAGcro making them universal to all phones and devices.Help us bring these colours to you!
How much do we need?
We need $5,000 to bring MAGcro onto the production line.  We have already selected our manufacturer and we just need your support to get it started.
$5,000 is not a lot.  But it is a lot for a small group like us to help bring up the volume for manufacturing.  
If we are able to raise more than that, part of the proceeds will go to the development of our future projects including the iFundus, a device that instantly converts your smartphone into a retina camera capable of taking pictures of the back of your eye. We are also developing a health monitoring system which monitors your blood pressure, weight, BMI, fat percentage, heart rate and oxygen saturation making it a solution to home based telemedicine.  
If you want to know more about us and these upcoming projects, visit us at www.ophthalmicdocs.com

About us...
OphthalmicDocs was founded by Dr. Hong, Sheng Chiong and Dr. Ben O'Keeffe. Both surgical doctors working in New Zealand. We share a vision of creating a environment of healthcare innovation through seeking opportunities to improve healthcare access, knowledge and understanding with the aim to transform the field of telemedicine.  
To know more about us visit www.ophthalmicdocs.com
Founders of OphthalmicDocs


Dr. Hong, Sheng Chiong, trained in Ireland and is currently a surgical registrar.  Trained at the National University of Ireland.  
Dr. Ben O'Keeffe, trained in New Zealand and is currently a plastic surgery house surgeon.  Trained at the University of Otago, New Zealand.

BEHIND THE SCENES



History of Product Development: MAGcro
OphthalmicDocs are a special collaboration between two trained 
doctors who are very particular about both detail and providing the best
 level of care for their patients. 
Both Dr. Hong, Sheng Chiong and Dr. Ben O'Keeffe have a special 
interest in ophthalmology (eye's) and they realised that each time they 
saw an interesting finding in someone's eye, it was always a struggle to
 get a good picture. Bringing the phone to near would render the picture
 out of focus, too far, and the details were lost.
This initiated the idea to create their own macro lens and bought the
 invention of the EyeChamp to life, which was the very first macro lens 
that was created with the aim of using if for capturing medical 
conditions, aiming to aid in both diagnosis and management.  
After a successful launch on Kickstarter in September 2014, it became
 obvious that our macro lens was being used not just by doctors but also
 the wider community using it for recreational macro photography.  

Since
 then, OphthalmicDocs received a lot of feedback and requests to develop
 a macro lens that fitted all smartphones and tablets even with their 
protective casing on. We searched the current market and there were some
 interesting lenses that we found, one designed with a rubber band and 
other designed as a silicone plastic lens. While they were all good 
products we knew we had the special advantage with our extensive 
training in optics and ophthalmology and we aimed to create something 
that was more robust, would last longer and a lens that wouldn't be prone to various aberrations that can affect image quality.  
This
 is when the idea, the design and the need for the MAGcro was born. 
 OphthalmicDocs have now come to the right time to offer the MAGcro to 
be available to the public and it starts with your support within a 
crowdfunding project through indiegogo.

At first glance you may not think there is anything new to our MAGcro
 lens. The magnetic holder used in the MAGcro is not new. You may have 
seen a number of similar 'looking' products on the market, so what makes
 us different? It is the knowledge we gain from our experience and 
knowledge of optics and medicine that gives us a superior lens design and understanding of quality.
At OphthalmicDocs we started
 off with using ophthalmic lenses easily available in our ophthalmology 
department.  We soon moved on to other smaller powerful lenses. 
 Through trial and error we 
soon realised that small lenses with the following dimensions worked 
best : 8 - 10mm diameter with a focal length of 10-15mm.
Experimenting with different lenses 20D, 90D, 78D, wide angle lens etcFAQ1. I am not sure if my phone has a metal case?Do not worry at all, we are developing the micro suction cups that can adhere itself to any smartphone or tablet.  Alternatively, we have created a small metal ring that fits all smartphones and tablets instantly solving the problem.  The self adhesive metal ring can be easily placed in front of the camera and it can be easily removed without damaging your phone or tablets case.2. Are your lenses made of plastic?NO.  Our lenses are made of fire-polished crown glass.  3. What colour choices do I have?That depends on your contribution.  Our goal is to raise at least $5000 which brings you only one colour, silver.  However if you can help us raise more than that, we would be able to bring in more choices of colour for you.  Please have a look at our stretch goal above and the description of our PERKS to understand if what you pledged for allows you to choose a colour.4. What app are you developing and what are its feature and functionality?We are not trying to develop our own app at this stage.  We are working closely with photographers and app developers to determine which app is most suitable for MAGcro's macro photography.  Developing an app from scratch is expensive and there are various freely available app in the market.5. Can I expect my contribution to reach me by Christmas 2014?For New Zealand and Australian backers, we are very pretty confident your perks will reach you by Christmas 2014.  For international backers, we cannot guarantee that, we expect the latest you will get your perks may be January 2015.6. Can I get a refund?Indiegogo is not a trading platform, we are here because we need your genuine support.  We are sorry we do not have the capability and resources to perform refunds.  However, if you are unhappy with your perks, do let us know how we could improve it.7. Can it fit the new iPhone 6?We are not sure if it has any metal component around its camera as we have not got one here in Wellington to test for.  We will update you on our updates as soon as we get our hands on one. We provide metal rings for adhesive attachment and are developing microsuction cups!

story:
Duet works with: iPhone 5, iPhone 5c, iPhone 5s, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, iPhone 6s, and iPhone 6s Plus - with (most) cases or without a case. 

Apple Watch is here to make your life easier. But adding another device to your charging routine makes things complicated.

Duet changes that by bringing both your iPhone and Apple Watch into one beautifully simple charging hub.


Who's talking about Duet?

Just some of what they're saying:

BGR: "Meet Duet, the charging dock Apple Watch owners are going to love"

Redmond Pie: "... if you own an Apple Watch and an iPhone, you might want to get your credit card out soon."

MacRumors: "... a sleek design that closely matches the look of the MacBook, iPad, iPhone and other anodized aluminum Apple products."

AppleInsider: "... we came away impressed with the design's concept and, more importantly, execution."

Apple World Today: "The Duet has a simple solid elegance to it that doesn’t detract from the beauty of the Apple Watch and iPhone but instead reinforces the work of Jony Ive and crew."

GeekDad: "Constructed of solid aluminum, the stands are sturdy, lightweight, and well-balanced ... while maintaining the same aesthetic as my other Apple products."



Let's simplify.

Apple Watch helps you better manage your notifications, allows you to stay even more connected with your contacts, and generally should make things a little more simple. Yet dealing with another device to charge daily seems to take some of the magic away from the experience. 

We think it should be easier than that. With Duet Dock, there's no need to worry about your charging routine, messy cables, or where you'll keep your devices when they're not in use. Just place your iPhone and Apple Watch in their new home and you're done.

Solid. 

From the moment you get your hands on your Duet, you'll notice its weight. It's precisely machined from a solid block of aluminum, giving it the best possible premium feel to match your devices.

The solid weight, along with the nano suction pads on the underside of the dock, means your Duet will stay firmly in place on any smooth surface you set it down. So carry on, you rebel, with your one handed docking and undocking - life's too short not to.


A magnetic attraction.

Of course you want your charging hub to look good. We do too. And yet we also realize it's not just what's on the outside that counts, but what's hidden inside as well. Duet is fitted with neodymium magnets, tucked away in each side, which allows the Apple Watch piece to click together perfectly with the iPhone piece.


In perfect harmony.

Duet is designed with modularity in mind. If you're like us, you'll be using your Duet beside your bed on your nightstand a majority of the time. But depending on which side of the bed your nightstand is, you'll likely want a certain order of accessibility when it comes to your charging hub. 

For instance, let's say you want your iPhone to be closer to you than your Apple Watch when you're lying in bed, so as to make things easier when you want to grab your phone to peruse Instagram or check your email in the middle of the night. In this case, you'll want to make sure the Apple Watch arm is on the other side of your iPhone. 

That's why we've designed two possible configurations for Duet. The iPhone dock piece, being perfectly symmetrical, will be the same across all setups. However, when you choose your Duet setup, you'll be asked whether you want your Apple Watch to be on the left or the right side of your iPhone, giving you control over a layout that's more personalized to your particular preference.


Performs solo, too.

While we designed Duet to be a two-part charging hub, we understand that there are going to be times you'd like to charge your Apple Watch or iPhone separately, perhaps in a different area of your home or office. That's why we've designed both pieces of Duet to look (and work) great apart from each other as well. 

Use your Duet primarily on your nightstand, but want to charge your iPhone at your computer while you work? Simply lift the iPhone dock away from the Apple Watch arm, and take it to your desk. 


Versatile.

Duet doesn't discriminate. Regardless of what iPhone you have, as long as it has a Lightning Connector, it'll work perfectly in the dock. In other words, Duet works with: iPhone 5, iPhone 5c, iPhone 5s, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, iPhone 6s, and iPhone 6s Plus - with (most) cases or without a case.

Understatedly colorful. 

OK, so we know we said that what's on the inside counts. And while it does, your new home base for your iPhone and Apple Watch shouldn't just work well - it should look good too. Available in Silver, Space Gray, Gold, and Matte Black finishes, Duet offers a backdrop that will perfectly complement your device lineup. 

Spread the word.

The more people that become a part of the Duet community, the better Duet will become! We'd love it if you'd want to share Duet. You can use the share buttons at the top of this page.

Questions?

We love 'em, so don't be shy. Ask away, and we'll do our best to get back to you with an answer.

Some notes:

*Apple Watch, iPhone, and charging cables not included. Requires official Apple Watch and iPhone charging cables.

International customers, please be aware of your local tax and VAT code before placing an order, as our team cannot be responsible for paying the local taxes and duties that may be imposed on an international order. Thank you.

Duet doesn't discriminate. Regardless of what iPhone you have, as long as it has a Lightning Connector, it'll work perfectly in the dock. In other words, Duet works with: iPhone 5, iPhone 5c, iPhone 5s, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, iPhone 6s, and iPhone 6s Plus - with (most) cases or without a case.


Understatedly colorful. 


OK, so we know we said that what's on the inside counts. And while it does, your new home base for your iPhone and Apple Watch shouldn't just work well - it should look good too. Available in Silver, Space Gray, Gold, and Matte Black finishes, Duet offers a backdrop that will perfectly complement your device lineup. 



Spread the word.




The more people that become a part of the Duet community, the better Duet will become! We'd love it if you'd want to share Duet. You can use the share buttons at the top of this page.
Questions?
We love 'em, so don't be shy. Ask away, and we'll do our best to get back to you with an answer.
Some notes:

*Apple Watch, iPhone, and charging cables not included. Requires official Apple Watch and iPhone charging cables.
International customers, please be aware of your local tax and VAT code before placing an order, as our team cannot be responsible for paying the local taxes and duties that may be imposed on an international order. Thank you.

story:
Short Summary

Our team has built a working prototype Smartphone app that allows a user to communicate directly with the top management of US companies and their regulators while also posting the communication to Social Media, the press and business reviewers, such as Trip Advisor. The app’s database to which we are adding daily, currently contains the email addresses for the executives of over 250,000 US companies and we will use the funds to polish the prototype, build additional functionality and roll it out to the App Store.

A team of friends started this project from scratch over a year ago and we are proud of what we have accomplished. We want to give the underdog consumer the leverage to have their message heard by the business leaders that make a difference. We want to roll the app out across the US within 3 months so that all consumers will have the opportunity to have greater leverage in their dealings with businesses. Our software and processes are protected by a pending patent.

If you are tired of not being heard Consumer Angel’s app, BlastEm, will give you a voice that will be difficult to ignore.

We have a blog, http://blog.consumersangel.com , which has established our credentials as a consumer advocacy organization. The blog currently has over 90 followers, many of whom are other consumer advocacy organizations.

Our successful Indiegogo campaign and the following we are developing with our blog will provide the user base we need to get the app in the hands of people who need it.

story:
Introducing cPhone

We are constantly surrounded by smart technology. A constant noise of incoming information that calls for your attention. Imagine yourself free from all the noise for a while and free your mind from relentless exhaustion.

That`s why we bring you cPhone. See LIFE, not a screen, in its true colors.


cPhone is a simple and minimalistic phone. Get rid of all social anxiety and stress. It offers you to simply make calls, and all you really need to stay in touch with friends and family.


cPhone is card-sized and very easy to carry. It can work with your existing phones. You can leave the other phone at home, turn on call forward, and enjoy the day free of distractions.


cPhone also supports a micro SD card to store all your favor songs, so you can enjoy the music anytime with cPhone.



cPhone is designed to a slim and credit-card size, but it has a sufficient standby time to keep your life light. 


cPhone is a pre-paid GSM cell phone and it works independently with your local carrier and supports GSM 850/900/1800/1900 connection. Once you insert a SIM Card in it, it will use its own phone number.

cPhone supports bluetooth connection. You can use it as a bluetooth dialer when you carry your other phone, making it feel like an extention of your other phone.


cPhone specifications:

Perk Packages

About Us

We’re GT Star, and we believe in building the best products - from the ground up. Our founder, Richard has over a decade’s worth of experience in the mobile industry and manufacturing, he knows how to build a quality cell phone.


Story of cPhone

We wanted to design a simpler phone, for simpler life. A phone that doesn’t distract us from enjoying our loved ones, and chatting with friends. A phone that adds to our lives, not become our life.

Why we need help

We want something different out of the cell phones. We want something sleek, something smart, and something that doesn’t distract us from enjoying our life. And now we’re ready to build. But we need your help making cPhone a reality for everyone. We need $20,000 to build and launch cPhone. Will you join us?

Timeline

Risks & Challenges

Our company has over 6 years of experience manufacturing mobile phones, and has its own production facilities. We are aware of the risks involved, and we, along with our manufacturing and distribution partners, have taken the necessary precautions to minimize any obstacles or challenges that may arise. We promise to keep our backers informed and updated as to the progress of the project. Potential risks and challenges that may arise during production include:

1) cPhone can go with most of GSM network and can work with a pre-paid GSM SIM Card. However, backers still have to check whether the plans that offered by telecom carries from different regions are applicable to Janus One.

2) Product certification for different markets

3) Possible delay of raw materials for manufacture

4) Overseas delivery delay

Thank you for helping us make the cPhone a reality.

story:
We would like to introduce you to a new ground breaking mobile app! It’s the world’s first user-friendly investment app, which makes investment easy for everyone! Easy Trade enables you to invest into top rated funds anytime and from anywhere in the world 


 

Special Offer 
                Available only on              

  Get Easy Trade Without Fees or Philanthropy Certificate


We are able to offer you reduced fees or one year with no fees for investing into top rated international funds which can be selected and purchased from the EasyTrade application available in the App Store or Android. This special offer can be purchased in the Perks section of this campaign.

We’re passionate about maximizing the impact of our giving, and we’re excited to connect with other donors who share our passion. We believe economic development and technological innovation have greatly increased human well-being. We’re optimistic that this trend will continue, and we hope to play a part in accelerating it. By selecting this perk you will receive philanthropy certificate from EasyTrade with your name.

Redefining Easy Trade

·Easy & Fast access 

· Guidance

· Global

· Secure

· 24/7

· Offering top rated funds selected by Morning Star

· AAA and BBB funds

· 15 different types of funds

· More than 50 international brands 

· Low Initial Investment 


Enjoy The Flexibility of Your Investment


Earn Magnus Points 


Fill Out A Form of Your Investment Expectations


____________________________________________________________________

Easy Trade allows you to invest anytime and from anywhere in the world.
____________________________________________________________________

____________________________________________________________________

It’s The World's first trading platform, which offers you to choose from top rated funds in the world with lowest  initial investment in market. 

It's easy to use whether you're a beginner or professional investor. 

Easy Trade will help you to find best investment opportunities in the financial markets on a single platform.

story:
Direct Communication, No Fees

The core concept behind our Moto Mod concept is essentially a digital walkie-talkie, enabling Moto Z devices with our Modulator Moto Mod™  to communicate directly with each other without the need for any existing network infrastructure and with some actual usable range similar to current standalone digital portable radios. We are also building an ecosystem of sensors that can be accessed directly from a Moto Z device with our Moto Mod™. The target frequency bands are license free and present no cost to the user. The use cases for this type of direct device-to-device communication are numerous:

Privacy & Security Conscious Users

  • Transmitted Data Does Not Pass Through Any Third Party
  • Private Channels, Broadcast Capability, Multi-User Support
  • Strong Encryption Is Enabled By Default In Radio Protocol
  • Frequency-Hopping Spread Spectrum Increases Resistance To Eavesdropping And Interference From Other Radios

Areas With No Cell Service

  • The Great Outdoors: Camping, Skiing, Boating, etc.
  • Developing Nations With Fewer Existing Networks
  • Think Walkie-Talkies That Can Text And Send Media Files

IoT Devices

  • Ideal For Field Technicians
  • Proven Industrial Use Technology
  • Hardware Support For ZigBee / IEEE 802.15.4 Compatibility
  • Monitor Remote Devices From Your Phone
  • Direct Messaging Beacons For Public Spaces

Enterprise Grade, Consumer Friendly

The Enterprise and Consumer versions of the Modulator software share many features such as strong AES-256 encryption and randomized frequency hopping, essentially negating the risk of  intercepted or replayed messages.  The Modulator app supports multiple channels, with each channel protected by a secret key that is never shared over the network.

The Modulator Team

Our team was originally working on a module for Google's Project Ara modular smartphone platform before the project was cancelled in September 2016.

We have switched our focus to developing a Moto Mod™ for Moto Z devices and we are partnering with CA Technologies to service the Enterprise market.  The Modulator Moto Mod™ and CA Technologies Enterprise software solutions for authentication, authorization and message persistence will open up a new world of IoT possibilities.

Project Status

We have a lot of R&D already completed due to the fact that we spent the last year working on a module for Project Ara.  We have a working prototype based on digital transceiver developer modules from our transceiver chip supplier.  We also have the complete Altium project from our supplier for the reference design we are using to create our Moto Mod™ prototype boards.  Having the complete Altium project of the reference design saves us a significant amount of money due to the fact that we don't have to spend nearly as much on circuit and RF design.  The modifications to the reference design are limited to moving the SPI and power connections to match the placing on the Moto Mod™ platform.

We have a working Android application and also a Swing application for testing on the Raspberry Pi platform.  Current development efforts are focused on fine tuning the frequency hopping algorithm and testing different radio configurations to determine the effect on range and error rate.

We just received our Moto Mod™ developer hardware in January 2017 and we are working on porting the existing prototype over to the Moto Mods™ platform.  Our main focus is integrating the existing radio transceiver driver into the Moto Mod firmware based on NuttX and moving as much of the frequency hopping code and other radio logic into the firmware as possible.

Plans For Funding

We are planning on using the funds we raise to create the first Moto Mod™ specific prototype PCBs that we will be able to use for FCC certification testing.  We are also planning on using some of the funds to pay for the FCC certification as well.  We are aiming to get modular certification from the FCC so that we can use the same PCB for our Moto Mod™ and for standalone devices such as the Raspberry Pi.

story:
This project has been closed - please go to mobilesecsolutions.com for ordering information, or sign up for the new project that has been opened on Indiegogo by searching "Starfish Defender 80"

Project Background

The Starfish Defender 80 series (named for Starfish Prime nuclear tests that "discovered" electromagnetic pulse (EMP)) hardens electronics vs. EMP/radio waves/cell phone reception/GPS to protect your privacy. Internet is still accessible through wireless. It's been tested far above military standard for EMP shielding. There are two main variants: the cell phone kit and the laptop shield.

NOTE: All items shown are prototypes - they have also been tested extensively for wear and tear. Your products as received would be in factory condition.

What It Does

The phone kit is 2 nested cell phone bags. The inner bag blocks reception >1000 feet from a cell tower. Add the other bag to block service even next to the tower - so you can't be tracked and your phone can't be used as a mike to spy on your conversation.

  • Online reviews of other "Faraday cell phone bags" state that they don’t work - because those products can’t block enough signal if close to a cell tower. Our product can.
  • Some people say "You can just remove the battery to avoid tracking." But iPhone batteries can't be removed.
  • The phone kit doubles as EMP protection.
  • Now you can say "Sorry, my phone was cut off by the shield to avoid 'them' tracking me - I wasn't avoiding your call!"

The laptop shield version attenuates EMP, which can fry your electronics permanently. There are three main EMP solutions:

  • Hardened electronic equipment – rough and tough, but expensive - $5-15K each! You can save 99% of your money while getting 99% of the effectiveness!
  • Shielded rooms – immobile and still expensive - may also require specialized A/C.
  • Small Faraday cages – cheap, but you have to choose between putting your laptop in a metal box or using it - and you probably won’t know when an EMP will hit.

Our Defender provides military level usability and protection for under $90 – the best of all worlds. As with all cheaper solutions, no outside connections can be used, but future upgrade kits will filter connections in/out of the shield, making it the ideal low-cost solution You can now rest easy in your fortified bunker, knowing that when nuclear war breaks out, you can play Fallout as long as you have power.

Smaller Defender versions, such as the iPad and booster sizes, are designed to attenuate EMP as well as some cell reception/tracking - depending on your location. However, touch-screens based on electrical conductivity (like Apple products) will not work as our shields block current. Voice commands and wireless Internet still work.

Why You Need It

Privacy Protection

  • Electronic surveillance now everywhere.
  • Phone GPS tracks your location.
  • Phones can record/send all nearby conversations without your knowledge.
  • Blocking reception prevents transmission of conversation or GPS data.

EMP Defense

  • A terrorist detonating a nuclear device in the upper atmosphere can generate an EMP to destroy or shut down most electronics in the continental US.
  • Transportation, telecommunications, utilities, and food production would all fail.
  • Former Speaker Gingrich asserted that "We could lose 90% of the population if an EMP only hit the US." It would be the greatest disaster in history.
  • Our product, combined with renewable power, can help you protect your own way of life from going dark.
  • If products like these are commonplace, we can stop EMP’s from disrupting society.
  • This is just the beginning of our goal of preventing an EMP assault on the US.
  • For more information, read the 2008 Congressional Report on EMP at http://www.empcommission.org/

How it Works

Our products are Faraday cages - continuous metal barriers that block radio waves. For a detailed explanation, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Faraday_cage.

We only need to block the target range of mHz to 10 gHz that can damage your electronics.

  • Lower frequencies can damage but are slow - letting your electronics redirect the energy.
  • Higher frequencies can surge past protection - but do not have the energy to damage.
  • EMP can surge and damage - if enough energy actually gets to your electronics.
  • Our shields block approx. 75-80 decibels (dB) centered at 10 mHz – reducing voltage by 99.99%.
  • Most complex electronics have EMI shielding that then can block the remainder.

The cell phone variant is specially coated to block a wider array of frequencies as well as block even more energy vs. the laptop version, as the coating is effectively an additional layer of protection. This is how we achieve such a strong signal reduction to stop your cell phone from connecting or broadcasting.

Although the laptop product looks simple, it overcomes a number of technical challenges, some of them contradictory. For a laptop to function with this shield, the shield must meet the following criteria:

  • Must be a Faraday cage ideally with no openings but must vent electronics heat – usually done with openings.
  • Must be thin enough to type through but thick enough to withstand stress.
  • Must block RF energy but not higher frequencies like WiFi – allowing full functionality including wireless mice and the Internet.
  • Must be sealed at the bag opening tightly without leaking RF energy but remain resealable over time.
  • Must be metallic to block energy but act like fabric.
  • Must be solid but transparent.
  • Must be inexpensive compared to pricier (thousands of dollars) alternatives but offer superior functionality and portability.

As you can see, creating it was not an easy process and required significant development.

Production Schedule

  • Funding completed by Aug 30, 2013.
  • Company Relocated by Aug 30, 2013.
  • Place Material Orders on Aug 30, 2013.
  • Receive Shipment by Sept 15, 2013 of Materials (Packaging, Tags, Raw Materials, Etc).
  • Compile Shipping Orders by Sept 15, 2013.
  • Finish Production of Initial Orders by Oct 15, 2013.
  • Shipments Starting Oct 15, 2013.

Why We Need Your Help

The biggest factor is a Catch-22 - we cannot buy bulk without a market, but we cannot determine the market without bulk! That’s where YOU come in! By donating, you let us know that YOU want these products!

Your donations will go towards:

  • Military certification
  • Inventory build
  • R&D for related product development
  • Marketing
  • Overhead


If you have any questions, please ASK US!

DON'T WAIT - ORDER NOW if you like this idea and want your very own cell phone blocker or EMP shield! IF YOU WAIT, THE PROJECT MAY NOT SUCCEED! WE NEED YOUR HELP!

If you cannot donate now, and even if you can, we ask you to please, please, please SPREAD THE WORD about our product.  If you want privacy, order now and put your money where your mouth is!

The first 100 donors will be entered into a contest to win a PROTOTYPE laptop shield not currently being produced - a chance at a $150 value for FREE IF THE PROJECT HITS THE GOAL.

Must be metallic to block energy but act like fabric.
Must be solid but transparent.
Must be inexpensive compared to pricier (thousands of dollars) alternatives but offer superior functionality and portability.

As you can see, creating it was not an easy process and required significant development.
Production Schedule

Funding completed by Aug 30, 2013.
Company Relocated by Aug 30, 2013.
Place Material Orders on Aug 30, 2013.
Receive Shipment by Sept 15, 2013 of Materials (Packaging, Tags, Raw Materials, Etc).
Compile Shipping Orders by Sept 15, 2013.
Finish Production of Initial Orders by Oct 15, 2013.
Shipments Starting Oct 15, 2013.

Why We Need Your HelpThe biggest factor is a Catch-22 - we cannot buy bulk without a market, but we cannot determine the market without bulk! That’s where YOU come in! By donating, you let us know that YOU want these products! Your donations will go towards:

Military certification
Inventory build
R&D for related product development
Marketing
Overhead

If you have any questions, please ASK US!DON'T WAIT - ORDER NOW if you like this idea and want your very own cell phone blocker or EMP shield! IF YOU WAIT, THE PROJECT MAY NOT SUCCEED! WE NEED YOUR HELP!
If you cannot donate now, and even if you can, we ask you to please, please, please SPREAD THE WORD about our product.  If you want privacy, order now and put your money where your mouth is!The first 100 donors will be entered into a contest to win a PROTOTYPE laptop shield not currently being produced - a chance at a $150 value for FREE IF THE PROJECT HITS THE GOAL.

story:
Short Summary

Hi, my name is Sebastian Lavender and I am developing an app for Ubuntu Touch and Ubuntu Desktop OS. The app itself is a detailed system information panel with a task manager style intergration displaying cpu usage, ram usage etc. The aim for this app is to have it fully convergant so that it loads up on the Ubuntu Touch OS and full Ubuntu OS when docked. I currently don't have enough funds of my own to donate towards the Ubuntu Edge project to get a phone so this is where you guys can come in and help :)

What We Need & What You Get

I am looking to make enough to purchase a Ubuntu Edge phone on their indiegogo project. So for this I am hoping to raise $830 dollars. As all the money will be going there you are helping out not just one project (mine) but also another (the Ubuntu Edge one).

The Impact

So there are two positive impacts that this project will have. One is that it will help me make my app to its maximum ability and have a device with full convergence which I can test it on. Secondly all the money that you donate will actually be going towards the Ubuntu Edge project so will help make it possible.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't afford to donate as I know money is hard, please feel free to spread the word and help me reach this goal!

story:
Introduction

"Have you ever controlled a Robot or RC car/plane with an Xbee or Wi-Fi module?"

If you did so, you probably controlled it with an module connected to a computer because there is no standard Xbee/Wi-Fi controller available on the market. I also ran into this problem and found a nice solution (I think). First I started looking for standard game controllers, I ended up with the PlayStation dualshock 3 controller, I think this is the most convenient game controller at the moment. It feels great, has a lot of digital buttons, 2 analog triggers and force feedback but the problem is that Bluetooth has a fairly limited range. I opened one to see what's inside and thought it should be possible to design my own pcb with an Xbee/Wi-Fi module.

That's where it all started, first trying to copy the outline of the original main pcb and mark of areas where no components could be placed. The three original button boards in the controller will be connected with a flatcable to the new main board. You can read my blog I created here: http://www.proofofprinciple.nl I have to mention this blog is about the first version of the pcb.


After I finished the first prototype that was working pretty well, someone submitted my blog to Hack a Day, from that date I was getting a lot of reactions about the project, also a lot of mails of interested buyers, so that's why I want to start production of the controller. This way developers all over the world can do cool things, more easily, with this awesome controller.





What can you do with the controller?
You can use and program the controller for: Robotics, RC cars, planes, helicopters, drones, boats, hovercrafts and of course: FPV (First Person View)!



Example project:





The controller uses an ATmega328P, the same as used on the "Arduino uno". This makes it very easy to adapt the Arduino platform on the controller. You can upload your sketches via the usb port. The hardware and software is open for everyone, this makes it possible to program your own functionality into the controller.



You can directly configure the Xbee/Wi-Fi module via usb with for example the X-CTU application for the Xbee module. Just set the UART software switch in the right direction (programming example provided!). The battery will charge automatically via the usb port.

Arduino files:
- boards.txt
- pins_arduino.h
- DoubleshockController.ino

Besides the Wireless control of vehicles there is another feature:
The controller sends serial messages to the USB port, so even without wireless module it is possible to control something like a game on your computer with the controller (Force feedback!).






What about the receiver?
This Crowdfunding project is only about the controller part, I've already developed the receiver module, but this one is not ready yet. Depending on the interest I will start a crowdfunding project later.

Of course you can also use your own boards/creations.




Specifications/features
● Arduino compatible (bootloader, programmable via usb).

● Dual force feedback.

● 2.4GHz 60mW Xbee pro module (option!).

● 2.4GHz Wi-Fi module (option!).

● Low profile pinheader to solderless attach the wireless module.

● Wireless module configuration via the usb port.

● Open hardware/software.

● 15 digital buttons.

● 2 x Analog triggers.

● 2 x Analog joysticks.

● Lipo battery 3.7V.

● usb auto charge of battery.

● Almost 0uA standby current.







There is a pinheader mounted on the bottom of the pcb! It is possible to use a pin compatible module like the "Wifly" from Sparkfun: https://www.sparkfun.com/products/10822. Please remember that there is limited height available for these modules. If you want to mount a module that needs more height, you probably have to de-solder the pinheaders and mount the module directly to the controller board, the original footprint for the modules is also available on the board.

Actual status of the project
There have already been tested three different prototypes, the current and final one is ready for production at the moment. We still need to prepare testing tools for production.









What do we need to start production?
That's where you guys come in, we want to produce a minimum of 100 controllers to be able to provide them at a reasonable cost. If we are successful and you are a supporter we try to deliver the controllers within 12 weeks.
 

What do you get?
Please see the table below:
 

Click on the table!

* The battery is only supplied with the "complete controller" perk!

If you decide to order a "pcb only" perk, you have to order an Doubleshock controller and wireless module yourself. Also you have to mount and solder the wires to the three button boards yourself (it's pretty easy if you have some soldering experience). The "pcb only" perk is that much cheaper because: we can send it in a standard mailbox package, we don't have to pay for the Doubleshock controllers, shipping costs of the controller and the manufacturing process is less time and money consuming.

If you need to order an Doubleshock controller, pick one from a Chinese website like: Alibaba, DHGate or DealExtreme. Please keep in mind that there are several versions, I will publish a list of the compatible controllers. You can't use an original controller from Sony, it won't fit! You can choose between several colors and prints, see picture:

story:
About Me

I am an hardware/software passionate that was looking for special hardware, but there was not. So I did it!

About PremoBox

PremoBox is an embedded PC featuring the follow:

  • CPU: dualcore Cortex-A7@1Ghz
  • CPU: dualcore MALI-400
  • RAM: 1GB
  • LAN: 3
  • WIFI PORTS: (up to) 2
  • USB PORTS: 5
  • INFRARED PORT: 1
  • INTERNAL STORAGE: (up to) 64GB

What PremoBox can be used for

Aside it is usable as normal PC (Office automation, web navigation, etc) the best use is for advanced features: access point, wifi repeater, mesh node, amule/torrent station, web anonymizer, firewall, etc. Presence of 5 usb port allows you to add more hardware: external memory (read: usb hard disk), wifi/bluetooth dongles, etc.

NOTE: PBCT (PremoBox Configuration Tool) is available to easily configure everything into Premobox, it can work in CLI (command Line Interface), using web or ncurses frontend. No "geek" knowledge is required to final user.

Why we need your help

At the moment only few pieces was handmade and are ready for you. PremoBox team is a small Team and if we want to make the cost of PremoBox go down, we must make a lot of boxes in one time. Get your PremoBox, spread voice around and make people to know us.

story:
The Idea.

We all have loved ones who are action sport junkies. They ride motorcycles, race bicycles, or rip down the slopes - heck, that's us! And, despite our mom's very specific instructions, we don't always go in pairs. Every so often, we take a spill that leaves us thinking "What if I was alone, and was injured more seriously?" Then we brush ourselves off and go right back at it.

Luckily, Biju Thomas opted to write down his idea and engage his friend, Dr. Tim Bauer (always nice to have a PhD buddy when you have a big idea). The two developed what has become the first personal crash sensor. Not just any crash either. This isn't for dropping your helmet or brushing a limb on the mountain - this is for serious head impacts.

The sensor mounts onto any helmet as an aftermarket device.

 

 

How It Works.

By pairing impact detection technology with the existing ICEdot service, we've been able to create a complete system that detects your most severe crashes, triggers your smart phone to notify your emergency contacts, and displays your emergency medical information. This helps first responders provide fast, accurate treatment. We also let you save and share the data of your crash – creating the world's first lie detector for your wipe outs.

The Crash Sensor pairs with your phone and is managed by the ICEdot Crash Sensor app. If the sensors detect an impact severe enough to exceed safe levels, your phone sounds an alarm and begins an emergency countdown.

If you don't disable the countdown, the app displays your emergency profile and notifies your emergency contacts.

You can disable the countdown (you can set the count down to a user defined length) if you don’t need assistance. However, if the countdown is not disabled (you may be injured or unconscious), then the app triggers an emergency notification, notifying your emergency contacts, (via text, email, or both) and providing them your GPS location.

By providing your GPS location and emergency profile, first responders have immediate access to your important medical information when you need it most.

 

 

What We Need.

We’ve gone through several prototypes to reduce size and power limitations, and now have it near production form. A few months ago, we made the decision to switch to low-energy Bluetooth (BLE), and now have a working prototype using BLE.

We need you to help us take the Crash Sensor from working prototype to final production unit, help us cover production tooling, and expand the app out across multiple mobile platforms.

We need your help. Please review the funding levels, find one that suits you, and commit. You just might save a life.

 

In The Press

The ICEdot Crash Sensor prototype announcement has already generated significant media attention. Check it out:

VeloNews 
"...a life-defining difference the next time you hit your head in a crash."

ESPN 
"ICEdot crash sensor saves lives."

Engadget 
"ICEdot and SenseTech hope to take the traditional brain bucket to new heights."

Bike Radar 
"ICEdot has a solution... (that) can provide an actual level of protection."

Gizmodo 
"This could be the perfect accessory if no one comes to your rescue after a crash."

Mashable 
"The innovative wireless sensor... can detect motion, changes in forces and impacts that occur when the rider has fallen."

Daily Mail 
"'Life saver' bike helmet connects with your phone and alerts emergency services if you are in an accident."

Gear Junkie 
"Helmet Sensor 'Calls Your Loved Ones' in a Bike Crash"

Gizmag 
"Not just for cyclists, the ICEdot Crash Sensor is aimed at snowboarders, skiers, mountain-bikers, or really anyone participating in risky activities."

 

 

 

The Rewards.

$5 or more
Periodic project updates and a giant Thank You!

$25 or more
ICEdot Band (silicone wristband) and 1-Year ICEdot membership

$50 or more
THE ICE PACK: ICEdot Band + 1 year membership + T-Shirt + Snap + Sticker Pack

$60 or more
A MYSTERY ITEM + ICE PACK (ICEdot Band + 1 year membership + T-Shirt + Snap + Stickers)

$75 or more
THE FEED ZONE + ICE PACK (ICEdot Band + 1 year membership + T-Shirt + Snap + Stickers)

$150 or more
Crash Sensor earlybird special + your name in the Credits section of the mobile app

$200 or more
Crash Sensor + your name in the Credits section of the app

$350 or more
ICEdot Cycling Jersey + ICE PACK + Crash Sensor

$1,600 or more

Boulder, Colorado ride with pro cyclist Lucas Euser + Meal from world-class chef Biju Thomas + ICE PACK + Crash Sensor

$10,000 or more (Call the office line, ask for Casey)

You definitely have our attention. And probably a T-shirt or two.

 
 

 

Frequently Asked Questions.


What if I don't have cell service?

The system is designed to use cell service when it calls for help. The sensor will still send the data about your impact to the phone and the phone will make repeated attempts to send out alerts but if no signal is available, no alerts will go out.

 

What if I don't ride/ski alone?

Do you know the medical conditions of the people you ride/ski with? How to contact their loved ones if they were in an accident? Would they know yours? The Crash Sensor will ensure that your loved ones are contacted immediately, and your emergency medical information is known by first responders when it counts.

 

How sensitive is it? Is this thing going to be going off all the time when I drop my helmet in the garage?

The sensor is not so sensitive a dropped helmet is going to cause it to go off. In fact, the only drops that are going to trigger it are ones you should consider replacing your helmet for.

 

If I'm in an accident, won't my phone break too?

We've been in accidents and had friends in accidents where the phone is how EMS notified family, calling the last dialed number. Phones are generally carried on the body and often in places that don't take a direct impact.

 

How many crashes is it "good for"? Will I have to buy a new one after each crash?

There is no limit to the number of times the sensor can be used. It detects forces your head experiences, it does not require a direct impact to the sensor itself.

 

If my phone is in my backpack or elsewhere and the device accidentally goes off, how will I know? Does the phone or device make a sound?

The phone sounds an alarm and vibrates.

 

Will the device drain my battery?

The app runs on your phone but is not in a constant broadcast or streaming mode, it's essentially waiting for a message from the sensor. We've had success running the app for more than 8 hours in our testing without noticeably effecting battery life beyond normal phone usage.

 

How is the device powered?

The final product will use a USB rechargeable, Lithium-Ion battery. Our current prototypes use a replaceable battery.

 

How long does the battery last before it needs to be recharged? Does it 'warn' you when it is getting low on power?

The app wil be able to let you know the power level of the sensor and can warn you when it is low. The device uses low energy bluetooth (BLE) which was designed for applications such as these, reducing battery drain by over 1/3. According to Texas Instruments, maker of BLE, a device can last over a year on a single coin sized battery.

 

Does this work internationally?

Yes.

 

Can the sensor be moved between helmets? How does it attach?

Yes. The final attaching mechanism is not finalized but will facilitate helmet transfer without being overly easy to remove.

 

Will the sensor be limited to iPhone?

No, our prototypes are working with iPhone but we will release an Android version when the product is shipped.

The app runs on your phone but is not in a constant broadcast or streaming mode, it's essentially waiting for a message from the sensor. We've had success running the app for more than 8 hours in our testing without noticeably effecting battery life beyond normal phone usage.
 
How is the device powered?
The final product will use a USB rechargeable, Lithium-Ion battery. Our current prototypes use a replaceable battery.
 
How long does the battery last before it needs to be recharged? Does it 'warn' you when it is getting low on power?

The app wil be able to let you know the power level of the sensor and can warn you when it is low. The device uses low energy bluetooth (BLE) which was designed for applications such as these, reducing battery drain by over 1/3. According to Texas Instruments, maker of BLE, a device can last over a year on a single coin sized battery.
 
Does this work internationally?
Yes.
 
Can the sensor be moved between helmets? How does it attach?
Yes. The final attaching mechanism is not finalized but will facilitate helmet transfer without being overly easy to remove.
 
Will the sensor be limited to iPhone?
No, our prototypes are working with iPhone but we will release an Android version when the product is shipped.

story:
Pokécase

Because we LOVE the mobile game, Pokémon Go, we decided to design the casing as a real life Pokédex. We hope there are more Pokémon-fans out there, that would like to help us fund this amazing dream of ours.

Our plan

We are in the early stages of developing the product, and we will share the whole journey with you here on Indiegogo.

Right now we are testing the different prototypes. We are looking for the perfect size/weight distribution, and still fit the batteries. The final prototype will be ready 2 weeks in to the campaign. Updates will follow as we reaches our milestones.

If we reach our funding goal, we will start the process of massproducing the casing right away.
See the perks-section to find out how you can get first in line.

Response so far

Pokémon Go finaly made our childhood dream a reality. Now we finaly have the opportunity to go out in the world and catch 'em all! The only thing we are missing now is the real life Pokédex.

The response have been enormous when we have pitched the idea in closed forums. We are  now finally are ready to pitch the idea for the rest of the world! And we hope that the response from all of you will be as good.

Risks & Challenges

The only big challenge we have left is optimizing the battery capasity within the limits of the casing size and budget. We don't want to charge to much for our product, because we would like it to be available for as many Pokémon fans as possible.

We are very optimistic about this now, and there are just a matter of weeks before have placed the last pieces of the puzzle.
 

Social media strategy

We do not have a large marketing budget. In addition to backing our project, we will ask you to share our campaign in social media.

With captions like:
"Tag a friend who would buy this!"
"Take a look at this! Like if you are buying this!"
"What a great idea! I'm buying this."

Or anything else you think is suitable for getting the word around.
