story:
Summary
Hi, we are Mechatronics Engineers who are folks of Ivmech and this is Ivport, the first Raspberry Pi (also Raspberry Pi B+ and ODROID-W compatible) Camera Module multiplexer designed to connect more than one camera to Raspberry Pi.

We have finished designing a hardware camera multiplexer for the Raspberry Pi. It has 1 CSI connectors for the input and 4 CSI connectors for outputs to the camera modules with using flex cables. Also it has stacking headers for the GPIO connection and self stacking up to 4 Ivport.

What we need & What you get

Ivport is a real and functioning product already. The PCB has been prototyped and works great. It can switch camera input even while video is streaming over RTSP.  But in order to manufacture these for a reasonable price, we need your help to place a large enough order to get a volume discount. Besides minimum order quantities there are fixed tooling costs associated with building up a new PCB assembly that I need help with.

There are some different videos while switching view source between 4 different raspberry pi cameras with using IVPort module. Bottom right corner video shows switching camera input while capturing video.




There are 4 cameras which are connected to Raspberry Pi via IVPort module.



By pledging your support for Ivport, we can can order enough units to keep costs low and we'll be able to cover the one-time tooling charges associated with assembling a new circuit board.

The Impact

Multiplex the number of usable camera module on Raspberry Pi from 1 to 4 with using one Ivport. It can multiplex from 1 to 16 with using 4 Ivport with stack.

Multiplexing can be controlled by 3 pins for 4 camera modules, 5 pins for 8 camera modules and 9 pins for 16 camera modules with using GPIO and external script library that written by Python.



Connectors: 15 Pin FFC CSI
Pinout: RaspberryPi CSI Connector Camera Pinouts
Protocol: MIPI

Propagation Delay between input and output: 0.5 ns

Switching Time from one channel to other channel: 50 ns (it can increase with depending to GPIO delay)

Risk & Challenges

Raspberry Pi GPU is not open sourced therefore camera input will be supposed as only one camera is connected. It will be hard to implement more than one camera support into library. But it is worth the effort.

story:
What is TRiCKtrac?

TRiCKtrac is an amazing new tool that allows you to use your iPad, iPhone or iPod Touch as a multi-touch track-pad bringing gestures such as pinch-zoom, swipe, and tap-click to your PC or Mac and also allows you to transfer files to and from your desktop or laptop with a simple "SWIPE" motion!

What makes it possible?

iDevices as well as most other phones and tablets typically only use audio Bluetooth systems such as headphones or headsets. Data transfer is not possible. To get around this I created the iTooth. This little dongle plugs into one of your computer's USB ports and looks like an audio device to your Bluetooth enabled iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch but looks like a standard data Bluetooth device to your computer. For the small amount of data we need to transmit for track-pad use it works quite well.

Easy to use?

This patented, simple and smooth software tool uses Bluetooth to communicate the pointer position and gestures to your computer. It also uses Wi-Fi for file transfers. It is simple to connect, just click on the "TT" icon and select your computer in the device list.

Mouse and track-Pad function:

Drag your finger around in the portal and watch your mouse pointer on your computer do the same. Pinch images to zoom and tap to select files, just like your iDevice. 

File Transfer:

Want to move a file from your desktop on your computer to your iPad? No problem! Just select the file on your computer and drag it to the edge of your screen. A file bar will appear on your iPad. Just release the file into the bar by picking up your finger and the file drops onto your iPad and is saved to the directory.

Switch computers if you like and drag the same file from your iDevice onto another computer. You always get the option to copy or move the file when you drag them to or from another computer.

Software versions available:

TRiCKtrac works with Windows and Mac and will really help you get the most from your Windows 8 when it comes out. It supports iPad, iPhone and iPod-Touch and is available in two versions… TRiCKtrac and TRiCKtrac+. TRiCKtrac allows you to control your PC or Mac mouse-pointer with multi-touch functionality. TRiCKtrac+ can do the same plus it includes the ability transfer files to and from your     computer with a simple SWIPE and DROP action.


What do the contributions pay for:

So far I have done a feasibility study to make sure the software and iTooth device can be done.  I have simulated the features and patented the idea. When this project is successfully funded I will create the full versions of the software, with help from my programming team. I will also have the tooling made for the plastics and printed circuit board for the iTooth dongle.

Want a little more?:

Well how about a bamboo cover for your iPhone 4/4S or iPad 2/3 including the subtle TRiCKtrac logo elegantly laser etched into the bamboo made right here in the US, from sustainable bamboo. Take a look at these gorgeous covers below and the rewards levels to your right!

story:
What Is HardwareCloud?

HardwareCloud is an online service to control your favourite microcontroller & computer platforms remotely, from anywhere in the world. It is now aimed to be compatible with the Arduino platform & the Raspberry Pi, but we will add more platforms in the future.

Who Is It For?

HardwareCloud was made by makers, for makers. If you are a maker, hacker or electronics hobbyist, you will love using this online service. It will easily adapt with your already existing projects, and in no time you will be able to completely control your projects remotely via our online interface. And because our API is open, you can also develop your own applications that uses our service.

But even if you are just starting with your own DIY projects, you can use HardwareCloud to experiment with connected projects & the Internet of Things. It so easy to use and to set up that it can be a great addition to your projects even if you are a beginner.

HardwareCloud is also great for professionals and small businesses that want to limit their costs when deploying devices that have to be controlled & monitored remotely, such as in agricultural applications.

Also note that HardwareCloud doesn't need any specific hardware: if you have an Arduino board that can connect to the Internet (for example via a WiFi shield), you're good to go. For the Raspberry Pi, you simply need to connect your Pi to the Internet via Ethernet or WiFi.

What Can You Do With It ?

The applications of HardwareCloud only depends on your own imagination, but we identified three domains of possible applications: home automation, sensor networks, and robotics.

The first application is how course home automation. With HardwareCloud, you can create your own home automation dashboard to control your home remotely. You can very easily monitor sensors inside your home, like the temperature & humidity. You can also control lamps remotely, for example to activate your lamps just before coming back home. And using the Raspberry Pi camera module, you can also monitor what's going on in your home. The following animation shows the project in action with a basic home automation project:

Then, HardwareCloud is also great to monitor sensor networks. For example, you have several Arduino-based sensors deployed in a building, and you want to monitor them remotely. This is really easy to do with HardwareCloud. And because it works both ways, you can also acts on the environment based on the monitored data.

Finally, HardwareCloud is also reactive enough to be a great companion for your robots & drones projects. You can for example plug an Arduino board with WiFi to your mobile robot, connect it to HardwareCloud, and start moving it around from anywhere in the world. The following animation shows a basic control a mobile robot based on Arduino:

How Does It Work?

Using HardwareCloud is really simple. You simply need to create a new device in the app interface, download the corresponding code from our servers, and modify this code with your own settings (for example your WiFi name and password in case you are using WiFi).

Then, upload the code to your device, and you are done. You will then see that the device will be accessible from your Devices page, and you can then control them directly as shown in the following animation:

The other thing you can do based on your devices is to create what we call Dashboards. Dashboards can integrate several devices in the same page, so you can control them on a higher level. You can for example have a Dashboard for your whole home that integrates several Arduino boards.

As an example, the following animation shows the creation of a simple Dashboard dedicated to home automation:

Why Is It Better Than Other Solutions?

HardwareCloud is better than already existing solutions on several points. The most important feature being that it works both ways. Let's see what this means. Many other services allows you to send data from a board to the cloud, and monitor this data remotely. HardwareCloud however also allows you to control your devices and act on their environment, for example to switch on a lamp or move a robot around.

HardwareCloud is also multi-platform at heart: you can use it from any computer or mobile device as it is a web application, and it also supports multiple devices that you can control, like Arduino and the Raspberry Pi.

HardwareCloud also features a beautiful REST API, so it is really easy to develop your own applications based on our service.

What Do You Get For Supporting The Project?

If you support the development of HardwareCloud, you will get one year of subscription to our service with the plan of your choice, depending on which perk you selected to support us.

Your money will be used to finish the development of the application, and later to support the maintenance & future updates of the application. We put a monthly subscription model in place to pay for the hosting of the online application, plus the maintenance costs & development of new features in the future. However, the API itself is and will remain open-source.

What Is Already Done.

HardwareCloud is currently in development, and the core features of the application are already done. You can for example already control Arduino boards & Raspberry Pi's from anywhere in the world, and integrate them into dashboards.

The devices part is fully functional, and it's really easy to add a new device or delete an existing device from an account. You can also already configure and modify your dashboards for various applications.

What Still Needs To Be Done.

The funds from this campaign will be used to make the application usable by all and to improve HardwareCloud on three main points: user experience, security, and automation.

The first point that needs to be improved is the user experience. First, we need to make it easier to add/delete devices & dashboards. We want to integrate a drag & drop system for the dashboards so they will be even easier to build. We also need to make it easier to configure your devices once you downloaded the software or Arduino sketch from the HardwareCloud interface.

Then, we will also focus on the security aspect. Nobody wants their garage door opened by somebody else from the web, and we take security aspects very seriously for this application. We need funds to improve the security of the application and to make sure that your devices can be controlled by you and you only. 

Finally, we also want to make the user experience by proposing some automation feature to the application. For example, you would like to automatically send you an alert when motion is detected in your home, even if you are not looking at the application on your mobile device. Or you want to activate a pump automatically when the measured humidity of a soil is getting low.

Frequently Asked Questions

  • What is a 'device' in the different plans available?
    A device is a given board you connect to HardwareCloud: it can be an Arduino board (Uno/Due/Micro/etc) or a Raspberry Pi.

  • What about Bluetooth, ZigBee or RF devices? Can I also connect them to HardwareCloud?
    This is a feature planned in the development of the application after this campaign. You will be able to connect these devices to a 'Hub' that will be connected to HardwareCloud via WiFi or Ethernet.

  • Will I be able to define triggers, for example to automatically activate a heater when the measured temperature falls below a given value?
    This is also a feature we want to integrate in the application after the campaign is over, so it will be no problem to create such triggers.

Can't Support The Project? No Worries.

You can also help us simply by spreading the word around, for example by sharing this page with your friends!

story:
This is Rubico!

A practical, reliable and charming power bank, which quickly and effectively solves problems with the low battery and low memory storage for your smartphone. Rubico is the perfect solution when you need that extra boost of power, while on-the-go.

 

What makes RUBICO unique?

Rubico is a unique multifunctional product because it represents a compound of a battery charger for smartphones, USB memory storage and an NFC tag. Instead of carrying around all these multiple devices,  replace it with Rubico – one device that includes them all.  Rubico is small, durable, very practical and easy to use. It is perfect for use on travelling and outdoor activities.

* Prototype picture. All pictures shown are for illustration purpose only. Actual product may vary due to product enhancement.

Unique design, nice appearance, very light and easy to carry!

When it comes to the size,  we can compare it with a fidget spinner, which makes it very easy to wear it on your keyring or in your pocket.

* Prototype picture. All pictures shown are for illustration purpose only. Actual product may vary due to product enhancement.

The product comes with a mobile application that allows users to easily transfer data from a mobile device to smart keychain, monitoring the amount of free memory, as well as the ability to record videos and photos direct to the smart keychain.

* Prototype picture. All pictures shown are for illustration purpose only. Actual product may vary due to product enhancement.

Exactly defined battery power, small size, quality of workmanship, are just some of the Rubico smart keychain's benefits. Due to the problems that people face every day, Rubico has come as a simple and functional solution.

With Amplius Rubico smart keychain you will never find yourself in a situation of holding a drained or “out-of-memory” mobile phone.

 

An idea was born in April 2015 when our team members started facing problems with the dead battery and lack of free space on their smartphones.

We had a lot of luck because our idea was recognised and evaluated by the many experts from various fields, who work in SPARK business park, currently one of the best business and IT incubators in our country.

* Prototype picture. All pictures shown are for illustration purpose only. Actual product may vary due to product enhancement.

Our idea was to develop a multifunctional device, that is small and easy to use. The design of the product was supposed to be compact and practical and we are proud to say that Rubico is truly all of that.

With a help of our manufacturing partners, we currently have a working prototype and our next goal is preparation for the final design and getting product certification.

We could not archieve any of the results we do without their support. We could not reach any of the goals we had and have without their support.

 

In the hustle of modern everyday life, each of us has encountered some of these problems:

  • You are always in need of a USB stick, but it is not always at hand.
  • You want to install a cool new mobile app, but there is not enough memory on your smartphone.
  • You want to record a video or take a photo but again there is a problem with the storage.
  • Your smartphone runs out of battery just when your crush finally texts back.

Now, we can't even remember the last time we actually didn't use our smartphone for a whole day. AND, there is nothing worse than looking down at your phone and realising the battery is running out of juice, isn't it?

Use RUBICO to boost your phone ON THE GO!

It easily fits into your backpack, purse, or simply wear it on your keyring or in your pocket.

Rubico allows you to recharge your smartphone when you’re out, so you can talk, listen to music, text, take photos or videos and surf longer.

* Prototype picture. All pictures shown are for illustration purpose only. Actual product may vary due to product enhancement.


If you connect your smartphone with Rubico, the battery immediately starts to charge and you are able to free up your memory by transferring photos or files on the Rubico.


* Prototype picture. All pictures shown are for illustration purpose only. Actual product may vary due to product enhancement.

If you connect Rubico to the computer it turns into USB Stick. It is compatible with any computer and can read any MicroSD Card. Information can be transferred directly, but also through a mobile application available on Google Play, which allows users to transfer data from a mobile device to Rubico, monitoring the amount of free memory, as well as the ability to record videos and photos directly to the smart keychain.

 

Currently we have a fully functional prototype. Funds for this project will be used  to finish hardware and software development. We will need to purchase electronic parts, finish production sample tests, and begin the production of the first series of smart keychains and launch it into the international market. We will make first delivery to backers by the end of the year.

Free shipping for the USA, $5 shipping worldwide!

  • From USA warehouse
  • Worldwide shipping
  • Premium express courier shipping
  • Tracking code included

 



Each and every one of our team members represent the spirit of our company: driven, committed people who care a lot about „getting it done“ and the relationships we build. We at Amplius electronics are dedicated team players who bring energy, ideas and pride to work. We view Amplius electronics as a competitive advantage and strive to create an environment where smart, motivated and creative people succeed. People tell as we are down-to-earth, approachable and fun. We support and are supported to develop our own personal result stories. We work hard, but enjoy what we do.

Amplius electronics team members:

Luka Vučina - Founder, CEO, Hardware Engineer
Marin Bevanda - Founder, Project Manager & Graphic Designer
Robert Rozić - Co-Founder, Web & Mobile Developer
Irma Isak - Marketing & Copywriting
Sara Lerota, Ivona Ćorić - Startup Coaches
Renato Kristić - Electronic System Engineer
Borko Latinčić - Mechanical Engineer
Aleksandar Šutić - Prototype Engineer
Dalibor Baković, Daniela Marić - Legal Advisors
Goran Stojkić - Indiegogo video
Lana Stojkić - Video voice
Marin Ćorić, Martin Mikulić - 3D Designers
Adnan Puzić - Graphic design

and Albert Gajšak, Nikolina Zeljko, Marko Zeljko, Ante Medić, Matija Tolić, Iva Đikić, Luka Piškorić, Andrej Alilović, Nikša Alilović, Matej Ćubela, Dario Knezović, Vinko Soldo, Josip Krešić, Ivan Cvitković, Petar Karačić, Ivan Cvjetković, Pavo Odak, Jure Stanić, Antonio Šunjić, Ivan Tuljo, Ante Bušić, Darko Krezić, Mensur Đogić, Mladen Bruck, Mate Stojić, Danijel Šalja, Dominik Ćorić, SPARK business park who helped us in many ways.

We would like to thank the whole team for their effort and enthusiasm.

 

 

Our team has worked on the Rubico smart chain for the past two years and we are really excited to launch it via Indiegogo.

The prototype, which now exists is functional and ready for further process development. Our next goal is the transition from the prototype stage into serial production.

For the realisation of our ideas, our team has put a lot of effort and knowledge, because we want RUBICO to become interesting, and at the same time high-quality product that you will hold in your hand.

Each project may encounter some unforeseen circumstances. Therefore, we can’t guarantee that we will not have some of the difficulties such are technical or time problems, that can arise during production, testing or final delivery to our backers. However, we can promise you that we will try to minimise these difficulties as much as we can.

The biggest challenge we might face with is a delay with the supply of electronic components who are shipped by our suppliers from other countries, which could cause delays in our product deliveries. But we do our best to work closely with them and warn them to keep up with deadlines. So, when it comes to the shipping, we will do our best to estimate every delivery into the timeline.

We sincerely hope that people like our project and we can not wait for to Rubico become your favourite smartphone gadget, too.


When will I receive my Rubico ?

Currently, we are planning to ship Rubico as soon as our campaign and production is over in October  2017.

Where do you ship to?

We use major courier/post companies and will ship worldwide.

How do I choose color?

You can select the color of your preference at the end of the campaign. We will send out our surveys.

Is shipping included?

Worldwide Shipping is $5 and not included in the product price. 

Is there a warranty for the Rubico?  

Yes, the Rubico comes with a one-year replacement warranty.

How to use Rubico as a memory card reader?

First insert SD (memory) card into the memory card slot. Then connect the Rubico into the computer via USB cable. The memory card function will only work with your computer and your Android smartphone. 

Rubico for Android technical specification :

- battery capacity of 1500mAh with output of 5V / max 2.1A 
- extended high quality data/charge cable
- memory card reader up to 64 GB
- dimensions 65mm x 45mm x 18mm 
- weight 80g 
- micro USB connector

Does it support iOS devices?

Unfortunately, Rubico's memory port doesn't support iOS devices as of now, but you can still use it as a powerbank and NFC tag. In the near future we are planning to extend memory support to iOS devices. 

What's included in the package except Rubico?

Depending on your perk, we include a 16GB SD card, special high-end charging cable that can be used for reading memory (OTG support).

Which Android phones support Rubico's memory capability?

Most Android phones built in and after 2015 have OTG support. You can check if your phone has OTG support on various web sites and apps (eg. OTG checker).

 

If you wish to contact us:

E-Mail: info@amplius.tech

Website: www.amplius.tech

Social Media:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AmpliusElectronics

Instagram:  https://www.instagram.com/amplius_electronics/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/Amplius_e

MEDIA KIT: http://bit.ly/Media_Amplius

This is Rubico!A practical, reliable and charming power bank, which quickly and effectively solves problems with the low battery and low memory storage for your smartphone. Rubico is the perfect solution when you need that extra boost of power, while on-the-go. What makes RUBICO unique?Rubico is a unique multifunctional product because it represents a compound of a battery charger for smartphones, USB memory storage and an NFC tag. Instead of carrying around all these multiple devices,  replace it with Rubico – one device that includes them all.  Rubico is small, durable, very practical and easy to use. It is perfect for use on travelling and outdoor activities.* Prototype picture. All pictures shown are for illustration purpose only. Actual product may vary due to product enhancement.Unique design, nice appearance, very light and easy to carry!When it comes to the size,  we can compare it with a fidget spinner, which makes it very easy to wear it on your keyring or in your pocket.* Prototype picture. Due to the problems that people face every day, Rubico has come as a simple and functional solution.With Amplius Rubico smart keychain you will never find yourself in a situation of holding a drained or “out-of-memory” mobile phone. An idea was born in April 2015 when our team members started facing problems with the dead battery and lack of free space on their smartphones.We had a lot of luck because our idea was recognised and evaluated by the many experts from various fields, who work in SPARK business park, currently one of the best business and IT incubators in our country.* Prototype picture. All pictures shown are for illustration purpose only. Actual product may vary due to product enhancement.Our idea was to develop a multifunctional device, that is small and easy to use. The design of the product was supposed to be compact and practical and we are proud to say that Rubico is truly all of that.With a help of our manufacturing partners, we currently have a working prototype and our next goal is preparation for the final design and getting product certification.We could not archieve any of the results we do without their support. We could not reach any of the goals we had and have without their support. In the hustle of modern everyday life, each of us has encountered some of these problems:
You are always in need of a USB stick, but it is not always at hand.
You want to install a cool new mobile app, but there is not enough memory on your smartphone.
You want to record a video or take a photo but again there is a problem with the storage.
Your smartphone runs out of battery just when your crush finally texts back.
Now, we can't even remember the last time we actually didn't use our smartphone for a whole day. AND, there is nothing worse than looking down at your phone and realising the battery is running out of juice, isn't it?Use RUBICO to boost your phone ON THE GO!It easily fits into your backpack, purse, or simply wear it on your keyring or in your pocket.Rubico allows you to recharge your smartphone when you’re out, so you can talk, listen to music, text, take photos or videos and surf longer.* Prototype picture. All pictures shown are for illustration purpose only. story:
PROTECT young children from leaving the house without your knowledge. If you are a caregiver for an elderly with dementia, our DOOR ALARM will notify you whenever the door is opened. The door alarm also activates if anyone enters from the outside.

This PORTABLE door knob alarm is powered by a 9 volt battery and will attach to any knob or handle in the world in seconds. Nothing drains the battery until the siren is sounding.

Our mission is to protect TODDLERS, ELDERLY and other "WANDERERS" and deter intruders with an alarm that activates when the door knob is turned.

The ON-OFF switch is for general security to keep intruders out.

The KEYED switch will keep intruders out and keep "wanderers" from leaving, because it cannot be turned off without the key. The caregiver keeps control of the key.

YOUR SUPPORT will protect toddlers and other wanderers in families who CANNOT AFFORD the high monthly alarm monitoring fees. This alarm has NO MONTHLY MONITORING FEES.

I was born on a small farm in Pennsylvania. During college, I earned an Associate's Degree in Electronic Systems Technology and gained 40+ years experience in prototyping, troubleshooting and repair.

The need for these alarms surfaced when my mother developed dementia and we worried that she would wander off. When dad started using these alarms, mom resented the idea. When we explained that it was a home security system, she liked the idea.

It is important that we get the word out to people who will benefit from these alarms. That is where I need your support. The money will be used to purchace infomercials and equipment. This will cost a minimum of $35,000.

The manufacturing process is flowchated, time studies are complete, vendors are waiting for orders and the distribution channels are ready. I believe all problems that could delay this project have been addressed and I am confident that we can deliver in a timely manner.

THE PRICELESS GIFT OF SAFETY AND SECURITY CAN BE YOURS!

story:
Ferret is a privately developed web based application that allows you to gather your online photos and turn them into high quality books.

 It's that simple!

 

We've asked around and found that when making a photobook, people are often frustrated by the time, expense, and complexity of the process.

We believed there was a better way, so Ferret was born.

1. Fast- He can create your photobook in as little as 5-7 minutes

2. Easy- With just a few clicks Ferret can take your favorite photos from your favorite social media accounts (Facebook, Instagram, Picasa, Flickr...) and turn them into photobooks that will last FOREVER!

3. Affordable- Because of his cool friends, Ferret can deliver a BETTER product for LESS money than other photobook companies.

 

You no longer have to chase down the great photos that others took of your special occasions. If you're tagged in a photo on facebook, Ferret will gather that photo as well from your friends and family. Sweet!
 
 

 You already did all the work of sorting and cropping your best photos when you put them up to facebook. You save time with Ferret because you don't have to do all that work over again. Phew!

 

These books are perfect gifts for teenagers to give to their friends on their birthdays or at graduations. Ferret knows that many teenagers don't have a credit card (even though he takes nearly every card known to man). That is why he also takes debit card transactions through Interac Online. Nice!

  

Remember the old fashied way? - actual photo albums with pictures you developed at the store and slipped into the sleves? Even if you don't, you can bet grandma and grandpa do!
 
These books are the new version of photo albums - quick, simple, and stylish. 
 
Now seniors on facebook don't have to look at tiny digital photos, but can have a REAL book with their favorite family photos.
 
Not only that, but this is a perfect gift to those grandparents who are NOT on facebook.

 

 

We had to make allowance in this goal for fulfilling your awesome perks as well as the fees we need to pay to the payment processors and to Indiegogo. This accounts for more than half of our goal. The rest of the funds will be used to make a high security bridge between Ferret's photo engine and the front user interface of our website...because Ferret takes security very seriously.
 

With an estimated 9.5 billion new photos being uploaded to Facebook, Flickr, Picasa, Instagram, and Twitter every month, the big question is what do we do with them?

Ferret Takes all your images from online and turns them into tangible keepsakes that will last forever.

 

To deliver you the quality and price that you deserve, we've connected with one of the largest one-off printers in the planet and we'll be printing right here in America.

However, there is a catch.

In order  to ensure the best possible price we need to hit a minimum order volume.  Our team consists of some of the smartest software developers and designers  around. But in order for Ferret to "get to work"  we need your support.  We need at least 8,000 pre-orders to open the door to let Ferret out.  With those 8,000 orders Ferret will have the freedom to get out and  collect your images from your favorite social media sites, your PC or  even your smartphone.

Many photobook companies out there are using outdated software which requires you to download it to your desktop before even beginning a book. This process is laborious and slow. We know your time is precious and that's why our brilliant programmers have created Ferret- a brand new software which is specifically designed to interface with your favorite social media site and quickLy turn your photos into photobook keepsakes which you'll be able to keep forever


Our timeline puts Ferret on track to deliver your perks in August or September - depending on the perk. In Plenty of time for the holiday season.


MAKE A PLEDGE FOR FERRET TURN YOUR

FACEBOOK INTO A PHOTOBOOK!

story:
Introducing the ENOS One

Enos One is an affordable high-end smartphone with a beautiful design, a great display, and solid performance. A powerful, convenient smartphone based on Android 9.0.

Some Specs :

  • Works with LTE and GSM networks, including Verizon and Sprint. Support Dual 4G LTE 
  • 6.2" Notched Display 
  • In-Display Fingerprint Sensor 
  • Octa-Core CPU 
  • Dual Rear Camera
  • USB-C
  • 6GB Ram / 128GB Rom
  • Support NFC

 

The prices of smartphones in the last five years have skyrocketed, a high-end smartphone will cost around 1000$... And this is way too much. Because big companies invest a considerable amount of money in advertising and on the marketing of their product, the customer ends up paying way more than the real cost of the phone. 

Enos simply wanted to create an Affordable High-End Smartphone

A video by TechAltar that explains why flagship smartphones are not the most convenient phones for everyday use anymore.

A Long-lasting Battery  

The One is powered by a huge 3850 mAh battery along with optimized energy saving management, you can enjoy an absolute experience without a break.

Delicately Designed  

The Enos One is made from Glass and has a stainless-steel frame, it simply looks as bright as a precious piece of art. With an incredible screen-to-body ratio of 90%. Every part of the phone is delicately designed making it fit your hand perfectly.

In-Display Fingerprint Scanner 

With an optical fingerprint sensor hidden beneath the display, Enos One In-Display Fingerprint Scanning technology can accurately identify you. With a recognition speed of about 0.2, the fingerprint scanner achieves fast and accurate recognition, allowing you access to your phone instantly.

 

Display    

With its 6.2″ large display ultra-high screen to body radio, Enos One offers unprecedented visual perception. The moment you light the phone screen, you will find that this should be the real full screen.

 

Take the Perfect Selfie 

Enos One has a 16MP front camera which makes your selfie look like the work of art with an optimized facial beauty algorithm, enabling you to take selfies with extraordinary clear and natural skin tone. Enos One improves the brightness, the color vibrancy, clarity, and the dynamic range. Even in the dimmest environment, it performs well. Whenever you need it, your One is right there with you, capturing every moment with crystal-clear precision. Turn your selfies into masterpieces and shine in every photo

Advanced Security Face Unlock  

Your face is the new Key,

Enos One uses a new Face ID technology, with a 16.0MP front camera that is capable of identifying nearly 3000 facial features. The recognition process is as fast as 0.2 seconds, it completes the screen unlock at the moment the screen lights up. It’s rather secure and rapid. Furthermore, it's designed to work indoors, outdoors, and even in darkness.

Fast Wireless Charging 

Enos One uses Qi wireless charging technology, the Enos official wireless charger can offer fast wireless charging. Your phone can be fully charged in less than 80 minutes.

Powerful Performance  

The Enos One is equipped with an octa-core processor clocked at 2.0GHz paired with massive 6GB of RAM, which delivers premium performance at lightning speed. In combination with carefully optimized software, it can always work at peak performance. Even when running many apps at the same time, the Enos One is speedy enough to keep up with you whether you’re gaming, taking photos, or watching videos. 

We are a group of smartphone enthusiasts and experts who aim to provide you with a new smartphone, a phone for you to enjoy without any compromise. We have put all our efforts into this area for quite a few years and have developed a working prototype. After putting such a lot of effort into developing Enos One, we want to control its cost and make it affordable to everyone. Mass production is our next big step to be able to control the cost, so we need your support to start our first mass production run.  

We will offer a full 12-month international manufacturer warranty included for parts and labor from the moment you receive your device. In a case where your device needs service, we'll ask you to ship the device back to us for examination. If after the examination the device has a defect, the buyer will get his device repaired free of charge The buyer must pay for return shipping. Our number one intention is to keep you happy and satisfied. You are always welcome to contact us, and we'll personally provide an adequate solution to your problem.

6GB Ram / 128GB Rom
Support NFC
 The prices of smartphones in the last five years have skyrocketed, a high-end smartphone will cost around 1000$... And this is way too much. Because big companies invest a considerable amount of money in advertising and on the marketing of their product, the customer ends up paying way more than the real cost of the phone. Enos simply wanted to create an Affordable High-End SmartphoneA video by TechAltar that explains why flagship smartphones are not the most convenient phones for everyday use anymore.A Long-lasting Battery  The One is powered by a huge 3850 mAh battery along with optimized energy saving management, you can enjoy an absolute experience without a break.Delicately Designed  The Enos One is made from Glass and has a stainless-steel frame, it simply looks as bright as a precious piece of art. With an incredible screen-to-body ratio of 90%. Every part of the phone is delicately designed making it fit your hand perfectly.In-Display Fingerprint Scanner With an optical fingerprint sensor hidden beneath the display, Enos One In-Display Fingerprint Scanning technology can accurately identify you. With a recognition speed of about 0.2, the fingerprint scanner achieves fast and accurate recognition, allowing you access to your phone instantly. Display    With its 6.2″ large display ultra-high screen to body radio, Enos One offers unprecedented visual perception. The moment you light the phone screen, you will find that this should be the real full screen. Take the Perfect Selfie Enos One has a 16MP front camera which makes your selfie look like the work of art with an optimized facial beauty algorithm, enabling you to take selfies with extraordinary clear and natural skin tone. Enos One improves the brightness, the color vibrancy, clarity, and the dynamic range. Even in the dimmest environment, it performs well. Whenever you need it, your One is right there with you, capturing every moment with crystal-clear precision. Turn your selfies into masterpieces and shine in every photoAdvanced Security Face Unlock  Your face is the new Key,Enos One uses a new Face ID technology, with a 16.0MP front camera that is capable of identifying nearly 3000 facial features. The recognition process is as fast as 0.2 seconds, it completes the screen unlock at the moment the screen lights up. It’s rather secure and rapid. Furthermore, it's designed to work indoors, outdoors, and even in darkness.Fast Wireless Charging Enos One uses Qi wireless charging technology, the Enos official wireless charger can offer fast wireless charging. Your phone can be fully charged in less than 80 minutes.Powerful Performance  The Enos One is equipped with an octa-core processor clocked at 2.0GHz paired with massive 6GB of RAM, which delivers premium performance at lightning speed. In combination with carefully optimized software, it can always work at peak performance. Even when running many apps at the same time, the Enos One is speedy enough to keep up with you whether you’re gaming, taking photos, or watching videos. We are a group of smartphone enthusiasts and experts who aim to provide you with a new smartphone, a phone for you to enjoy without any compromise. We have put all our efforts into this area for quite a few years and have developed a working prototype. After putting such a lot of effort into developing Enos One, we want to control its cost and make it affordable to everyone. Mass production is our next big step to be able to control the cost, so we need your support to start our first mass production run.  We will offer a full 12-month international manufacturer warranty included for parts and labor from the moment you receive your device. In a case where your device needs service, we'll ask you to ship the device back to us for examination. If after the examination the device has a defect, the buyer will get his device repaired free of charge The buyer must pay for return shipping. Our number one intention is to keep you happy and satisfied. You are always welcome to contact us, and we'll personally provide an adequate solution to your problem.

story:
For an excellent demonstration on the Chrono Case features, please check out the video above.


June 18 update – New iPhone 5 PERK added!! Due to high demand, iPhone 5 version of the Chrono Case will be availiable in the flagship PRIME Edition with Black Chrome. Limited to 1000 only. (Estimated delivery will be 2 months after iPhone 5 is offically release).

 

Apple iPhone Blog - "the Ferrari of iPhone cases"

The Gadgeteer - Amers: "I think THIS will be the only case I’ll need – it’s adult, it’s good looking, it’s functional.”

TigerStartups - "the ultimate end-all-be-all of iPhone cases"

GadgetSin.com - "Chrono aluminum iPhone 4 case can meet your requirements.”

The Chrono Case is the only iPhone case you will ever need. It’s a sleek and premium case that features unique functionality to improve your iPhone experience and everyday life.

iPhones have revolutionized and evolved to be a major part of our everyday lifestyle. It’s our own little personal device that allows us to multitask. From texting, emailing, taking photos, watching videos, and playing games, it can all be done on the go or even laying down. But how often do you get tired of holding your phone while watching videos? Or accidentally dropping your phone when you or texting? Or even taken blurry photos just because you had to reach for the snapshot button?

With the Chrono Case, that will no longer be a problem. It features a clever elastic strap system that is designed to assist when you are multitasking and can also secure your everyday items. The case is fully covered in aluminum and crafted together like a fine timepiece. It’s designed to be the most sleek and functional case out there without any of the cost and production limitations.

 

The Advantages

The case is used in many ways. As an everyday user, either you are on the go, taking pictures, or lying in bed, the sliders are designed to move diagonally, so you can multi task without the fear of dropping your phone.

 

Or if you’re a gamer, you can utilize the side grips as you would with any video game controller.

 

It can even hold your everyday items such as your ID, money, business cards, and even headphones.

 

And one more thing, you know the dust that build up inside the charge port of your iPhone? Each case includes a flexible port plug that is specially designed for the Chrono Case, to block out any unwanted debris. Simply detach it from the bumper when it is not used.

 

The Design

The final product will be carefully crafted and pieced together like a fine watch. It features sliders that are designed to move diagonally, so you can multi-task without the fear of dropping your phone. The bumper are used to absorb impact and keeps its shape, while a screw-less construction makes it one of the thinnest metal cases out there. Part lines are even placed carefully to enhance and bring out color combinations. Each Chrono Case comes with nine separate parts: machined aluminum front and black plates, elastic bumper, strap with left and right sliders, two rails, and port plug.

Front View

 

Back View

 

Top View

 

Bottom View

 

 

The Collection

 

This model features the bold Flame Orange front and black plates.

 

This model features the exclusive Cherry Blossom Pink front and black plates, matching bumper, and uniquely colored strap.

 

PRIME Edition

For the special collectors out there, that are always looking for something more. Here are our flagship PRIME Editions, in Hand-Polished Aluminum, or Black Chrome. Each will be individually prepared by professional metal crafters with an additional 20 hour of metalwork. Both versions are limited to 250 pieces worldwide and also feature the exclusive translucent bumpers.

Hand-Polished Aluminum front and black plates, with Mocha colored strap, and translucent Mocha bumpers

 

Black Chrome front and black plates, with translucent white bumpers.

 

Our Status

It’s been over 8 months since the initial idea started for this project. The form and function slowly start to emerge and transform into something beautifully refined. It has been an exciting process to see how this product has grown and evolved. Here is our plan.

Beginning of July- With your support we plan to build a 3rd and 4th prototype with more premium materials to finalize the tolerances with the exact numbers needed to perfect the construction and form fitting of the Chrono Case. From there, your contribution will then help fund the expensive tooling cost for the premium materials and colors we selected for this amazing product.

End of July- After tooling is confirmed we plan to immediately start production. In between the manufacturing process we will continue to update you will emails and photos to let you follow us in every step we take through our eyes.

August- With our final product packed and really to be shipped, we plan to have a special package waiting to greet you at your door steps by the end of August. I hope this day will be as exciting for you as it will be for us!

 

The Rewards

  • $1 - We truly appreciate your support.
  • $25 - Poster with concept development artwork of the Chrono Case.
  • $55 - Early Birds: 100 Black Chrono Cases available
  • $75 - 1 Chrono Case in Black
  • $95 - 1 Chrono Case in Flame Orange
  • $125 - 1 Chrono Case in Cherry Blossom Pink
  • $175 - GIFT PACK: 1 Chrono Case in Black and 1 Chrono Case in Cherry Blossom Pink
  • $195 - 1 Chrono Case PRIME Edition, in Hand-Polished Aluminum, or Black Chrome. Both versions are limited to 250 pieces worldwide and also feature the exclusive translucent bumpers.
  • $295 - 1 One Chrono Case PRIME Edition for iPhone 5, in Black Chrome. This version with be limited to 1000 pieces worldwide and also feature the exclusive translucent bumpers. Free shipping within the US. (Add $10 for shipping to Canada, $15 for international shipping.)
  • $500 - ENTOURAGE PACK. Choose from any 5 Chrono Case, in black, Flame Orange, or Cherry Blossom Pink.
  • $1,999 - DISTRIBUTOR PACK. Includes 5 Chrono Case in black, 5 Chrono Case in Flame Orange, 5 Chrono Case in Cherry Blossom Pink, 2 Chrono Case PRIME Edition in Hand-Polished Aluminum, and 2 Chrono Case PRIME Edition in Black Chrome.
  • $10,000 - EXCLUSIVE SUPPORTER. Fly to meet us! (see side perk details)


Thank you again for contributing and believing me. Contact me any time if you have any questions, and please don’t forget to share this project with all your friends!

$125 - 1 Chrono Case in Cherry Blossom Pink

story:
A single, big, heavy recycled wood beam.
A need.
Two friends.
 

The idea

We were searching for a stand for our macbooks and we couldn't find the right product for the right price. We decide to make our own.
 
We started designing a 120mm cube, well polished to avoid scratches.
We questioned ourself how much we would spent and we come out with something around 30€. Not more.
 
We created wustand and we decided to work also on an iPad version.
The price is as low as the complexity of the design.
wustand will be manufactured in Italy ecollogically from a single wood beam. No glue or chemical product would be added during production phase with the exception of water based stain if you will opt for the stained version of wustand.
No automatic production phases, only a craftsman and his intruments so every wustand will be "individual". We want to produce locally, one stand at the time.
We love slow-production!
 
 

What We Need & What You Get

We got lot of challenges to accomplish.
First of all we need to have enogh orders to justify the effort.
Secondly we need to find suppliers who could provide us good beams with a minimum section of 13cm X 13cm, in a consistent quantity. THIS IS NOT EASY AT ALL!!!
Third we need to work on defining selling channels on which offers our stand.
Fourth we need to finalize the packaging design.
 
First edition of wustand will be compatible with Apple MacBook Pro later 2009 edition (250 mm width) and all iPads. It has been well tested on our 13" and 15" computers as well as on our iPad retina so we are confident you will be satisfied.
If our founding goal will be reached we will think about enlarging the wustand family with other products compatible with other notebooks, phones and tablets.
 
We decided to offer our product with a fixed price including shipping to main european countries. Ask us a shipping quote before take your perk so you can add the right amount for s&h.

Other Ways You Can Help

The best ways you could help us are:
1. peak a perk and buy a wustand
2. share our project on Facebook, Twitter, Instragram or any other social network

Other

If you need any other info contact us on indiegogo. We are pleased to have suggestions, compliments or anything else.

Feedbacks

"wustand è un interessante progetto italiano per la realizzazione di uno stand per MacBook Pro e iPad, al momento in cerca di fondi su Indiegogo." 
 
"La semplicità e l’immediatezza del suo uso fanno di questo stand uno strumento funzionale e cavalca l’onda del design autoprodotto che sempre più trova consensi e richieste nel mercato"
 
"WUSTAND si inserisce perfettamente nel trend del design autoprodotto e indipendente che è già una realtà nel resto del mondo"

Warnings

wustand is not an industrial product. All single items are different from each other. Since wood is a living material, the aspect of the object could change with time and light exposure.
Our team will not cover any damage due to improper use of the object.

We are based in Verona, Italy.

website: wustand.com

story:
A Gadgets, Robotics, Technology, and Maker Podcast

Ths podcast will not just cover gadgets and robotics, but any technology that's of interest to my listeners and I. You will be able to download and listen to my podcasts at your leisure. Soon after funding is completed, you will also be able to listen live, and interact while the podcast is happening. This will not be your everyday, ordinary, technology podcast!

I have been tinkering with technology since I was in junior high school, all through high school, and ever since. I use the Arduino, Raspberry Pi, BeagleBone Black, Panda Board, and other boards, in my projects. My interests span the analog and digital worlds, so I believe I have a particular set of knowledge and experience that will allow me to make this podcast fun and entertaining for people of all ages and experience levels.

This will be a journey we will go on together!

What I Need & What You Get

  • I'm asking for $1500.00 in funding to purchase equipment and software to allow me to properly launch this podcast. This will consist of a new microphone, a computer upgrade, and software for audio recording, editing, and post processing. To start, I'll be doing all the recording, editing, and post production myself. 
  • This will not be a sponsored podcast, so it will be driven entirely by myself and my listeners/viewers. This funding is needed to get things setup properly, so I can produce a top quality podcast.
  • After the audio only podcast has been going for awhile, I want to add a video net cast along side it, where I'll actually record my experiences as I tinker and build new projects. You will be able to follow along live at some point, after the net cast has been on for awhile!
  • If this podcast is not fully funded, it will not happen, and I will not get any money at all.

You will get a high quality, weekly, audio (with video to be added) podcast, without advertising, that will keep you coming back for more!

The Impact

I want to reach out to more people, especially young people, and share what I know and do with everyone. The idea is for us all to have FUN learning and tinkering with technology of all kinds!

  • I have always enjoyed sharing what I know and do, so this podcast is just a natural extension of what I'm already doing.
  • I am very active on app.net (@hybotics) and also have a Twitter account (@hybotics).  I never stop sharing what I know and do with others.
  • I've been thinking about this for a long time, and feel now is the right time to bring this to reality.

Stretch Goals

1) If this campaign reaches $3500.00, I will purchase a nice 3D Printer, with the Dual Extruder option (http://bootsindustries.com/shop/biv2/) that allows printing in two different colors at the same time. This will allow me to create and do much more interesting and better looking projects, as well as create and make custom parts for my robots. This is not the most expensive 3D Printer, but I believe it is the best, and has the most features, for the money. This extra money will also cover paying for one year of maintenance for my 3D CAD software, which will interface to the 3D Printer.

    Risks & Challenges

    I have several years of experience in audio and video recording and production, so I feel I am qualified to produce a quality podcast. I've been tinkering with technology since 1973, and have a passion and thirst for new things, electronics, robotics, technology, learning, and tinkering.

    • The only real risk here, is that I might not be able to deliver this podcast for some unexpected reason, in the time frame I am shooting for. There can always be unexpected issues that could delay things. I'm in this to make it happen, and I'm not going to let obstacles get in my way.
    • I've thought through everything as much as possible, and am confident in my ability to deliver what I've promised.
    • I have all the abilities and capabilities I need to overcome any obstacles that might pop up in the path of making this podcast a reality, and am committed 110% to making it happen.
    • I have experience recording, editing, and doing post production on audio and video.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    If you can't contribute, but still want to help me make this podcast a reality, there are still things you can do.

    • You can spread the word, using your social media network. Tell anyone and everyone who will listen about this project!
    • You can also use the Indiegogo share tools to help get the word out!

story:
Meet the Lightning Keeper!

The Lightning Keeper is an innovative way to keep your lightning cables from braking, wearing, or tearing, while making them look and feel amazing. It is made out of high quality materials like powder coated aluminum and extremely durable silicone rubber. All the parts were custom designed from the ground up to give backers the best experience and reliability.

 

We Offer three different colors to fit your different tastes, all three will be powder coated using the best powders in the market to get a high quality, scratch resistant coating that feels amazing to the touch and will last a lifetime. 

 

Perks:

Here are all of the perks explained in a more visual way for you to be able to see what you will be getting when you order. When it comes to perks, they breaks down into two categories, regular backers, who just want to get their hands on a few Lighting Keepers:

 

As well as people that are looking to buy this product in bulk to resell it:

Note: Bulk orders have shipping included.

 

Design:

As I said on the video the lightning keeper was purposely designed from scratch to fit and protect the lighting cable, while keeping a small size and low weight. To do this, I had to choose a material that I knew was going to be strong enough even if I made it thin and small, that is why I chose aluminum. It is very lightweight and can easily be machined to make small and intricate parts. 

Funds: 

As I said on the video a large part of the funds will be used to buy the machines necessary to mass manufacture this part. I could send out my design and have them made in a factory somewhere in china, but what fun would that be? I'm a maker, so I'm going to manufacture each lighting keeper here in my workshop in Guatemala.  

Here is a pie chart of what your funds will be used for after the campaign is over:


Timeline:

Once the campaign is over, I will order the tools and materials and wait for them to come to Guatemala, that can take anywhere from 6 to 8 weeks, once they are here, I have to set them up in my shop and get to work. I am planning to ship my finalized products mid March 2018 so that you can get them late March or early April at the latest. 

 

Spread the word!

I invite you to share this campaign with your family and friends on your social media
story_txt: Meet the Lightning Keeper!The Lightning Keeper is an innovative way to keep your lightning cables from braking, wearing, or tearing, while making them look and feel amazing. It is made out of high quality materials like powder coated aluminum and extremely durable silicone rubber. All the parts were custom designed from the ground up to give backers the best experience and reliability. We Offer three different colors to fit your different tastes, all three will be powder coated using the best powders in the market to get a high quality, scratch resistant coating that feels amazing to the touch and will last a lifetime.  Perks:Here are all of the perks explained in a more visual way for you to be able to see what you will be getting when you order. When it comes to perks, they breaks down into two categories, regular backers, who just want to get their hands on a few Lighting Keepers: As well as people that are looking to buy this product in bulk to resell it:Note: Bulk orders have shipping included. Design:As I said on the video the lightning keeper was purposely designed from scratch to fit and protect the lighting cable, while keeping a small size and low weight. To do this, I had to choose a material that I knew was going to be strong enough even if I made it thin and small, that is why I chose aluminum. It is very lightweight and can easily be machined to make small and intricate parts. Funds: As I said on the video a large part of the funds will be used to buy the machines necessary to mass manufacture this part. I could send out my design and have them made in a factory somewhere in china, but what fun would that be? story:
EZ, the world’s first USB flash drive with all commonly used connectors integrated. Made for New MacBook Pro & all iOS, Android, and Windows devices with all types of plugs. 

 

How to use it?

 

Got a new MacBook, but flash drive doesn't work.

 

When you want to seize the moment, but your phone is running out of storage.

 

Can't share files between devices.

 

It's unsafe to keep your files on cloud, and transition takes too much time.

 

Different devices have different ports, there's no universal connector that fits all devices.​

 

EZ’s proprietary 4-IN-1 port design makes it the sole USB flash drive that has ever existed which integrates four commonly used connectors including Type-C, Lightning, Micro-USB, and USB. It pretty much has all of your electronic devices covered, from new MacBook Pro, Macs, PC, iPhone, iPad, iPod touch devices, to Android and Windows smart phones and tablets.

 

EZ is equipped with a Type-C plug on one end, and a standard USB plug on the other. The uniqueness lies in the USB plug, which can be converted into a single connector that can pop right into both Lightning and Micro-USB ports on your devices. Transfer photo albums, music libraries, video collections, and work or school papers -it's never been easier!

 

Excited to buy the New MacBook Pro? The headache starts when we need to move movies, photos, music and large files quickly and safely from or to our New MacBook Pro because of the new Type-C plug. Now with this flash drive, it’s not a problem anymore. Connect your new MacBook Pro to iPhones, iPads, iPods, MacBooks, and Android devices - Samsung, HTC, LG, Nokia, and Windows smart phones and tablets. EZ, the world’s first and currently the only USB flash drive with integrated all commonly used connectors integrated- Lightning, Micro USB, Type-C and USBs. Say Goodbye to Wi-Fi and cloud storage services like Dropbox and Google Drive. With EZ, file storage and transfer has never been this easy and fast.

 

You will never again get worried about the storage of your smartphone. Plug EZ to your smartphone and the storage space will be instantly  expanded. EZ comes with three different memory sizes of 32GB/64GB/128GB to extend data storage capacity of your smart phones or tablets for up to 128 GB. That's a huge collection of multimedia files, and it’s very cost-effective as well, considering the money you saved on purchasing a smart phone with large capacity, or the recurring fees for cloud storage services.

With the EZ ultra portable thumb drive, it will never be a hassle again when someone asks you to share a song, a picture or a video even when there is no internet connection. You do not need to use any cables to go back and forth. It’s a real timesaver, which makes it so easy to move the files around among people with literally all types of devices.

 

Plug and edit your files directly from the EZ USB flash drive without requiring them first to be copied onto your device. You can even zip/unzip the files stored on EZ. Featuring high-performance USB, EZ can read and write files at a super fast speed. It also features a document reader that supports all common data formats, including:

 

Isn’t it frustrating when you see the “out of space” notification while taking memorable photos, or recording important videos/audios? Well, with EZ, you will never find yourself low on space ever again. Simply leave it plugged into your devices while taking photos or recording audio/video, and the content will be automatically saved to EZ.

 

Despite the fact that it will quickly free up memory on your device through seamless transfer of large files like the audio/video you record, you can also stream them directly off EZ on your device without any glitching, slowing, or stuttering. Playback your favorite movie and music wirelessly when traveling.

 

Available from the Apple Store, the AGP App lets you easily view, access, manage (copy, save, clone, download, store and back up) all the files and share them on social media from your iPhone and iPad. Its navigation on other mobile devices and PCs is also very simple and straightforward.

Download and install the AGP App with one press of a button.

 

Easily import and export files.

 

Manage from your smartphone easily.

 

Switch between different colors and styles of operation interfaces.

EZ offers a reliable way to pass data among devices that aren’t network-connected, plus three protective measures to safeguard the data stored on it, which make it much securer than using a network connection like transferring through the cloud which leaves a ghost footprint of private information out there in the wild.

 

 

  • Copy/Move files between EZ and all your cross-platform devices
  • File Management (Copy/Cut/Paste/Delete/Rename/Create Folder/Zip/Unzip)
  • High-definition movie/music streaming directly from EZ
  • Photo and document (Excel, Word, PPT, PDF, Pages) Viewer
  • Open/Edit files directly on EZ without needing to copy to your devices
  • Backup photos/videos from Apple devices’ Camera Roll to EZ
  • Support "Open In" function
  • Open files from other Apps in EZ App
  • Open files from EZ in other Apps

story:
Update Aug. 5:
New PCB is finished. Click to check out the new features and see descriptions of the components.


Overview

The Arbor Linux Shield is an Atheros 9331 based board that makes it easy to add networking and Arduino Yún capabilities to various microcontrollers,  in addition to connecting to Arduinos and compatible microcontrollers. The board also includes its own set of GPIOs, extra USB and ethernet headers for expandability or standalone operation.

Write your own programs or scripts in Python, NodeJS, Lua, Shell or in any number of programming languages to communicate with your microcontroller. Interface to a web server hosted on the shield or control your projects through your smartphone or tablet. 

Let Linux take care of networking over WiFi or ethernet without the need of loading extra networking libraries in your sketches and programs.

No microcontroller is necessary. Run it as a standalone board  to create your own wireless router, learn about embedded Linux development, use it as a base for your network connected sensors or anything else you can envision.

About the Hardware

The Arbor Linux Shield is an Atheros AR9331 MIPS based system on module running at 400 MHz with 64 MB DDR2 RAM and 16 MB SPI flash memory. The shield board contains a USB hub with a micro SD controller for up to 32 GB of extra filesystem storage. There are 11 GPIO pins (three of which are used for programming an Arduino).

There are also two additional USB 2.0 ports and two additional switched ethernet ports that can be added from header pins. The shield board can be powered from the micro USB connector on the back or by a connected microcontroller.

The board is low profile.  It has no components sticking out above the standard-sized Arduino shield headers.  This makes things easier when stacking on additional shields or inserting the device into an enclosure.




About the Software

All the software associated with our hardware is open source and will be available to anyone to use or modify.


Operating System

The shield ships with a version of OpenWrt 12.09 that is based on OpenWrt-Yún.  It has all of the features of the Arduino Yún, but having the major difference of being able to program more than just an Atmel 32u4 microcontroller.  You can download the image and hundreds of packages from our software repository or compile and develop your own version of OpenWrt.

We also maintain a bleeding edge trunk version of OpenWrt and all the associated software running on the shield.  Therefore if you have a need or want to run the latest development version of OpenWrt you will have the capability to run it on our hardware.


Boot Loader
A version of the U-boot boot loader comes pre-installed.  It has some great features for upgrading or repairing your shield's OpenWrt image through a built-in web server or using TFTP.


Arduino IDE

Wirelessly upload your sketches through the shield to the microcontroller of your choice.  With a few simple edits to the boards.txt file that comes with version 1.5+, you can make any supported board upload through the local network.


AVR GCC Toolchain

Upload and compile your sketches directly on the Arbor Linux Shield.  This is useful if you prefer to use a different IDE or text editor other than the Arduino IDE.  We are working on an ARM GCC toolchain, as well, and it should be available by the time we start shipping.


Arbor Web IDE

This is a project we are currently working on to bring a nice clean interface and tools for writing, compiling and uploading for microcontrollers connected to the shield.  The software will be entirely hosted on the shield.

Arbor Linux Shield Demo

This is a demonstration of the Arbor Linux Shield running on top of an Arduino UNO compatible, driving an SPI 2.2" TFT display.

It is utilizing Linux to do all the data gathering and the microcontroller to process and display the information on the TFT Display.  The shield is connected wirelessly to an access point connected to the Internet.  It retrieves weather data from wunderground.com using their API.  The microcontroller executes local Linux commands on the shield through the serial ports and displays the weather, time, date, Linux load average, Linux uptime and graphs out the WiFi signal strength to the TFT display.


Project Status

Update: Aug. 5
The final version of the PCB is finished.  We should have them in the shop soon to assemble and test.  Here is an image and description of the components.
  • Changed out the USB hub chip to the Alcor U6350 with one port on shield and two ports on expansion headers.
  • Offset Arduino headers for a stronger fit over conventional shield headers.
  • Micro USB connector with FTDI interface. Used to connect to the Linux console via USB port. Also used to power the board in standalone mode.
  • Uses the Arduino IOREF pin for level control, making the Arbor Linux Shield compatible with 3.3v boards.

A
 Micro USB connector for 3.3v power and serial console
B
 FTDI chip for serial over USB
C
 Micro SD card slot
D
 ICSP header can be used for Arduino programming or as four Linux GPIO connected through two NTB0102 level shifters.
E
 Two USB headers with 5v power for additional ports.
F
 Two additional 10/100 Ethernet headers with 2v power.
G
 Eight Linux GPIO and 3.3v power and ground.
H
 Ethernet transformer for on board port.
I
 Alcor U6350 USB hub IC
J
 Three NTB0102 dual supply translating transceivers that connected to two Linux GPIO for OE control.
K
 5v DC power jack.
L
 10/100 Ethernet RJ45 low profile.
M
 USB Type-A connector.
N
 Multi-function programmable button.
O
 IOREF connection for powering supported Arduino and comaptible boards.  Works with 5v and 3.3v boards such as the Arduino Due.
P
 Offset Arduino headers for a fit over conventional headers.
Q
 2mm female headers for AR9331 module.

The software is in the final testing phases and will be available on GitHub during this campaign.  This will include OpenWRT, AVR and ARM GCC toolchains, U-boot, examples and the Arbor Web IDE.  You will be able to get started with the software before your product arrives.

Documentation is a big deal to us and we will be publishing technical documents, tutorials, configurations and all kinds of things related to embedded Linux.

    Risks & Challenges

    As with all hardware projects, there are quite a few things that can disrupt shipping schedules.  A major issue that can disrupt shipping schedules is lead times on parts availability.  We have done our best to use parts that are easily obtainable, or in some cases, parts that are able to be swapped for another compatible part that is available.

    Assembly times and costs can vary.  This is another of our concerns and we are working on a number of ways to make sure that we ship our product on time. If, for some reason, there are delays or problems we will be in communication with our supporters regarding the issues and how we are resolving them.

      Ways You Can Help

      Any positive way you can get get the word out about the Arbor Linux Shield would be very much appreciated. We want to help introduce people to embedded computing with microcontrollers.

      This product is the first of many we want to build and share with everyone.


      Any questions? Please feel free to post a comment and we'll be glad to answer.
