story:
Tucked safely in your wallet and protected by your biometrics, safeguard all of your passwords, IDs, credit cards, documents, and more. Pre-order yours now! 

Finis Conner, co-founder of Seagate Technology and founder of Conner Peripherals, brings you the BluStor CyberGate. A biometric cyber security solution that fully protects you in an increasingly mobile world. Secure your passwords, identity information, credit cards, important documents, and much more -- all stored safely in your wallet and fully in your control. Cyber security and protecting your personal information has never been more important as online attacks increase at an unprecedented rate. 

How does it work?

You will never need to remove the CyberGate card from your wallet, keeping it out of site and firmly in your control. It's like having your own secured data cloud in your pocket where it can't be hacked. What's more, you'll never need to remember a single password.

The BluStor solution comes in the smart card form factor with the CyberGate card and the GateKeeper mobile app, with four fully functional applications to get you started, all secured behind the GateKeeper.

  • PassWord Vault -- securely protect all of your usernames, passwords, login details, and personal identity information
  • File Vault -- safely store important documents (e.g., photos, medical records, email and other personal data)
  • Credit Card Vault -- store your credit card information, and securely retrieve it when needed for online transaction.
  • OTP/2FA Token Generator -- forget pin codes, and use your biometrics to generate RFC 6238 compatible security tokens for logging into supported websites.

Want more? The BluStore CyberGate solution is an Open Platform to encourage and enable developers around the world to build and market their own apps.  All backers will have access to our development tools enabling them to create an endless variety of applications and tools leveraging the BluStor CyberGate technology. The imagination is the limit!  


Also compatible with existing smart card readers

The BluStor CyberGate card is also compatible with existing ISO smart card interfaces: 7816-3 and 7816-12.  That means businesses who wish to use the CyberGate solution to replace existing smart card solutions do not need to replace their existing infrastructure. 


The BluStor solution provides unparalleled personal flexibility and capability. Forget costly wearable bands, USB dongles, and other smart card solutions with limited capabilities that can cost you over $150. Eliminate less secure cloud-based password and identity management solutions  that can have recurring charges in excess of $40 per year to store and sync your data. Don't become trapped by products that only support single biometrics, rely on bulky USB dongles, or are built upon fading mobile technology. CyberGate is an open platform built for the future and at a price point that puts you firmly back in control of your critical data.

For the developers out there, all backers will also receive early access to our Software Development Kit (SDK), sample source code, and everything you need to know to build your own applications!

What's under the hood?

We've spent years solving the technology hurdles, building the prototypes, and now we're ready to take the final step and bring it to the market. 

Hardware Specifications

  • Credit Card form factor
  • Tamper resistant
  • Bluetooth 4.0 in dual mode (Classic Bluetooth/BLE)
  • Supports NFC ISO/IEC 14443 A/B
  • High-performance and energy-efficient processor
  • 7816-3 / USB smart card interface
  • Ultra-thin rechargeable lithium ion battery, compatible recharging via USB/ISO 7816-3 and conductive mats
  • Java Card OS and Global Platform
  • Support for multi-factor authentication via 8GB on-card flash storage and match-on-card verification for fingerprints, facial, handwritten signatures, and iris
  • Symmetric encryption of bulk data via AES algorithm, up to 256-bit keys
  • Hardware cryptographic engine to facilitate PKI-based applications, including asymmetric encryption and digital signature generation and verification
  • True random number generator to generate strong cryptographic keys and passwords

What biometric authentication methods will we support initially?

What biometrics we support and how they are implemented is dependent on the capabilities of your mobile device. For our backer's, we will support fingerprint, facial recognition, and signature based biometric authentication.  

What mobile devices will you support?

Our initial backer's release will support mobile devices running Android (e.g., Samsung Galaxy) and iOS (e.g., iPhone, iPad, etc.).

What about stretch goals?

With your help, we have some exciting stretch goals in mind including voice authentication, an on-card fingerprint scanner, and support for Windows mobile phones.

welivesecurity | Mobile Market Portal | technology tell | biometric update | eChannelNEWS | Computer Technology Review | CTR's 2014 Top 25 Must Have Applications | Crain's Chicago Business 2014 Top 50 | IT Security Journal


What are the Risks?

We've invested money and countless hours making sure we've worked through all the technology issues before asking our fellow crowdfunder's to back us. 

All of the hardware components have been selected and assembled into a working prototype. The components have been mass-produced, well-tested, and used in various computer and electronic products.  The working prototype has shown us the practical feasibility of manufacturing such a highly sophisticated product in a smart card form factor.  What remains?  Funds will be used to complete the manufacturing design, finish the firmware implementation, and complete development of the end-user software -- something our founder has decades of experience doing on a large scale. 

There are always unknowns but we've put together a top-notch management and technology team that is more than up to the challenge.


Find out more about the revolutionary CyberGate technology by visiting the BluStor website.
story_txt:
Tucked safely in your wallet and protected by your biometrics, safeguard all of your passwords, IDs, credit cards, documents, and more. Pre-order yours now! Finis Conner, co-founder of Seagate Technology and founder of Conner Peripherals, brings you the BluStor CyberGate. A biometric cyber security solution that fully protects you in an increasingly mobile world. Secure your passwords, identity information, credit cards, important documents, and much more -- all stored safely in your wallet and fully in your control. Cyber security and protecting your personal information has never been more important as online attacks increase at an unprecedented rate. How does it work? You will never need to remove the CyberGate card from your wallet, keeping it out of site and firmly in your control. It's like having your own secured data cloud in your pocket where it can't be hacked. What's more, you'll never need to remember a single password.The BluStor solution comes in the smart card form factor with the CyberGate card and the GateKeeper mobile app, with four fully functional applications to get you started, all secured behind the GateKeeper.

PassWord Vault -- securely protect all of your usernames, passwords, login details, and personal identity information

File Vault -- safely store important documents (e.g., photos, medical records, email and other personal data)

Credit Card Vault -- store your credit card information, and securely retrieve it when needed for online transaction.

OTP/2FA Token Generator -- forget pin codes, and use your biometrics to generate RFC 6238 compatible security tokens for logging into supported websites.
Want more? The BluStore CyberGate solution is an Open Platform to encourage and enable developers around the world to build and market their own apps.  All backers will have access to our development tools enabling them to create an endless variety of applications and tools leveraging the BluStor CyberGate technology. The imagination is the limit!  Also compatible with existing smart card readersThe BluStor CyberGate card is also compatible with existing ISO smart card interfaces: 7816-3 and 7816-12.  That means businesses who wish to use the CyberGate solution to replace existing smart card solutions do not need to replace their existing infrastructure. The BluStor solution provides unparalleled personal flexibility and capability. Forget costly wearable bands, USB dongles, and other smart card solutions with limited capabilities that can cost you over $150. Eliminate less secure cloud-based password and identity management solutions  that can have recurring charges in excess of $40 per year to store and sync your data. Don't become trapped by products that only support single biometrics, rely on bulky USB dongles, or are built upon fading mobile technology. CyberGate is an open platform built for the future and at a price point that puts you firmly back in control of your critical data.For the developers out there, all backers will also receive early access to our Software Development Kit (SDK), sample source code, and everything you need to know to build your own applications!What's under the hood?We've spent years solving the technology hurdles, building the prototypes, and now we're ready to take the final step and bring it to the market.  Hardware Specifications
Credit Card form factor
Tamper resistant
Bluetooth 4.0 in dual mode (Classic Bluetooth/BLE)
Supports NFC ISO/IEC 14443 A/B
High-performance and energy-efficient processor
7816-3 / USB smart card interface
Ultra-thin rechargeable lithium ion battery, compatible recharging via USB/ISO 7816-3 and conductive mats
Java Card OS and Global Platform
Support for multi-factor authentication via 8GB on-card flash storage and match-on-card verification for fingerprints, facial, handwritten signatures, and iris
Symmetric encryption of bulk data via AES algorithm, up to 256-bit keys
Hardware cryptographic engine to facilitate PKI-based applications, including asymmetric encryption and digital signature generation and verification
True random number generator to generate strong cryptographic keys and passwords
What biometric authentication methods will we support initially?What biometrics we support and how they are implemented is dependent on the capabilities of your mobile device. For our backer's, we will support fingerprint, facial recognition, and signature based biometric authentication.  What mobile devices will you support?Our initial backer's release will support mobile devices running Android (e.g., Samsung Galaxy) and iOS (e.g., iPhone, iPad, etc.).What about stretch goals?With your help, we have some exciting stretch goals in mind including voice authentication, an on-card fingerprint scanner, and support for Windows mobile phones. welivesecurity | Mobile Market Portal | technology tell | biometric update | eChannelNEWS | Computer Technology Review | CTR's 2014 Top 25 Must Have Applications | Crain's Chicago Business 2014 Top 50 | IT Security JournalWhat are the Risks?We've invested money and countless hours making sure we've worked through all the technology issues before asking our fellow crowdfunder's to back us. All of the hardware components have been selected and assembled into a working prototype. The components have been mass-produced, well-tested, and used in various computer and electronic products.  The working prototype has shown us the practical feasibility of manufacturing such a highly sophisticated product in a smart card form factor.  What remains?  Funds will be used to complete the manufacturing design, finish the firmware implementation, and complete development of the end-user software -- something our founder has decades of experience doing on a large scale. There are always unknowns but we've put together a top-notch management and technology team that is more than up to the challenge.Find out more about the revolutionary CyberGate technology by visiting the BluStor website.

story:
Mobis Black Privacy Screen Protectors 

Stay on the go, while helping keep your screen protected and your confidential texts, emails, calendars and alerts, well, confidential.

Privacy when you need it
Maintain "black out" visual privacy from side views in portrait mode, or change the orientation to landscape when you want to share your screen.

Help keep visual hackers in the dark while you get incredible optical clarity and an extra layer of protection from everyday dust and scratches. Explore our versatile screen privacy products for smartphones.

Mobis Help protect your screen and the information on it from prying eyes. Maintain "black out" visual privacy from side views in portrait mode, and change the orientation to landscape when you want to share your screen.

Mobis : Clearly view the information on your iPhone while people around you only see a darkened screen

Change device orientation to landscape mode to share when needed

Easy application and residue-free removal

Protects your screen from scratches

Stay-clean edges prevent build-up of dust and grime

Matt surface reduces glare

A “clear” winner
Designed for optical clarity. You get a clear view of your screen while prying eyes to the side see a darkened screen.

Durable screen protection
Adds an extra layer of protection from everyday scratches and dust. Stay-clean edge technology helps prevent dust and grime from collecting on the edges of the screen protector.

Features:

Effective privacy in portrait mode; change orientation for shareable screen viewing

Thin and touch-sensitive

Incredible image clarity and glossy finish

Custom fit for various phone sizes and brands

Helps protect from everyday dust and scratches

Easy to attach and removes cleanly

 

Why Privacy Filters Are Important For Businesses

 

Description
Product applies directly to your screen with a residue-free adhesive that removes cleanly. Stay-clean edge technology helps keep edges free from dust and grime.

story:
Born from the minds of Russian designers Aleksander Suhih and Maxim Mezentsev, the E-Inkey keyboard brings convenience and style to your fingertips. With its sleek, sophisticated design, the E-Inkey keyboard adds a whole new dimension to your computing experience.

E-Inkey Keyboard

The E-Inkey Keyboard presents a contemporary new look for the humble keyboard, and at the same time revolutionizes the way you interact with your favorite programs. Displaying icons and quickly identifying available keyboard shortcuts from the on-screen program makes it easier and quicker for you to work. It also means less mouse or track pad time, increasing not only your speed, but also improving your ergonomics. Changes system language or location instantly updates your keyboard layout to match, making sharing you computer easier for international users.

E-Inkey Features

The E-Inkey keyboard delivers stunning performance with zero hassle. Its USB connectivity makes it simple to install on any system or device. This, coupled with an ergonomic and sleek design, make E-Inkey a pleasure to use.

The use of ePaper in the key displays means E-Inkey consumes very little energy and is easy on the eyes for those that prefer to watch the keys when typing. The keys are also backlit to enhance readability in all conditions.

Use of funds

We are confident that the sustainable design and manufacturing methods used to create E-Inkey keyboard not only will produce a great product, but will give users a true sense of confidence and control. Bringing all the pieces come together has its challenges, but we have done our homework and are ready to bring E-Inkey to market. We will use these funds to start production and finalize the software and electronics of the E-Inkey keyboard.

Conbribute now and help make E-Inkey become more than just an idea!

story:
**Two new perks have been added, the 2-pack and the 4-pack**

The iPhone’s native speaker needs improving. BASS, a purely mechanical amplifying dock, improves it everywhere you need.

 WHEN SHARING ON TWITTER PLEASE USE #BASSDock . Let's get trending!

The BASS Dock 

Everyone who listens to music, watches video, or even uses speakerphone on their iPhone knows that the native speaker just doesn't cut it. iPhone users need to buy external speakers to get acceptable audio performance, it's just a fact.

Until now. BASS is a polycarbonate dock that amplifies your iPhone's native speaker passively, with no electronics at all. Boasting an impressive 15 decibel boost, BASS makes your iPhone's native speaker useful again. BASS even lets you insert the charging cord you already own, so you never have to worry about running out of power.

                                 

Music

BASS has been designed with music in mind, first and foremost. The patent-pending passive mechanical amplifier tacks an extra 15 dB on your native speaker's volume, without the need for batteries or cords running to the wall.

Just start your music and drop your phone on BASS for an instant boost.

Voice

BASS is great for improving your speakerphone experience as well. Pop your iPhone in BASS' perfectly-sized slot and enjoy crystal clear voice that can fill a room. Put one in each conference room at work and eliminate your need for standard conference phones entirely.

Video

Just like it does with music, BASS amps up your video-viewing experience. The docking slot obscures no portion of the screen and allows for full function of your home button. Even better, after installing your iPhone cable to use BASS as a charging dock, you can turn BASS on its side and enjoy full and ample audio while viewing in landscape.

Charging/Docking

BASS' patent pending cord management system allows BASS to become a charging dock in a snap. Simply push the connector into the extruded slot up top, wrap your cord around the cleats on the bottom, and run your cable out the slot on the back. 

Your iPhone pushes easily onto the connector, and the cord retention features keep everything in place when you undock. BASS stays put, and you are out the door, fully charged.

Take it Anywhere

BASS is purely mechanical, made of polycarbonate. With no moving parts or electronics, BASS is robust, reliable, and top-rack dishwasher safe. This means it's perfect for singing along in the shower, setting up for a picnic, or relaxing at the beach. 

Pre-order yours today and help make BASS a reality. 

Our Current Status

The BASS unit depicted in the video is a prototype. It was manufactured by machining two halves and gluing them together, as opposed to the injection molding we’ll use in production. Production BASS units will be injection molded in two halves and joined with pins and chemical fusing.

You can order BASS for either iPhone 4 or iPhone 5. We’ve done functional testing (and just generally had a good time) with the iPhone 4 version you saw in the video.  The iPhone 5 version looks almost identical – the only differences are the dimensions for the slots that hold the phone and cable.

The prototype in the video was designed to function with no case on the phone. Production versions will have a large enough slot to accommodate most common cases. We can’t guarantee that every case will work with BASS, but the majority will.

Every contributor will get an invite to our MyProject.is page, where you can see past discussion about development and design decisions, and recieve exclusive updates. MyProject is a great service, and was a huge help with our development process.

Fulfillment

We have designs nailed down and hard quotes from our manufacturing partner. If this campaign is successful, we’ll be in the factory immediately. We’ll personally oversee initial production of the molds and perform on-the-spot inspection and testing of the first articles before final units are packaged and shipped.

The funds raised in this campaign are just enough to cover the startup costs (injection molds, paperwork), and the units included as rewards (material, labor, packaging, shipping). 

*SPECIAL OFFER - Earn Your FREE Sticker*

Want a free BASS sticker included in your order? Follow these simple steps:

  1. Post this link to our campaign page (bit.ly/bassdock) on Facebook, and make your post "Public" (in the little drop down menu next to "Post" button).
  2. Tweet a link to your PUBLIC Facebook post to @BASS_Dock with the tag #BASS
  3. We'll include a free sticker with your shipment!

We'll include a free sticker with your shipment!

story:
Celxt Node, the cell phone extension built for the 21st century. Connects to iPhones, Androids and cell phones using Bluetooth.


What is the CelXT Node?

The NODE is an extension for your cellular phone. In the same way that people keep landlines with extension phones throughout their homes, the NODE works as an additional device through which you can answer calls and text messages in addition to making outgoing calls and texts. It connects to your cellular phone through Bluetooth and Wi-Fi technology and notifies you when you are receiving a call or text message – even when your cell phone is on vibrate.

 

Why you Need the CelXT Node

In the United States alone more then 30% of households are now cell-phone-only households, and this makes it imperative to know where your cell phone is at all times to keep in touch. But when your cell phone’s not in your pocket, it could be anywhere, and most of us have at one time or another missed an important call. With the CelXt NODE, you’ll never miss a call, email or text again!

 


How the CelXT Node Can Help You

You left your cell phone on vibrate after a meeting and someone is urgently trying to reach you. The NODE will still ring, alerting you to an incoming call.

You can never find where you put your cell phone and are tired of missing calls.

You miss text messages when listening to Pandora or watching Netflix.

You have a habit of leaving your phone downstairs when you’re upstairs, and vice versa.

There’s an emergency at home and you don’t have time to search for you phone.

The NODE provides an incredible convenience so you’ll always know where it is, even when your cell phone is nowhere to be found.

Specifications

ARM Processor
1Meg Flash
192 K RAM
Speakerphone
Headset Jack
Touchscreen
Bluetooth 2.1
Wireless
Accelerometer
Vibrator Motor
Charger
Optional Dock

 


Touch-Screen Interface – Simply use your finger to tap the icons of your choice, from the Answer-Call icon to the Text-Message icon, and even access your phone’s address book.  Plus, you can customize your ring tone, set the volume and more.  The icons are intuitive and user-friendly so it’s easy to navigate through all the features of the NODE.

And here's the even COOLER part. We want to take it one step further by equipping the NODE with standard WiFi - in order to increase the range and feature-set of the NODE beyond the normal Bluetooth capabilities.

We want the NODE to detect your already installed WiFi equipment and connect to your cell phone in the most efficient way possible - either directly, ad-hoc, or through your WiFi router or base-station, providing the maximum possible range attainable.

Not to mention the added functionalities that become possible with a WiFi connection - Internet-enabled mini-applications, VOIP capabilities, DLNA connectivity...who knows? Only our imagination is going to be the limiting factor!

And we say "OUR" imagination because that's the plan - to expose the Smartphone API for you to design and upload your own apps to the NODE, allowing for endless possibilities and a whole new ecosystem of NODE functionality.

But...we need YOU to help make the NODE a reality. We've got a great prototype and we're excited to move forward, but there's a lot of work left to do.

Join us! Be the first of a new generation to CUT THE CORD and help launch the CelXt Node into production.

FAQ
What’s the battery life?
We’ve selected the hardware to be able to operate in extremely low power modes when not in use, as well as take advantage of the power-saving features of BlueTooth, and our own system of Wireless-standby such that we're hoping for up to 3 days of battery life – but your mileage may vary.

How does it affect my cell phone’s battery life?
Any wireless connection to your cell phone will naturally add to the power drain on the device. For now, a good guess would be 5%-10% for the BlueTooth connection, and 10%-15% for a wireless connection.

How do you charge it?
The Node comes with a wall-charger, and uses a standard Micro-USB connector for charging.

Does it come with the dock?
The dock is optional, and we’re considering two different types of docks. One type would be included at no cost and would not charge the device, and the other type would have a pass-through connection so it could use the included charger.

story:
Have you looked for a gadget to prop up your phone in your office, in a classroom, in a coffee shop, in a restaurant, in your kitchen, or even in your bed, but couldn't find one that works well? Have you looked for a phone grip that does not harm the beauty of your phones and allows you to relax your hands while holding your phones in a long commute or in the waiting room of a clinic? Look no further! We have a perfect solution for you!

INTRODUCING:

 

 

UGRIP is a patented fashionable phone stand and grip that could prop up your phone in any orientations and any viewing angles, and is also the only grip in the world that is adhesive-free and can be easily attached or detached. 

 

 

 

 

MICRO-SUCTION CUPS TECHNOLOGY

UGRIP uses thousands of micro-suction cups to render unparalleled functionalities.​ ​ 

 

 

STAND MODE

UGRIP is the only portable phone stand in the world that allows users to easily prop up their phones in portrait or landscape orientation, and freely adjust the viewing angle. Unlike many bulky and heavy existing phone stands, that use brute force to hold phones, or stands made of flimsy plastics, UGRIP uses the friction force generated by the micro-suction cups to hold the phone in place. 

 

 

Landscape viewing at any preferred angle: 

UGRIP ADVANTAGE: In stand mode, none of the existing phone grips and phone stands allow users to adjust viewing angles of their phones in the landscape orientation so easily. 

 

Super Stand in Action

Only the UGRIP phone stand can do this!

 

 

 

Portrait viewing at any preferred angles:

UGRIP ADVANTAGE: In stand mode, no other phone grips and portable phone stands offer this much needed function.

 

Easy and stable angle adjustment

Using the suction force generated by the micro-suction cup pads on its bottom surface, UGRIP holds onto the smooth table surface tightly to prevent the stand from moving. This provides a solid footing for positioning the phone in various angles. 

 

 

Super convenient

UGRIP is always at your service wherever you go and whatever you do.

 

 

Elegant and simple mechanism

Stylish too! 

 

 

And delightful!

Your hands are free. Now you only need one finger.

 

 

GRIP MODE

UGRIP is the only no adhesive, no harness, detachable phone grip in the world. It can be effortlessly attached to a flat and smooth phone (or case) surface and effortlessly detached. UGRIP does not compromise the beauty of your phone with an ugly add-on.

 

 

Gentle and snug

UGRIP's soft and medical grade silicone rubber is comfortable and does not cause any undue stress to your hand. 

 

 

Super grip in action 

UGRIP is the only phone grip that can be so easily attached and detached.  

 

 

 

Easy attachment

 

 

 

Comfy gripping

Even one finger is enough for holding the phone.

 

 

 

 

Happy Tango

UGRIP gives your hand and your phone total freedom. 

 

 

SLEEK AND STYLISH

UGRIP's minimalist design goes well with any phone and in any place.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

NON-STICK AND NO MESS

Smooth working surface 

UGRIP is adhesive-free and will never leave any sticky residue. 

 

 

 

 

 

Adhesive-free Design

Unlike UGRIP, all existing non-harness type phone grips use adhesives, basically glue, to bond with the phone or case. As a result, they cannot be used on other phones. UGRIP can easily be transferred from one phone to another.   

 

 

NO MORE CRAMPING HANDS AND HAND INJURIES

Holding phones or phone holders for a prolonged period of time takes its toll on hands.

Before

Using all 5 or 2 fingers to hold a phone for a long period of time is stressful to hand muscles.

 

 

 

After

Excessive phone use leads to overuse injury.

 

 

A metal phone ring holder could cut your finger when the phone is yanked off suddenly and rapidly.

Before

There is a health hazard waiting to happen right here: 

 

 

After

Ring avulsion is a possible consequence. 

 

​

 

Safe and comfy

On the contrary, UGRIP is very comfortable to use and will never cause any harm to your body.  

Gentle caress

 

 

 

 

 

THE BEST COMPANION EVER

UGRIP can be used in so many different ways:

While enjoying coffee

 

 

 

 

 

While relaxing at home

 

 

And texting

 

 

While in the kitchen

 

 

 

While working

 

 

 

 

While taking a Selfie

 

 

 

 

 

While lying in bed

 

 

 

EASY STORAGE

UGRIP can be easily packed away whenever you want and where ever you go.

Carried in a handbag

 

 

 

 

Carried in your pocket

 

 

WIRELESS CHARGING FRIENDLY

No more cumbersome grip attachment on your phone or case to interfere with the charging process.

 

 

 

SUCTION FORCE RESTORATION

Restoring the suction just by wiping it with a clean wet cloth.

 

 

 

WHAT DO PEOPLE SAY ABOUT IT?

 

 

 

SKY IS THE LIMIT

This UGRIP even holds a 10 inch SONY tablet...

 

 

 

INNOVATIVE

UGRIP is patented in the United States, Canada, EU, Japan, China, and more.

 

​

 

 

WELL DESIGNED AND WELL MADE

 

 

MANY COLOR OPTIONS
story_txt:
Have you looked for a gadget to prop up your phone in your office, in a classroom, in a coffee shop, in a restaurant, in your kitchen, or even in your bed, but couldn't find one that works well? Have you looked for a phone grip that does not harm the beauty of your phones and allows you to relax your hands while holding your phones in a long commute or in the waiting room of a clinic? Look no further! We have a perfect solution for you!
INTRODUCING:
 
 

UGRIP is a patented fashionable phone stand and grip that could prop up your phone in any orientations and any viewing angles, and is also the only grip in the world that is adhesive-free and can be easily attached or detached. 
 

 
 

 
MICRO-SUCTION CUPS TECHNOLOGY
UGRIP uses thousands of micro-suction cups to render unparalleled functionalities.​ ​ 
 

 
STAND MODE
UGRIP is the only portable phone stand in the world that allows users to easily prop up their phones in portrait or landscape orientation, and freely adjust the viewing angle. Unlike many bulky and heavy existing phone stands, that use brute force to hold phones, or stands made of flimsy plastics, UGRIP uses the friction force generated by the micro-suction cups to hold the phone in place. 

 


 
Landscape viewing at any preferred angle: 
UGRIP ADVANTAGE: In stand mode, none of the existing phone grips and phone stands allow users to adjust viewing angles of their phones in the landscape orientation so easily. 
 

Super Stand in Action
Only the UGRIP phone stand can do this!
  
  Portrait viewing at any preferred angles:UGRIP ADVANTAGE: In stand mode, no other phone grips and portable phone stands offer this much needed function. Easy and stable angle adjustmentUsing the suction force generated by the micro-suction cup pads on its bottom surface, UGRIP holds onto the smooth table surface tightly to prevent the stand from moving. This provides a solid footing for positioning the phone in various angles.   Super convenientUGRIP is always at your service wherever you go and whatever you do.  Elegant and simple mechanismStylish too!   And delightful!Your hands are free. Now you only need one finger.  GRIP MODEUGRIP is the only no adhesive, no harness, detachable phone grip in the world. It can be effortlessly attached to a flat and smooth phone (or case) surface and effortlessly detached. UGRIP does not compromise the beauty of your phone with an ugly add-on.  Gentle and snugUGRIP's soft and medical grade silicone rubber is comfortable and does not cause any undue stress to your hand.   Super grip in action UGRIP is the only phone grip that can be so easily attached and detached.     Easy attachment   Comfy grippingEven one finger is enough for holding the phone.    Happy TangoUGRIP gives your hand and your phone total freedom.   SLEEK AND STYLISHUGRIP's minimalist design goes well with any phone and in any place.         NON-STICK AND NO MESSSmooth working surface UGRIP is adhesive-free and will never leave any sticky residue.      Adhesive-free DesignUnlike UGRIP, all existing non-harness type phone grips use adhesives, basically glue, to bond with the phone or case. As a result, they cannot be used on other phones. UGRIP can easily be transferred from one phone to another.     NO MORE CRAMPING HANDS AND HAND INJURIESHolding phones or phone holders for a prolonged period of time takes its toll on hands.BeforeUsing all 5 or 2 fingers to hold a phone for a long period of time is stressful to hand muscles.   AfterExcessive phone use leads to overuse injury.  A metal phone ring holder could cut your finger when the phone is yanked off suddenly and rapidly.BeforeThere is a health hazard waiting to happen right here:   AfterRing avulsion is a possible consequence.  ​ Safe and comfyOn the contrary, UGRIP is very comfortable to use and will never cause any harm to your body.  Gentle caress     THE BEST COMPANION EVERUGRIP can be used in so many different ways:While enjoying coffee     While relaxing at home  And texting  While in the kitchen   While working    While taking a Selfie     While lying in bed   EASY STORAGEUGRIP can be easily packed away whenever you want and where ever you go.Carried in a handbag    Carried in your pocket  WIRELESS CHARGING FRIENDLYNo more cumbersome grip attachment on your phone or case to interfere with the charging process.   SUCTION FORCE RESTORATIONRestoring the suction just by wiping it with a clean wet cloth.   WHAT DO PEOPLE SAY ABOUT IT?   SKY IS THE LIMITThis UGRIP even holds a 10 inch SONY tablet...   INNOVATIVEUGRIP is patented in the United States, Canada, EU, Japan, China, and more. ​  WELL DESIGNED AND WELL MADE  MANY COLOR OPTIONS

story:
PocketShare®-pico 

Gigabit Ethernet Adapter

World's smallest & fastest Gigabit LAN Card

Are you an Ultrabook or Macbook user? Now you can connect to the system that you need whenever you want without using a special LAN card or Dongle cable.  


No need to buy a product that requires an accompanying cable any more!


Even if you are using a laptop with an old network card that doesn’t perform well, you don’t need to buy a new laptop! This easy-to-install aluminum USB Gigabit network card will give you fast internet access to send and receive files.


Installation is super easy. All you need to do is to plug it into a USB port. (On Windows 8.1, your computer will automatically install new drivers for the devices.)


Our product uses an ASIX chipset that ensures the best compatibility and stability, and it is the world’s smallest Ethernet adapter card. (without cap 57.2 mm X 16.4 mm X 12.6 mm)



The product’s MSRP is $29.50, but you can get a special 36% discount only at Indiegogo.



Specifications

  • Chip: ASIX AX88179 USB3.0 to Gigabit Ethernet Controller
  • USB 3.0 Specification Revision 1.0 compliant, backwards compatible to USB2.0 standard
  • Supports data transfer rate of Super Speed 5.0Gbps, High Speed 480Mbps Supports 10BASE-T, 100BASE-TX, 1000BASE-T with auto-negotiation
  • Fully compliant with IEEE 802.3/802.3u/802.3ab/802.3az specification
  • Supports full duplex operation with IEEE 802.3x flow control
  • Supports half duplex operation with back pressure flow control
  • Fully Energy Efficient Ethernet specification compatible
  • Supports IEEE 802.1q VLAN Tagging
  • Supports 4KB Jumbo Frame
  • Bus-Powered, No Need for External Power Source
  • LEDs indicating for Speed and Link status
  • System supports: Windows 2000/2003/XP/Vista/Win 7/Win 8/Win 10/Win CE, Mac OS X(10.6~10.10)

Product Composition

  • PocketShare-pico LAN Card * 1 ea
  • RJ-45 Keyring * 1 ea
  • Driver and install CD (mini) * 1 ea
  • Product Warranty * 1 ea


Test Environment and Result


  • CISCO un-managed Gigabit 24 Port Switch (SG92-24)
  • Samsung Ativ Book 9 (930X) - OS : MS-Windows 8.1
  • DELL OptiPlex 9020 i7/4790 3.6Ghz / ubuntu 14.04 LTS
  • CAT6E Plat Cable (20m * 2 ea)


Compare the size




FAQs

What is the PocketShare-pico Gigabit Ethernet Adapter?

  • The PocketShare-pico Ethernet Adapter is the most compact of all existing USB Gigabit Ethernet Cards, using a new and intuitive design. It can be carried on a keyring to be used with a Windows Ultrabook or Macbook. No Dongle cables are necessary.

Is it easy to install the driver for the PocketShare-pico Gigabit Ethernet Adapter?

  • The driver is automatically recognized and installed with Windows 8.1, otherwise the driver must be installed from the accompanying CD. You can also download the driver installation from our company’s website.

Is it compatible with USB 2.0?

  • It is compatible with USB 2.0, as well as with USB 3.0. However, Super Speed via USB 3.0 is not supported, but High Speed via USB 2.0 is.
Can it be connected to Android devices using an OTG cable?
  • OTG cable connectivity is not supported. When you build a Linux Kernel for an Android device, you need to compile the driver source as well. Therefore, we provide the driver source only.
Is it compatible with Raspberry Pi?
  • Yes, but only on Raspbian 3.18 firmware or higher.
Is it compatible with Linux?

  • With the desktop version of Linux, it is supported on Linux kernel 3.9 or higher. However, it is possible that the driver module is not included in the embedded environment. Therefore, we provide the driver source only.
Does the device use private MAC address?

  • No. Our company’s product includes a legitimate registered MAC Address.
How does shipping work?

  • We use Korea’s national post office (K-Packet) service. (Shipping normally takes about 1-3 weeks, but it depends on the region.)
Is this product certified?

  • It will be certified by KC (Korea Certification), FCC (Federal Communications Commission), and CE (Communaut' Europeen).
Can I buy it in bulk?

  • For bulk requests, please contact us through our website or email. (all@memorycube.net)

If I lose the driver CD, what should I do?

  • You can download the driver installation from our website. (http://www.memorycube.co.kr/)
How long does the warranty last?
  • Warranty service lasts for 1 year free of charge based on our company’s warranty rule. However, the buyer must cover shipping and handling costs with regard to service repairs.
What is the size and appearance of the product?

  • It is made of anodized aluminum, so the color of the body is silver, and the speed label of the USB 3.0 is blue Polyethylene embossed on the USB. The dimensions are 57.2mm X 16.8mm X 12.6mm, but these are subject to change based on any changes in design. It weighs 12g.

story:
Short Summary

Around the world, many musicians and producers are using mLAN hardware from the likes of Yamaha, Korg, Presonus and Kurzweil to create and perform their music.  However, the device drivers have not been updated since 2006, and are no longer supported on the current generations of OSX and Windows.  We hope to change that.

What We Need & What You Get

We need to raise enough money to pay a developer to build, test and publish the drivers.  We have already contacted an experienced developer, and budgets are being established.  If we do not raise the required sum, all contributions will be returned to the contributors.  If the final budget is less than we anticipated, the excess will be returned.

The Impact

This is an excellent opportunity to ensure that our equipment continues to function as long as possible, and that we can access all the benefits of the 01x and related hardware with newer computers.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please donate and contact any other musicians you know (via forums, Facebook etc.) who also use mLAN equipment to let them know of our efforts.

story:
The world's first ultra performance smart watch for iPhone and Android.

The iStick Playtime will be like no other in terms of letting you communicate with your friends, listen to your music, and track your performance on the run, no matter the conditions!

Super thin, lightweight, waterproof, with flexible e-ink display, joystick control, microphone and speaker; we have developed the ultimate smart watch.

But we want to make it cooler than that.  There are still some decisions to be made such as the colors it will come in, the design of our pro-edition, and the iStick Playtime app that will make it a must on the hill, on the mountain, or where ever your passion will take you.

Contribute to one of our great packages and become part of the design decisions, updated features, and promotions that will make this campaign truly exciting.

As featured in:

Recent Reviews

“...from the river to the slopes! Weather-proof, waterproof, and lightweight so you can take it on all your adventures.” -Blueridge Outdoors Magazine

"The first [Smart Watch] with a unique form factor designed specifically to withstand the rigors of extreme sports...The consuming public will be MORE than satisfied with the iStick Playtime!" -Smart Watch News

“It seems like everything has been thought of with this watch and I love that." -Wasabi Mountain

“The world’s first flexible, thin¬film electronics smart watch, built to endure all of life’s conditions indoors, outdoors, or underwater.” - Phones Review

"When it comes to outdoors and action sport, smartphones become a problem to use. With the Stick Playtime the problem may just be resolved." - Damn Geeky

"It's like a smarter version of various iPhone-cradling sport armbands and takes the weight of the phone off your arm." - Gizmag

"Proof that heavy-hitters (Apple, Samsung, etc...) no longer get to dictate when new technology hits the market.". -Trendhunter

 

Ready to Play!

More than a watch, the iStick Playtime syncs to your smart phone directly via Bluetooth. The iStick controls your smart phone’s functions and displays its vital information right onto the iStick’s display.

What it Does

The iStick Playtime instantly answers your calls, controls your music, messages, and sports stats without ever having to reach for your phone or slowing down to activate a function.  You can also activate Siri/Android voice command to undertake a number of audio-tasks or start your Dew Motion App, by simply stating: “Start my run”,for example.

 

See all of your stats without scrolling

The flexible e-ink display allows us to position the screen around the wrist rather than straight on top of it. This results in a bigger screen size and right view angle so that you can easily see your time, messages, and sports stats even in full sunlight. It also uses 50% less energy than common LCD screens.

 

Siri and Android Voice Command

With its embedded microphone and speaker, answer calls on the mountain, initiate Siri to command your music, listen to or reply to a text message by simply activating your iStick Playtime.

 

Weather-proof

Take it into cold, snow, water and rain.  The iStick Playtime is good to operate down to 15 degrees F (-10 C) and is waterproof.  So take it in the snow, down rapids, or anywhere else your passions will take you.

iStick moves at the speed you do

Through its innovative joystick controller, you can quickly activate all of your phone’s functions at full speed, even with a glove on. Don’t let your phone slow you down.

Wear it how you choose.

Skiing, snowboarding, running, biking, cycling, kayaking, swimming, kite surfing, hiking, motor biking and the list goes on and on. Wear in on your wrist, on your arm, on top of your jacket, or on your handle bars.


Tech Specs

  • Connectivity: Bluetooth 4.0
  • Charge: Rechargeable lithium ion battery, 7 days continuous operation on a single charge.
  • Display: E-ink™ display, scratch-resistant, flexible.
  • Voice/Sound: Embedded microphone and speaker for hands free operation.
  • Control: Joystick controller for music control, call reception, Siri, iStick apps media.
  • Weather proof: 15 F or -10 C
  • Waterproof: To be announced, expected 3 feet.
  • Compatibility: iPhone 4, 4S, 5, Android (early 2014 starting with galaxy)
  • Audio connection: iStick hands free mode or in combination with standard headphones or Bluetooth headset.

Features:

  • Start My App: specific voice command control for iStick apps control
  • Screen data display: time, phone message alert, text message alert, Bluetooth activation, battery level, song title, phone number id (Android only), sports statistics (4 level stats id) changing depending on sports apps used.
  • Voice command: full Siri voice command and Android voice command
  • Joystick control: receive calls, control music ( volume adjustment, song change, stop and play), Siri activation, iStick app center activation.

 

Warrranty: One year limited warranty 

 

Meet iStick Dev Team

Frederic Blouin, Founder and CEO, Dew Motion Inc.

“I feel that the iStick Playtime is the extension of my passions. The greatest reward so far has been to see how people really love our products and how eager they are to help out. This is how you can grow a company while having both feet on the ground. Keeping it real all the way." 

Holder of an M.A. in International Public Administration from the University of Geneva, Switzerland, Frederic has more than 20 years of experience as CEO and founder of technology start-ups within industrial and consumer product sectors.

Mike Turner, founding partner and investor in Dew Motion.

Mike was one of the instrumental early collaborators of Mark Thatcher, founder of Teva Sandals. Mike was responsible for the early sales of Teva products into large outdoor retail chains, such as EMS, LL Beans, Dicks Sports and others. He remained exclusive East Coast Agent for Teva for more than 20 years. Mike assists the company with valuable expertise in the development of its sales’ network within the U.S. outdoor market. 

Yannick Le Devahat, Syscard Innovations

Syscard specializes in the development of specialty thin film electronic
boards for integration into smart cards and mobile electronic devices. As founder of Syscard Innovations, Yannick's expertise and product procurement knowledge in Asia makes him a great associate in the product procurement process for the current project. 

François Lortie, Lortie Product development group

François has gained its reputation working for some of the successful Canadian outdoor brands including; Louis Garneau, Chlorophyle, De Vinci, Boreal Design and others. François provides our company with product development services specially in regards to thermo binding and laser cutting assembly of the product.

 

Why Indiegogo?

After a year of development, we are proud to announce that the iStick Playtime is ready to move into its production and accreditation phase.  We have all the suppliers lined up and ready to run!  

indiegogo allows us to engage with our early adopters at this critical phase of our project.  Making sure that we are designing what our core users want from the iStick Playtime and making them part of the decision making process.  This is why we need your help. To build the ultimate smart watch for sports and fitness!

 

Where will the funds go?

We need $250,000 to get the product from its current prototype state to its commercial state.  The costs include software programming, apps development, product certifications, licenses and minimum product inventory.  Since the electronics we are using are new to the market, there are high minimum levels required from our part suppliers. All of these factors make the first batch of products very costly to produce.  This is why we need your help.

 

What are the risks and challenges associated with the project?

While our company has successfully brought to market a first generation of iStick armbands for iPhone using flexible electronic components with less than 3% product return rate over three years, every new project contains a number of risks and challenges:

Challenges:

There exists no product on the market using the prescribed flexible electronic components within a textile material. We are the first to pioneer in this direction which does represent the challenge of working in uncharted territory.  This is what makes this exciting and why we need your help!

Risk:

Indiegogo customer should be aware that there exists a gap between a prototype version of a product and a production unit. While we have undergone a thorough engineering feasibility regarding the production of the unit, there may be some unforeseen elements that may affect its development.  If these should arise, we will communicate with you.

In manufacturing our product, we are relying on a number of suppliers for parts and final assembly.  Delays in the delivery of a part or defects attributed to a part can delay the estimated delivery date of the product.

Also, there are a number of certifications and licenses which we must obtain to have the product ready for retail.  While we have dealt with Apple licenses and other certifications for our other products, there are always uncertainties as to the time frames associated with obtaining final accreditations from these authorities.

Understanding these risks is an important part of making your decision on this Project. We will do our best to promptly answer to any of your concerns.

Connectivity: Bluetooth 4.0
Charge: Rechargeable lithium ion battery, 7 days continuous operation on a single charge.
Display: E-ink™ display, scratch-resistant, flexible.
Voice/Sound: Embedded microphone and speaker for hands free operation.
Control: Joystick controller for music control, call reception, Siri, iStick apps media.
Weather proof: 15 F or -10 C

Waterproof: To be announced, expected 3 feet.

Compatibility: iPhone 4, 4S, 5, Android (early 2014 starting with galaxy)

Audio connection: iStick hands free mode or in combination with standard headphones or Bluetooth headset.

Features:

Start My App: specific voice command control for iStick apps control
Screen data display: time, phone message alert, text message alert, Bluetooth activation, battery level, song title, phone number id (Android only), sports statistics (4 level stats id) changing depending on sports apps used.
Voice command: full Siri voice command and Android voice command

Joystick control: receive calls, control music ( volume adjustment, song change, stop and play), Siri activation, iStick app center activation.
 

Warrranty: One year limited warranty 
 
Meet iStick Dev Team
Frederic Blouin, Founder and CEO, Dew Motion Inc.
“I feel that the iStick Playtime is the extension of my passions. The greatest reward so far has been to see how people really love our products and how eager they are to help out. This is how you can grow a company while having both feet on the ground. Keeping it real all the way." 
Holder of an M.A. in International Public Administration from the University of Geneva, Switzerland, Frederic has more than 20 years of experience as CEO and founder of technology start-ups within industrial and consumer product sectors.
Mike Turner, founding partner and investor in Dew Motion.
Mike was one of the instrumental early collaborators of Mark Thatcher, founder of Teva Sandals. Mike was responsible for the early sales of Teva products into large outdoor retail chains, such as EMS, LL Beans, Dicks Sports and others. He remained exclusive East Coast Agent for Teva for more than 20 years. Mike assists the company with valuable expertise in the development of its sales’ network within the U.S. outdoor market. 
Yannick Le Devahat, Syscard Innovations
Syscard specializes in the development of specialty thin film electronicboards for integration into smart cards and mobile electronic devices. As founder of Syscard Innovations, Yannick's expertise and product procurement knowledge in Asia makes him a great associate in the product procurement process for the current project. 
François Lortie, Lortie Product development group
François has gained its reputation working for some of the successful Canadian outdoor brands including; Louis Garneau, Chlorophyle, De Vinci, Boreal Design and others. François provides our company with product development services specially in regards to thermo binding and laser cutting assembly of the product.
 
Why Indiegogo?
After a year of development, we are proud to announce that the iStick Playtime is ready to move into its production and accreditation phase.  We have all the suppliers lined up and ready to run!  
indiegogo allows us to engage with our early adopters at this critical phase of our project.  Making sure that we are designing what our core users want from the iStick Playtime and making them part of the decision making process.  This is why we need your help. To build the ultimate smart watch for sports and fitness!
 
Where will the funds go?
We need $250,000 to get the product from its current prototype state to its commercial state.  The costs include software programming, apps development, product certifications, licenses and minimum product inventory.  Since the electronics we are using are new to the market, there are high minimum levels required from our part suppliers. All of these factors make the first batch of products very costly to produce.  This is why we need your help.
 
What are the risks and challenges associated with the project?
While our company has successfully brought to market a first generation of iStick armbands for iPhone using flexible electronic components with less than 3% product return rate over three years, every new project contains a number of risks and challenges:
Challenges:
There exists no product on the market using the prescribed flexible electronic components within a textile material. We are the first to pioneer in this direction which does represent the challenge of working in uncharted territory.  This is what makes this exciting and why we need your help!
Risk:
Indiegogo customer should be aware that there exists a gap between a prototype version of a product and a production unit. While we have undergone a thorough engineering feasibility regarding the production of the unit, there may be some unforeseen elements that may affect its development.  If these should arise, we will communicate with you.
In manufacturing our product, we are relying on a number of suppliers for parts and final assembly.  Delays in the delivery of a part or defects attributed to a part can delay the estimated delivery date of the product.
Also, there are a number of certifications and licenses which we must obtain to have the product ready for retail.  While we have dealt with Apple licenses and other certifications for our other products, there are always uncertainties as to the time frames associated with obtaining final accreditations from these authorities.
Understanding these risks is an important part of making your decision on this Project. We will do our best to promptly answer to any of your concerns.

story:
BluCub is a small affordable wireless thermometer and hygrometer for mobile devices.

 

 

  

 

  

 

  

 

  

 

 

Wireless

Using the latest Bluetooth Low Energy 4.0 technology, BluCub has a range of up to 50m (160 feet) depending on its surrounding environment.

Humidity Sensor

Measures Relative Humidity between 0% and 100%. Keep mold, flu, viruses and bugs away from your home.

Temperature Sensor

Measures Ambient Temperature between -20°C and +50°C. Be healthier and save money with the right temperature for every room and every season.

Battery Life

3 Year Battery Life. And it's replaceable too!

Size

Measuring only 50 x 50 x 20 mm, it fits nicely in your pocket.

More is Better

Use as many BluCubs as you like to isolate your problem spots.

 

Quite simply:


BluCub transmits humidity and temperature data every 10 seconds to your mobile device. Once switched on, BluCub can run for up to 3 years 'chirping' away every 10 seconds. This allows you to simply run the app when you want to know what the humidity and temperature is of your environment.

 

 

  • Accurately shows you the conditions of your environment.
  • Helps reduce your energy bills
  • Allows you to check if your home improvements are working effectively
  • Can be moved and placed anywhere to find problem spots

Here are some of the uses for BluCub:

Ensuring proper indoor humidity has important skin allergen and other health benefits by inhibiting the growth of mold, bacteria, viruses, fungi, mites and other asthma inducing agents.

Reduce your energy bills by avoiding over-heating in winter and over-cooling in the summer and managing the settings in every room more accurately with BluCub.

 

Not sure about the conditions outside when you are getting ready to go out?

Put BluCub outside and get this information immediately.

 

Young children and elderly are more sensitive to environment changes. Help your baby sleep safe and sound by managing the temperature (16°C-20°C) and humidity (30%- 60%) in the room.

Use BluCub to check these accurately in your baby’s cot or bed.

 

Typical fridge temperature should be between 3°C and 5°C and freezer temperature -18°C. 

Use BluCub to adjust your settings accurately and reduce your energy bills by avoiding over-cooling.

 

Remember, not all products are equal. Are the controlling measures in your Greenhouse working satisfactorily? 

BluCub will give you this information accurately and can be placed anywhere in your Greenhouse to also check for circulation.

 

Laziness, skin agitation, dry eyes, asthma are typical problems due to incorrectly set temperature and humidity in buildings. 

Use BluCub to check these in any room at any time.

 

The life of your books is affected by the temperature and humidity they are stored in.

Protect against pre-mature aging and rotting by using BluCub to check your storage conditions.

 

Teach your children the benefits of managing temperature in your homes to save energy.

Teachers can use BluCub in experiments to show children how the environment changes.

 

Ensure that perishable food items are always maintained at the proper environmental conditions.

BluCub can be placed with foods to make sure the settings are correct and protect against food poisoning and early expiry of food.

 

Remember, not all products to manage storage conditions are equal.

If you have a doubt on the storage conditions of your expensive wines, BluCub can be used to provide accurate humidity and temperature information and help you protect your wines.

 

To protect your artwork, ensure temperature variation does not exceed 20°C over a 24 hour period and humidity remains within 20%.

Take spot measurements with BluCub to reassure yourself.

Quality of Cigars is greatly affected by humidity.

Place a BluCub with your equipment to make sure the humidity is between 68% to 72% to protect against tobacco beetles.

 

Protect against fungus growth on your lenses by making sure the humidity where you store, is less than 60%.

Put BluCub with your lenses to ensure the conditions are fine.

 

Use BluCub as a building inspection tool to make sure the temperature and humidity in ALL parts is correctly set to protect the goods you are storing.

BluCub can also help you determine if the circulation of air is working effectively.

 

Monitor server cabinets, rooms, data centres and other mission critical facilities to prevent equipment failure, downtime, loss of revenue and reputation.

Use BluCubs to make measurements at different parts of the cabinet to ensure there is adequate air flow around the equipment and room.

 


Here's a summary of the perks we are offering for different levels of support:

 


If we raise our base goal target, this is our vision for BluCub:

 

BluCub Hardware

The hardware design is complete and fully functional. We are currently testing our prototypes boards extensively so that when BluCub ships, it reaches you in perfect condition!

 

Our Working Prototypes

BluCub PCB

ENCLOSURE DESIGN

Our first Stereolithography (SLA) case:

BluCub - First SLA

From this early BluCub 3D Design

  

Spinning 3D BluCub Cube

To this BluCub Final Design

BluCub Final Render

 

BluCub iOS7 App

The BluCub iOS App is also nearly complete. We are working hard on adding more features to make BluCub even more useful for you. Please watch the video below for a complete demonstration of how easy it is to use BluCub.

 

 

If you've brought a product to market, you know how the costs pile up.

We have already invested in the hardware and app development to bring the project so far.

We are working tight and lean, keeping expenses incredibly low — yet still there are some significant costs that can't be avoided. Here are the primary ones:

  • Production Tooling
  • FCC Certification
  • Production, Assembly & QA Setup
  • Initial minimum production run
  • Shipping
  • Continued App Development - more features

 

Any new project carries significant risks. Although we have worked hard to minimize the risks, writing software for the Apple App Store always carries the risk of being rejected. Therefore there may be a delay in the release of the BluCub app as we make changes to the meet Apple's requirements.

However, the greatest risk we have, like any new venture, is shortage of funds.

If you like what we are doing and can afford to support us, help us to minimize this risk by supporting BluCub now by clicking on one of these:

 

 

 

Thanks for looking.

We would love you to join the BluCub community, so please help us get this amazing project off the ground. 

Every £1 helps and if you cannot support us financially, telling people helps too. Please join our community on facebook and share this with all your friends and family.

Thank you for checking out BluCub ~ Humidity & Temperature Sensing for Mobile Devices.

 

What phones does BluCub work with?

iOS7 devices with Bluetooth 4.0:
iPhones: 5s, 5c, 5, & 4s
iPod Touchs: 5th Generation & 6th Generation
iPads: 3rd Generation, 4th Generation & Mini 

 

Does BluCub work on Android, BlackBerry or Windows Phones?

No, not at this time.

 

No Android?

Android 4.3 introduces built-in platform support for Bluetooth 4.0 Low Energy. Android 4.3 phones with Bluetooth 4.0 will be supported in the future. This will be fast tracked if we reach our stretch goal above.

 

What should I add for shipping?

We're asking please:

  • Free Shipping to the UK - Hooray!
  • £10 for everyone else.

 

I can't wait! When will you ship?

We plan to ship in June 2014

 

Can I put BluCub in the oven?

No, please don't. BluCub's operating range is between -20°C and +50°C

 

I LOVE this product and want to tell everyone. What should I do?

Thank you, we'd LOVE you to do that!

Just under the video at the top of this page are a bunch of social media buttons and links. Also don't forget to like our Facebook Page.

 

We are engineers! 

We have been designing commercial and industrial wireless sensors for businesses for many years.

Most commercial long range sensor networks require a receiver and additional data processing equipment making it too complicated and expensive for consumers. We have always been aware of this limitation and have been actively searching for the right technology to use for an affordable consumer wireless sensing device.

Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) 4.0 technology was on our radar since 2012, but it was really in 2013 that BLE started gaining serious momentum. Smart phones, especially iPhones, accelerated the adoption of BLE support. Nearly everyone is now carrying a receiver in their pocket. The internet of things is becoming a reality and accessible by everyone.

Excited with the technology, we thought it would be really cool if anyone could buy a wireless humidity and temperature device and use a simple app to monitor and manage their environment.

So, as typical engineers do, we set off full steam ahead with our idea to bring an affordable wireless humidity and temperature gadget for you and I.

We have a strong partnership with our manufacturer to ensure we get a quality, reliable product to you.

And here we are now, asking for your support to bring BluCub to the market.  We have lots of ideas (see our stretch goals for some them) for new features and functionality for BluCub and hope we can get the opportunity to make these a reality with your support. 

Feel absolutely free to contact us with any questions, comments or ideas you may have. We will be grateful for any feedback.

Thank you.

story:
PocketCloud comes handy when you want your files to be accessible from all your devices at the same time. With its 54Mbps ( 6.75 MB per second ) speed, it would take less then 0.3 seconds to save or read a 2MB photo.

Each case would be carefully machined from aircraft-grade aluminum and anodized according to its capacity - 16GB silver, 32GB green and 64GB black.
It measures 43x25x10mm, which is just slightly larger, then an ordinary flash-drive.

Inside the aluminum case it contains a PCB with an USB connector for charging and data transfer, as well as a CC3000 WiFi module, microprocessor and 10 RGB LEDs on the top.

LEDs are used to indicate its status, such as reading, saving, streaming, low battery, etc. You would be able to configure their blinking in any way you would like.

Bottom side of the PCB contains the memory card, as well as connectors for the battery and a piezo buzzer, which can be either activated from your phone or set to buzz when the distance to your phone increases, to prevent you from forgetting it.

PERKS:

16 GB PocketCloud, anodized silver, with a charging / connecting dock.

34 GB PocketCloud, anodized green, with a charging / connecting dock.



64 GB ENCRYPTED PocketCloud, anodized green, with a charging / connecting dock.


F.A.Q.

- What has been done so far?
- So far we have developed a working PCB prototype ,
 as well as prototypes of the enclosure and charging dock.

- What else needs to be done before mass production?
- Before starting mass production we plan to make a few minor editions to the PCB,
  rewrite our firmware to make it more efficient and write software for Android
  and iOs devices, so they would see PocketCloud as a memory card.

- How can we help?
- We need your help to set large scale production, including making injection molds
  for the enclosure, dock and the polycarbonate window.

- How long will the battery last?
- It depends on the distance from your device. Considering them being in close
  proximity, it could transmit about 64GB or receive about 128GB on a single charge.

- How can it be charged?
- PocketCloud can be charged by plugging it into a USB port, either directly or
  using the included charging dock. Also when plugged into a USB port, it would
  act as a regular flashdrive, allowing you to save and read data.

- What are the safety features?
- Connecting to it via WiFi will require a password that could be set from a PC.
  The 64GB version comes with optional full data encryption feature, which means
  that all data are stored / transmitted ( both by WiFi and USB ) encrypted and are
  decrypted only on the end device using a specific token and/or password.

- Why did you use the WiFi protocol, instead of Bluetooth?
- WiFi is the best and most used protocol for data transfer. With Bluetooth you
  would not be capable of reaching the 54Mbps and would have lots of device
  limitations, while with WiFi it would work on virtually any device, even old ones.

story:
My mission is to protect toddlers and other "wanderers" by producing an alarm that activates BEFORE the door can open. The ON-OFF switch is for general security to keep intruders out. The KEYED switch will keep intruders out and keep "wanderers" from leaving. Your support will protect toddlers and other wanderers in families who just don't want to pay those rediculous monthly monitoring fees.

I have so much faith that you too will see the value in these alarms, that I have opted for an all or nothing campaign. You are my test market and ultimately decide if these alarms will come to market.

Knob Sentry will install on door knobs and handles anywhere in the world! They are self-contained and powered by a 9 volt battery. Nothing drains the battery until the siren is sounding.

Best of all, there are NO MONTHLY MONITORING FEES and can be purchased one piece at a time until you have the amount of security you desire. After that, there are no more expenses.

I was born on a small farm in Pennsylvania. During college I earned an Associate's Degree in Electronic Systems Technology and gained 40+ years experience in prototyping, troubleshooting and repair. The need for these alarms surfaced when my mother developed dementia and we worried that she would wander off. When dad started using these alarms, mom resented the idea. When we explained that it was a home security system, she liked the idea.

I am at the beginning of this start up business (they are still made on my diningroom table). With sales starting to increase, I need to move into a facility, add employees, purchase some equipment and really start the sales momentum by purchasing infomercials. That is where I need your support. At a minimum that will cost $35,000.

The manufacturing process is flowcharted, the labor force is ready, vendors are waiting for our order and the distribution channels are thought out. I believe all problems that could delay this project have been addressed and I am confident that we can deliver in a timely manner.

Now I don't expect you to do this for nothing. The perks are designed so you get something out of the deal too. What better gift can I give than your safety and security.
